review_text: bad

Such a cute little game. Not too hard. The ads are very unobtrusive which I love. No need to see ads unless you want extra rewards or a revive without restarting. A balance very few mobile games seen to be able to achieve so I commend the developers! Edit: unfortunately though the game is only enjoyable to a certain extent. Eventually you reach a point where the only way to progress is to upgrade armor with real money. I tried to grind and even that is basically impossible. A shame.

Genuinely fun game that's really easy to learn/master. There are optional ads but you can play without seeing one. Progression is slow at first but the game is enjoyable enough that it's easy to progress further. Highly recommend the game for anyone who wants a casual mobile game. Rounds can last for a long time but never goes past 15 minutes. Game saves your progress if you close the app. Also, there are no tutorials but the game is ready enough to understand. Follow the evo for best results!!

This game is actually really fun, the mechanics are cool and so are the abilities, accompanied with the fact that there aren't any unwanted ads, but it has a tendency to crash a lot. It happens mostly when too many assets are on screen (enemies and damage numbers), or simply when I try to open the shop (nearly every time). Also sometimes the textures of enemies and boxes turns into a pink square. If you could somehow fix this I would be happy to give 5 stars.

Had a 3 star review, but I've bumped it up to 4 stars. The game is simple, satisfying, fun, and a great 15 minute time killer. I think it would be cool if you added different heroes or if chestplates changed your characters look. I wish there was a way to disable damage numbers because the lag can be annoying when the whole screen is covered with zombies on top of the numbers being there.
app_developer_reply: Hello dear player, thank you for your feedback, we will work hard to optimize the update. Subsequent games will optimize the balance and improve the game experience. Thank you for your support.Please enjoy our games.Have a nice day.

review_text: Although this may seem like another one of those dumb mobile games, it actually has lots of character! There are no ads in the game, and in-app purchases aren't a must. The game play is super unique with somewhat unique stages and a ton of diverse enemies! The upgrades and abilities are also a blast to play through, and the difficulty isn't that easy nor insane either! Is it perfect? No, of course not. But you should definetly give it a try!

Fun so far!!! Unlike other games, you don't have to see an ad pop up every 30 seconds. The only time you'll see an ad is if you choose to watch it vs spending gems earned or actual money. Another great thing is that the challenges are leveled to your own while still being challenging. You don't have spend money to level up your gear just to win by the time you're at level 5.

I enjoy the game a lot, I like how even at the end of a round the false sense of security can mess you up. I do have two recommendations, one when collecting rewards there should be a collect all button, the second would be a recycle option for items you have too many of that are taking up space....and maybe allow us to fully upgrade a third attack ability instead of two

I had seen ads for this game everywhere on social media, and I thought that for sure it would be a crummy game with too many ads to even make it playable, but eventually I gave in out of boredom and tried it out. This honestly might be one of my favorite mobile games I've played in a long time. The game has a pretty good combat mechanic, nice selection of weapons, cool maps and bosses. It's a really fun game and you can just lost track of time playing it.

Basics are really down good. The biggest problem I have is there is just not enough variety, feels like I'm playing the same way everytime even as things get harder. A few more different skills might add even more. Pretty fresh level design and progression system, but feels reliant on paying. Gems come fast enough, but you get tons of useless items, so it really requires a purchase or two. Ofc as intended, but I'd really rather pay 1-5$ for a for a complete mobile game and never have to use iap.
app_developer_reply: Hi! We have passed your feedback to our technical team! Your feedback is very important to us and your opinion is the cornerstone of our progress! Thanks again for your feedback!

review_text: Great game, very addicting. But one problem, when you get a chest from the bosses, sometimes, it glitches out and stays stuck on the wheel. It shouldnt be a problem since when you exit out it saves you progress. but when you exit out on the glitched screen, you dont get the skills that you got from the chest. And the chest doesnt spawn in again, which makes the game MUCH more difficult. Especially so because it can happen multiple times a game. Hope devs can fix this.

I absolutely love this game. It's not too easy or too hard which makes it super fun to play. No in-game ads (unless you watch to get rewards ofc) which is awesome. One thing I hope for is something to make it a little less laggy when the big waves of zombies come. Also being able to disable the damage numbers would be great but they're not too obnoxious. Keep up the great work devs:)

The game is quite fun, but I have two gripes with it. These are completely based off of my own device, but I'd still like to put these out there to see who has this problem too. First of all, the game crashes frequently, especially during bosses and invasions. It crashes always at about 12 minutes, so beating the first level is quite literally impossible. And second, most of the sprites show a magenta square over them, the only one I found that doesn't is boss two. Please check this out, thanks.

review_text: Minimalistic, yet engaging game of the simple premise "survive and upgrade as you go". The more you last, the better you're rewarded. No need for superb graphics, for it's fun and quirky enough to engage you for whatever time you have available (in other words, also engages casual players). Some things need lots of gems, but they're moderately easier to get as you keep upgrading and climbing stages.

It's quite fun, but a MAJOR issue is visibility. Yeah of course the screen is gonna get messy with all the abilities, but most of the weapons completely cover everything else. Most of the time I have trouble knowing where a boss is at all, my only clue is the direction of certain weapons. And since even ranged bosses like to randomly charge at your character for massive damage, that's a HUGE problem Also, the daily level is pitiful. I can play it both times and not afford a single evolution

review_text: Had to drop from 5 stars to 4. Once you reach a certain point it becomes very difficult to progress with how spending money. The game highly incentivizes spending money. You're given challenges with awesome rewards that are very difficult to complete if you're not willing to spend money. I still recommend it, but they're definitely going to try to drain those pockets. I haven't played a game this much in a while so that definitely says something.

After a certain point it becomes nearly impossible to complete any missions unless you have enough damage which requires better gear, upgrades, and more gold. Sometimes you may go multiple days slowly upgrading your items before you're able to actually complete a level - or you know you can just buy gems and progress that way, but the game on its own without spending any money gets impossible to complete. The enemies scale too quickly in health and damage as you progress.

review_text: It's a fine game to kill time, but chapter 4 of the game needs to be easier. If you aren't lucky enough to get maxed out defender wheels by 5 minutes it becomes almost impossible to survive, and the baseball bat, or any other weapons don't solve that issue. Neither do any of the other upgrades since they all fire slow, not even both drones.

The controls in this game are like trying to pilot a dead prostitute with an Atari 2600 controller on Xanax - the antithesis of responsive. You have to make short incremental movements in a tapping motion which causes you to select the wrong upgrades when you level unexpectedly. At least move the jeezless choices toward the top of the screen! Aside from that it's relatively decent. They are fairly generous with currency acquisition and I appreciate the material refund when you fuse equipment.

review_text: This game is a great example of what Vampire Survivors would be if it were in microtransaction heck. It is currently impossible to complete all daily goals due to features not existing, and there are a limited number of powers to have a viable run at any stage even after grinding to level up your gear. Whatever balancing has taken place since launch has proven to be a push to buy more gold. I play it, and the loop is good, but it could be so much better.

review_text: This game is a really fun time killer, anytime I'm bored in school I play this game and it passes the time faster. The only complaint I have is it can get a little repetitive. I think the normal levels are fine that way because each level has different zombies/creature and different maps, but I think the trials should be different than the normal maps you have already seen; whether that be small changes or just completely different maps. But other than that this is a fun game and good time kill

Pros: Addictive. Don't need to pay to win. Ads are for bonuses. Cons: Cost to buy anything doesn't make sense to pay that much for any app game. Why would anyone drop $100 on this? Kind of set up for kids to buy $ stuff accidently. Improvement imo: Continue costs jump around and sometimes you can continue three times, sometimes once, doesn't make sense. Increase speed option would be nice.

Great game, no intrusive ads, everything is pretty balanced, the different stages provide new challenges. The game does need more work as you can't change much of the settings mid match unless you exit out the app and open it again. The needs a suggestion box so people don't have to post problems about it in the reviews. The games does become laggy if there are enough things on screen but doesn't affect gameplay. There needs to be more quality of life settings so you can see the zombies in game.

Most is copied from vampire survivors, but this game is very good! No forced ads, spins on the original vampire survivor game concept, some original content from previous habby games, and good work on the 2d art, some may think it's a step back but some quality decline is happening as the games feel more rushed, etc etc. Good job overall, 5 stars if you depart further from vampire survivors' style and more into your own game! Also, when offline some rewards don't always work when back online.

Initial gameplay is fun, but as soon as you find your favorite combos, everything outside of that becomes pointlessly annoying. The odds of hitting a good random sequence actually decrease as you progress since more options get added. review_text: I'll start this by saying I typically hate mobile games but I absolutely love this game. The lack of forced ads and ability to earn premium currency at a decent rate is an absolute breath of fresh air these days. Tremendous well done to the developers!

It's fun enough and progression is steady I suppose. Yet it is a Stat based game. Meaning you will be stuck on a level for potentially longer periods until you can buy that next Stat upgrade, or get a better piece of gear, or pay to upgrade that gear. There is very little actual strategy involved at all. In fact my method thus far is thus. If I can not sit still and murder everything, I am probably not making it to the end of the level, as said end of level.

review_text: For a reskined copy of Vampire Survivors, this us actually a really solid game. No repetitive adds showing up every 5 seconds, no pay to win mechanics, though it probably does give a huge boost in-game, and it's lots of fun. Only problem I have is that nobody seems to recognize they are littarily ripping off another game to almost the smallest details.

Overall good fun, with a good mix of tactics, reaction and luck. Does get a bit repetitive, however, especially as a single level often takes 15 minutes to complete. And if you get unlucky and get a few bad rolls on your weapons/supplies, you may have to start over. Also, the screen starts to fill up too much in the 'late game' when you have everything maxed out and are shooting 6 different weapons constantly. It makes it almost impossible to see enemies.

I really want to love the game. Very simple mechanics but so addicting. Very nice layout. No crashes. However, the progress is waaaaaay too slow. Moreover, the games are too long. So much fun! It really should be 5 stars, but they have some of the classic mobile game tropes that are horrible. I'll address those first: they have energy that refills over time, they have a paid currency that you can watch ads for, and it definitely has that micro transaction underlying push that makes you want to spend money. So far I have been able to look past those and enjoy the game. I really enjoy the actual game, I really just hate the stupid energy system, it really is unnecessary.

Lots of microtransactions. Unfortunately, the only way to remove ads is a $10 MONTHLY charge, which is absurd. There is a satisfying amount of "You're basically invincible and zombies charge into your circle of death" when you pull the right combo of skills -- you're going to NEED AoE coverage, too. Levels have designated points where a flood of enemies circles you and single-target stuff just won't save you. Equipment is alright, but the quantity needed for upgrading higher gear is insane.

A highly polished game that adds some good ideas to the genre such as warnings when bosses or large waves are coming. However, the business model is awful. review_text: No ridiculous ads. No in your face marketing. Items are balanced. In all honesty it's not that bad. It automatically gets bonus points for being honest with their ads, a rarity amongst mobile devs, but even past that while the game play is very simple and a little repetitive it's still nice, fun and keeps me coming back. In app purchases don't feel required since there is grinding but in maybe 2 or 3 good runs you'll have what you need. So all in all I'm really happy with what I've seen so far with the game I just hope it gets a little more added in the future

review_text: It's like a lot of free my mobile games, but it beats them graphics wise easily it's extremely addictive. While ads can be a bit buggy sometimes like the ad won't give you the thing you watched it for or just flat out bugs out. The controls are very simple as all you have is a joystick I like the concept of leveling up the ability per run the "max" is 5 star but once you have a 5 star weapon there is a chance on a lucky draw or when you level up you have the option to make it a 6. I recommend it

The game and the mechanics themself are pretty fun, but the balancing is horrid. Enemies could have say 300 health on the previous level, then suddenly go to 900 health on the next, with a very noticeable speed/damage boost. Meaning you have to spend extra time/money just to go through a single level, just for the next level to be incredibly easy due to your new upgraded power, but other than that, the game is pretty solid.

On one hand, this is Magic Survivor with a cute reskin, merge-3 gear, and much heavier monetization, part of a frustrating trend. On the other hand, out of the games trying this, its gameplay feels the best, its gear is more than stat sticks, and gold/loot drops aren't too bad. [1 Needs modes for grind and challenge (trials seem 1-time).] [2 Characters with unique active skills could be nice (collectible, not overpriced).] [3 Environments could be more interesting (trees, cars, buildings, etc).]

Decent gameplay, enjoyable for a while, then it's just tedious. I don't know many people that want to sit on their phones for 10+ minutes at a time. Not to mention the difficulty curve can be atrocious. At 8 minutes the entire screen fills with enemies, 16 minutes the same thing. We're talking no way of escape. If you're not built to tank/heal massive amounts of damage you will barely make it if at all.

review_text: To be entirely honest, it's very clear someone wanted to make someone similar to vampire survivors. And it works! It is clearly not a copy paste, but keeps desirable elements. With basically no ads, the game is intuitive and enjoyable. While I'm not a huge fan of a summons system, it's fine in a game like this. Well made, worth the download.

It's a fun game. Levels are long. Not much variety in offensive skills, so every game feels pretty similar, and unlike other roguelikes, there aren't really any incentives to try out different skills, need more accessible equipment that benefits the use of other offensive skills. The evolve tree is mainly upgrades for base stats, a bit boring. Except for the reroll ability and enemies drop equipment ability. Would be nice if they offered more gameplay changes rather than Stat boosts.

This is a great old school style game, just be prepared for the difficulty to get insane pretty quickly. By level 4 you'll be thinking: "Ok, this is pretty hard." Level 5 will have you wondering if the game was designed to be impossible. I can't even imagine what level 6 is going to look like, although I kind of feel like I might never get there to find out. I'm assuming this is by design to encourage players to shell out real money, but imo, they went a bit overboard with it.

Awesome gameplay with graphic to little to no lag, and reasonable amount of ads. However, better upgrade/equipments are needed for better alteration in swarm run, especially on Trial mode. The upgrading aspect is tolerable with time-away earning, which yield free in-game currency along with scroll upgrades. Grinding for gem freely, anyhow, can be quite tedious through achievement(s) reward/emails. But anyhow, a good game that can kill time efficiently!

The bosses for the most part are pretty entertaining and balanced, the only thing I really dislike is the raging bull boss. It does ludicrous amounts of damage for how hard it is to avoid its attacks. It feels really out of place as everything else so far has felt fair and this boss doesn't.

After discovering with more weapons I have to say while the manual aiming on some weapon adds difficulty and create player experience, it's rather terrible on a mobile device. You cannot aim towards a different direction without heading that way, it's fine on a melee weapon but rather stupid on a range weapon. Another thing is a brief pause after selecting an upgrade would help a lot. I still enjoyed the game a lot however progression is definitely slowing down. Also maybe more skill tree?

I love it, great game, there are a few bugs, including the timer going to 15:01 instead of an even 15:00, and the "Destroyer" aka the super upgrade for the yellow spinny things, has a bugged animation. I love this kind of games, the problem is when i get to the point where i can't kill the zombies fast enough and they start to fill the screen. The game just lags and freezes, and no way to claim the prize i earned. How about removing those numbers when you kill them, no one really cares or bothers about each of them numbers. Maybe an option to turn it off. If the screen is full then maybe stop filling them until there's available space.

review_text: Great time killer. No intrusive ads. They're only optional for additional rewards which is very ideal for a free game. Overall I think its a top game for a reason. It's great! Took me a while to beat level one but that tells me that there is a great grind ahead! I hope the weapons and gear continues being diverse and I continue seeing new things. Thanks for the great game!

I really like the game. Here are the pros: 1. Easy to master 2. Nice progression system. With different equipment, weapons and perks 3. Various playgrounds with different enemies each time 4. Really not so many ads (big plus) Cons: 1. At the moment, the game is lacking weapons and skills variety. Would be nice if you could introduce new weapons and skills 2. Would be fun to see some story to keep me more interested 3. Would be nice to see obstacles or movable objects (like boulders maybe)

The game is absolutely a fun time killer. It's fun, it's not pay to win. It saves your progress mid game if you can't finish in one go. The only reason for 3 star is that the drones need a little fixing. I mean what's the point of the drones aiming nowhere when there is just one boss while fighting. It's practically impossible to aim with them drones as they fire in thin air. Plus because of that one reason It's also useless to choose and upgrade the drones.

review_text: I downloaded this game with the intention of it being a little offline side game but I came to adore the simplicity and consistency of it's content. Although it's a very fun and addictive game, I feel like having set bonuses could differentiate the direction that the average player takes the game. I also feel like having set bonuses could add a reason to try and grind for certain pieces of armor instead of just equipping their random, strongest pieces of gear. Thank you for your time.

The gameplay is fun and soaks up a lot of my time. I just dislike the energy system (I don't get why you wouldn't let players grind super hard and get OP), battery consumption, and lag. I recently got the Lightchaser and have experiencing extreme lag on occasions. I believe the cause is the damage indicators, so please add an option to disable them.

The gameplay, graphics, sound and concept is good. But the power scaling of enemy is terrible you would need to buy gems to progress to the next chapter without hours of pointless grinding. The merging of items is difficult since you need gems and the chance to get the item you need is very low due to too many items. Wish I can buy items using coins.

review_text: Glad to see a new title from this studio, I liked Archero. There's more grind in this game though. There are several plateaus where a level has to be farmed on and on to get any substantial upgrade. This makes the game quite repetitive. Also, it seems only one build is really viable. Great

review_text: I give it 5 cuz it's a great game, but it clearly has the same flaw of every app game. It reaches the point where you go from mowing everything down to all of a sudden your dieing every few second, enemies won't die and your relying more on luck for powerups. Definitely the best of this type of game I've tried though. The Devs really try to present options for leveling up besides a constant grind or shelling out a lot of money. Wish it could be played offline though...

This game is actually really fun I would rate it a five but the game has a few bugs 1.When I completed the trial, they won't give me the reward until I am done with the next stage. 2. After choosing a power up, there is a slight delay of about 0.5 seconds to 2 seconds. I won't list down any minor bugs but I hope the developers look into the bugs I mentioned and try to fix it.

I love this game. I really do. But it suffers in some areas. The worst is the grind. They obviously want you to go to the store and spend money. But if you're like me and refuse, you'll get to a point 4-5 levels in where you need to grind and grind and grind to finally get past it. But it's very addictive and has a lot to offer as far as not just having one linear passage, there's side objectives to do to help the grind and ease the frustration sometimes. 4/5 overall very fun and simple.

The game is fun and has a potential to be one of my favorite games, but the big problem is that whenever I try to buy something through ad, and the ad plays, it never gives me what I wanted from that ad, it's such a scam. Also, please give us an option to lower the quality or remove the numbers of damage so there isn't much lag and for better playing experience. PLEASE do something about the lag, it has been one of the only reasons I keep failing.

Fun game. Only 3 problems i have with it. They are the completely randomized weapons and skills per level. You literally have to make a build as yiu play. 2. The difficulty of levels is ridiculous. Im level 20+ with 19+ blue or purple gear,. And i can't get past level 9. 3. The merge system for better gear is pretty much useless. You need identical items to upgrade 1 piece and with the amount of different items, yiu have better luck winning the lottery than getting 3 pieces of the same gear

review_text: I love the game, I love the idea, the problem is in higher trials especially where reaction time is key for survival, where zombies have haste. After a boss sometimes a swarm of zombies fills the screen end I experience a lot of lag. My hero just freezes and I die because I cant move my character for few seconds. So this needs a fix, because the creators ask for gems for revival so it's not fair if you die because the screen it's overcrowded and generetes lag. However the game is great.

Items don't do enough and with all the left over pieces you got you can't do anything with because you can only upgrade the same specific item. Items also feel underpowered especially when you get eare pieces. The different sort of weapons you get are really are absurd. There needs to be a lot more variety as my game boiled down to the same strategy every single time. Some weapons are useless.

review_text: The game is really fun, kinda slow paced but i love the variety of levels, weapons and skills, it's not the "pay to win" sort of game, requires the slightest of strategy, will find yourself grinding to evolve and level up, the events are absolutely profitable from a player standpoint, kinda upset they don't last long enough to enjoy 100% of it's perks, but overall DEFINITELY RECOMMEND from someone who's very picky when it comes to mobile games

The game is nice in starting. However, after few levels the game becomes boring with same range of weapons you can choose from. Rather than skill it becomes more on luck. The biggest downside of the game is that most of the main rounds take fixed 15mins + 2 mins (approx) boss killing which makes it too time consuming. Even side levels take same time as main to complete. With real money you can buy gems or coins but levels have to be played again and again for random blueprints and currency.

review_text: It was fun on the 1st 7 days... But after that you'll realize that this game is low-key pay to win game, Even the recent event is pay to win. The difficulty spike between levels is also HUGE which kills the game for me. There's also the lack of ways to get equipments which basically means that you'll need like days or even weeks just to have the right upgrade for the next stage. Was honestly having fun in this game but after a week or two it's just a drag at this point.

review_text: Great fun. A few comments for improvement though: - Controls could be more responsive though - The gun don't always want to shoot the bosses and mine bosses even though it aims right at them - The reward wheel never responds to first click - Trials are too repitive. Would be fun to see some different variations to the added disadvantages for the player. - Putting money into the evolution tree is very unbalanced early on compared to just upgrade gear. Gear is way better, makes no sense.

The experience is somewhat of a bittersweet. You should not have to rely as you do on gems. I think the existence of them is fine. But when there is only so many in the game after a certain point, and the rest are tied to progression, then i think one of two things is in order. Either make the items require less to merge or make items more plentiful, like after playing a game. Progression really does slow to a half around lvl 18 and its days on the same level. Hopefully yall can fix this issuee.

review_text: Really like the game... It's easy, the controls are good and you have a lot of options how you want to upgrade your guy during the battle. Tho the only downside is that once you get your upgrades that are so flashy it is really hard to see the zombies bullets and attacks case of all the effects

This game is amazing, I love all the weapons and the upgrades. However the game started to lag when the screen was filled enemies. I also would love to see much more different content, maybe like a co-op? (Edit: After the update, I love the new additions to the game it makes it more lively. The missions and rewards are an enjoyable welcoming. I hope this game gets even more new updates because its a really fun game but can get repetitive at times.)

Its a pretty good game, Ive played for a couple days. There is one thing I think they could improve on, which is more countdown timers. For example, I dont know when the cooldown for my patrol quick earnings is up, or when my daily challenges reset. Besides that, its a fairly solid game.

Game itself is fun, gear is locked behind gems but you get quite a bunch for simply playing and leveling up. The skill tree is nice, and gets you to play trials in order to get the better perks. The game waves the illusion of being able to get an epic sword for a 'launch event'. Issue is, it requires for you to beat world 10, get to level 20 unlock 40 perks etc. It's just simply unrealistic unless you spend money lol, I was playing this game an absurd amount and didn't even get halfway.

Game is fun, but the quantity and the quality of the rewards are little and poor. Update: I have decided to drop my rating on this game. The difficulty is unreal in chapter 7, I'm level 22. There is no way to surpass any thing unless I waited for the offline gold to accumulate or spend lot of money to get better gears. It's fun at first, but after a point in the game you MUST spend LOTs of money to progress onwards.

review_text: The gap difficulty at every chapter, maybe can you please lowering difficulties to it? It's very hard you know, and about the stamina, it's really take a long time to get 1 stamina (about 8-10, I'm not really remember it) where you need 5 stamina to do 1 run, it's really annoying, can you make it faster to it? I really appreciate it if you do that. Overall the game is good, and sorry, here 4 stars for you now, I'll change it to 5 when there's change to the game.

As a clone of the PC vampires game, i was very welcome to give this a go. The gameplay is good and does what its intended. You soon get to grips of where to focus your upgrades on and what you want to be able to reach the end of level. However, as many others have highlighted, it soon becomes apparent to progress much further than Level 6 you need more ATK. Even with the perfect build, you simply dont do enough damage to survive. So its comes back to random item drops, loot boxes and money üò©

Great and addicting but could use a bit of fixing up here and there. Two big issues is there's no way to view how many revives you have and also no way to see how much total armour you have and how much the armour even actually affects incoming damage. Also an in-game way to view evos would be nice as it doesn't show the corresponding support item underneath the weapons like it does for the support items.

Suffers from the same flaw of every Habby game, your progress is mostly dictated by your gear. Doesn't matter how good you are at the game, you need good enough gear for the stage or you lose, and attempts take 15 minutes, so you don't want to lose. Gear takes a lot of time OR real life money to unlock and upgrade. But at least it doesn't have intrusive ads, so that's why the score isn't lower

From 5 stars to 2 stars. I had a lot of fun playing this game but after chapter 8 everything suddenly became so difficult. Skill aquisition became so random like you can really notice it. Gold are so hard to get for upgrades. So how are we supposed to clear that 7 day server launch challenge? It is literally impossible without spending. Im so excited to get the final reward but suddenly theres a timer for it. Only 6hours left and im stuck at chapter 9. I even played it everyday since i started.

review_text: I love this game and it is really easy to get addicted to, I just have one small complaint. After finishing the stumble pass there isn't really any motivator to keep playing, as in rewards. There are tournaments but I can't really play because of the time they start. Maybe when we level up we can get a wheel spin or a small amount of gems/tokens. Don't get me wrong, I still find the game really fun, but after getting all the rewards I don't feel motivation to play as much unless with friends.

The game is great, play this with my friends at school and everyone enjoys it. Two things need to be addressed however. The one that should be fixed the most is the punching emote, it's annoying as not everyone can obtain it making matches very unfair. Another thing that should be addressed but is a bit unnecessary is controller adaptation, the game will be a lot more smoother when connect to a control. Other than those two things the game is amazing.

Fall Guys clone for mobile. It's just like Fall Guys, but with fewer rounds, less players in each match, and clunky on screen controls. It does what it can, the ads aren't invasive compared to other free games, which is a plus, (probably the only thing pushing it up to a 4/5), and all IAPs are cosmetic. There aren't a lot of variety in maps so far, but it's fun for what it is in small doses.

The game is so much fun. It's almost exactly like fall guys but on mobile. It's easy to get skins but I feel like they need to add more maps and different ideas to the game. Also, there r barley any adds. They only appear 1 every 5 full matches wich is nice and I was thinking they need to extend the pass because it's so easy to finish. They once u do, u must wait another 15 or so days to restart the pass. Also the controls are easy but is sometimes have a problem with the lag when I use my data.

Okay, I like the game. It's a great alternative to Fall Guys. Thing is, it really needs controller support. Like, it's a must. Something that requires you to control your character with this much agility is almost unplayable with on-screen controls. Until that gets added, provided it ever does, I don't think I'll play it. Too nerve wracking.

Have been enjoying this game for a bit now and can say it's a pretty good game to waste time on, rounds are quick and simple, controls aren't hard, just generally an alright mobile game. One pet peeve is the obvious P2W punching, skating, and hugging emotes. I've lost to these quite a bit and it wouldn't be that bad.. if they were available to everyone that is. New levels would be good as well.

Its a good falls guys clone for a mobile game. It's just like fall guys, it just sucks some emotes are behind a pay wall to give those players a advantage. Some maps are great, but some suck like the space race map with the ending needing to guess where the finish is. And some maps have over power shortcuts. Diving is cool but not when it happens automatically. I can do a jump and it just does a dive and I'm not even in mid air.

It may be a fall guys clone. But damn if it isn't a really good one! Really perfect to play quick matches and the games load super quickly unlike fall guys that takes 5 millions years to load games. The controls are also pretty slippery and fast which adds an extra layer of skill and chaos that Fall guys doesn't have. My only gripe with the game is that it should have daily and or weekly challenges to complete and maybe an exp bonus for coming first in a race. More gameodes in Future wouldbecool

In my opinion it is a very fun game especially because it is free. Although most people play on mobile, I got the game on a chromebook, and this is where it gets bad. It automatically shows the touchpad controls, which I can control with my mouse. But the jump and joystick are on two separate sides, so I can either move or jump, which makes it really hard. So to make me give a 5 star, I think you should add computer controls (also I got it from the Google Play Store).

Game's pretty fun. Let it be known I'm writing this of my own accord, and enjoy the structure/format. A couple grievances I have with its design, though, are that it gives you an ad after every elimination (could've done an ad for every other elimination, for instance) and that controller support is lackluster at best (you just cannot jump when using a controller). Overall, the gameplay saves the score. 4/5.

This game is great and I have a lot of fun playing with friends. A thing that I think could be improved on in the next season though is the rewards system, it's really hard to earn enough gems or tokens to win a skin unless you just watch ads. There should be things like quests and challenges to win rewards in my opinion, other than that I'm really happy with Stumble Guys. (Edit) They need to remove the punching emote because it makes the game completely unfair for those who can't get it.

It was a fun game. The skins was cute and creative, i love the skins. And the dance, the footsteps, the emotes, all of it. But there's a bug, so when i wan't to make room, it stuck on the loadings, even though my internet was stabil, it just keep going, so i restart the app, sometimes it work sometimes don't. But overall it was a good game. Fix the bugs.. Thankyou :)

Pretty fun (especially with friends). Some things to improve on could be: Making it so players walk through each other as round one is the worst experience of my life. I keep getting pushed around by a swarm of idiots which heavily hinders me. Also remove the scrolling thing to puck the minigame at the start or make it substantially longer because every time i die and try to do a new match, I have to wait so long ruining grinding.

review_text: Stumble guys is a good copy of fallguys. Pretty addictive and fun to play with friends, Controls are decent. However, the maps are sometimes buggy and some of the features in the game might disappear when this happens, for example on the "paint splash" map the floating platforms can disappear, or in "capturetheflag" there are rounds where the flags are gone. Another problem is that the special emotes are overpowered (for example punch). "floorflip" is incompletable if you mess the first part up.

The game is obviously a rip off of fall guys but that doesnt matter. The game is good, the stages are fun and its one of the best game to play with friends. You need no prior tutorial to jump into the game. The network problems are mild and dont effect me much but the main issue is the bots, 97% of the players in every stage is a bot. No real players. And depending on your rank. The difficulty increases. The increased difficulty makes playing alone just terrible and un enjoyable.

Overall, the game is great. It's smooth, it's fun, and most of all, it's funny. There are tons of minigame maps that I still haven't played but that just make it more exciting despite the minor bugs here and there. I think what can make this same even better if the devs tried to add more players instead of just 32 in limit to make the game longer.

The game is real fun, almost perfect, and the problem is that there is advantage between the people that have passes or buy stuff with money, and it's like REALLY annoying update: when ur about to win sometimes people put on you an especial emote that kicks u and it's obnoxious. I don't think it's fair cause they're making it hard to keep up if you don't have money to buy that kind of advantages.

It is very pay to win to be a Fall Guys Like game, the gameplay is good, the graphics are good but you are last at laser mode and someone grabs you with the pay to win emote and you lose, please fix this. And also, there are times the game just throws you through the floor, I coded something just like that and fixed it within seconds, make the floor Thicker

I liked the game. It's fun; specially when it's played with friends. But it would be better if we could add friends, instead on relying on the server code. And on the modes that are team vs team (blue vs yellow etc.) Let us choose if we want to play with or against our friends.

It's Alright, however if you can you afford on steam, I suggest you buy fall guys instead. Still, this game is a good alternative and can be played anywhere anytime (If you have an Internet Connection that is). So yeah I recommend this game. I'm looking forward for more maps in this game. Not really a fan of the stumble pass feature, though. Cheers, -Repaircat

It's a 1 star because I've fallen through the map several times causing me to lose. I also think they could have not made it pay to win. Yes, you can save up gems to buy the pass, but it takes a long time and besides the pay to win emotes the pass is really not that great.

A bad game is not a disappointment. A good game turned bad due to bugs is a major disappointment, which is exactly this game. The gameplay is nice. The whole set up, characters and levels are nice. But has so many bugs. I play on a pixel 6 pro. It keeps disconnecting me saying no internet, when i can see it's working fine. Happens atleast thrice every day. Sometimes the game simply wouldn't login. Had to uninstall and then install again after a day. Just the bug fixes would make it spectacular.

This is a really good game. I really enjoy most of it, however I'd give it 5 stars if the punch or slide emotes (those who 'disable' other players would be unlockable by everyone. I got rid of the ads by a small and fairly amount of money, which helps with the gameplay and development. I'm waiting for more and more maps to be released. This has potential.

Very good game, but 2 things that I really hate. First of all, sometimes why you exit the app and logging back in the log in will fail. Second of all, when you play alone, you get very hard enemies. But when you play with a party, you get weak enemies. Please fix these 2 and very great if you fix them :D

I mean I like the game, but there needs to be a way to log in on pc, people who have a lot of progress on there phone and want to shift to pc but in order to do that they have to use a whole different account. But for some people like me since Google sucks i can't make mobile purchases and in order to purchase some things which I do there's some really good offers but I can't buy them, so there really needs to be a way to sign in on your account through pc

Alright this game has been less and less refreshing, it's still the best Fall Guys clone, but admit it, it needs a lot of fixing. Some racing maps keep getting used every round like Cannon Climb or Humble Stumble. There needs to be certain maps for a certain round. You also win a lot less now since there are a lot of hackers in the game. The kick/punch button is annoying and slows your progress if you don't have the pass. The game was fun in it's newest days but now it needs to get fixed.

Best game, I love this so much but i think this game need something that u can friend people so you can play later with them and some new specials and special emotes will be really good. And a game mode for blockdash because people love that game mode and me too that why 4 stars if it's fixed im doing 5 stars! And 1 thing the checlpoints doesnt work great when im at the finish and i fail im going to the begin so fix that!!

This is the best game with very less ads and amazing graphics... For praising it I'm feeling like speechless!! ‚ùÑÔ∏è Btw I have one problem that's most of the players (98.999%) are computers that make the game too hard for playing! Also in the games like Stumble Soccer, That Rocket Prumble, I face problems as the game starts and 2 or 3 people of my team leave in beggining... This haplened 6-7 times!! So I want there are no team games.... Hope you look towards my small suggestionsüòä

It is a really good game and all that stuff but there's 2 things 1. I really want COSMETICS all the skins are good by itself but you should add accessories and cosmetics to the skins to make it more better than it already is. 2. another thing is that we really need more players like 40 or 50 or even 60 or something the game kinda gets more repetitive with 3 rounds only so it would be great if there was over 5 or 6 rounds like fall guys since it's supposed to be like fall guys but for mobile.

Hello! I think this is a great app for players who don't have access to Fall Guys. But there is a problem I think most people have come across. If you are partied up, and you come accross a team mode, pleasr let the whole party in 1 single team. Its very annoying. Please fix this. And the pay to win emotes are not very fun to come across. Overall a 4 star game.

Way too many duplicates! The amount of duplicate skins you get is absolutely awful! And the tokens it gives you in conversion is not even worth it compared to what was spent or given for the skin the skins are the main thing you play for to unlock and what not that's everything you use the gems and tokens for yet its always repeats! Absolutely ruins it something needs to be fixed here

I rate this app 1 star because it did copy fall guys a bit by putting some similar levels like tile fall .I would be happy if they made their own with no fall guys levels . the spin the wheel is also really rigged when you get something good it will pretty much change it to like a common .when you dive you slide so far it can make you lose in tile fall .To Punch other players you need 1200 gems so that means all the new players and noobs will just get bullied and 2 second uninstalled boom bye.

I love the game, all though, when we go to free prizes and spin, it has enough speed to get on a legendary but it doesn't land on it, and it makes me really making me want to uninstall the game, another thing, please take out that punch thing that hits you and makes you fall down and then you lose and please add more maps.

Game doesn't give you a lot of variety. There's some pretty cool gamemodes but the chance of playing them is little to nothing. It gets boring playing the same gamemodes after awhile when you know that other gamemodes exist but you can't play cuz of RNG. It also takes you 200 years to get up after sliding. Overall, it's a pretty bad game but it can be fun sometimes. Please make the cooler maps have a better chance of being chosen.

A great game in terms of servers, graphics and in-game physics. But to much surprise, the developers got stingy since there are practically no rewards for winning. Yes, You don't even get gems/tokens even after finishing first which kills the overall motivation to continue playing and accumulate gems to buy player skins/emotes. Counter productive strategy if you ask me.

Decent game itself, but it's very pay to win. You have to either pay or grind for years to get stumble pass, a skin you want, ect. Another thing is that only a few players who paid for stumble pass get special emotes. This is really unfair to players who can't or don't want to spend money in a game. Also, the wheel spin is very rigged. If you are about to win something good it either blocks the slice, or makes it very easy to skip it.

The maps have mostly acceptional obstacles some are really hard but in a sense it makes the game better. When starting a game it takes such a long time for the map to be chosen, other than that its really enjoyable/competitive.

I just updated (1-sept-2022) this game and noticed a _ bug/problem _ the "Exit button" is not working. I have to use my phone's middle button to forcefully exit the game before update it was working! Although "cancel button" is working. When we try to exit it shows two options Cancel and Exit (exit is not working fix it please). Although game is very nice üíñüíñüíñüíñ and I request you guys plz increase the chances of Special skinü•∫

Just downloaded the game on my OnePlus 10 Pro, which should have no problem running the game. As soon as the loading screen with all the levels slows down, and a level is picked, I get this enormous lag/stuttering. Ping is good at 20 to 25, so it's not my internet/server connection. Tried different graphic settings (resolution/shadow), restarted phone and cleared cache + data. Nothing helps... Any tips?

Its fun with friends and a great time waster. However the game is 100% pay to win. The ptw emotes are super annoying and should either be given to everyone or just removed. Also annoying to constantly get the same skin over and over and I don't even have that many skins. Once you get one it should just be removed from the wheel. And the game is super slippery and buggy. I've glitched into slime or teleported somewhere way too many times so maybe instead of adding more ptw skins and fix your game

I really like the game, it's a lot like fall guys. But I do have some request. Could you add an area were you can redeem codes, that would be helpful. And maybe bring down the price to change your username. And add were you can see friend requests, and public servers that you can make too.

I love the game. I love how they remaked the trash game fall guys into a nice mobile online game. I love the characters and it's neverending theme. I love to win but sometimes when I get eliminated I uninstall the game and after some months install it again. But the game is not quite perfect. Sometimes in my gameplay the game lags or sometimes doesn't even start and there is no error in this phone because it's brand new so thats a problem that's why I give this game a ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

It's a very good and fun game but just 2 problems.there is no practice mode,like choosing the map and learning it better. And also there is no team mode, where you play with friends against other squads and the game has specifically team games where you are in the team where your friends are.

This game is fun to start of with but the ads get really infuriating especially when they spam them after you lose. Also once you get past 10 crowns (wins) the opponents become really difficult especially since the game is pay to win so people buy op emotes so it's nearly impossible to win.

This app/game is very fun, and I rate it a 5 star because the game is very well put together, and very complex; many maps, many skins, emotes, etc. But at the same time the UI and Controls are very easy to use. Thank you for this great game.

Yes we all know this is basically fall guys, but it's on mobile. That doesn't change the fact that this game is absolutely amazing in its graphics to it's enjoyment factor. Yes you never do great on spin the wheel, and yes this is heavily p2w sided, but it's still absolutely awesome and great to play. The only downside is that there's still lots of bots, it's p2w and weak WiFi = extrema lag and the lucky wheel is very unlucky. This is all fixable and hardly runis the game at all. -Scrimpy

It's a pretty fun game. But there are some mechanics that are so stupid it makes me want to delete it. Special emotes are the most unfair thing in the entire game. Someone can run by and punch me and I get left behind and end up losing because of it. Or someone hugs me and puts me over the edge so I fall. It's so unfair. Also whenever I'm in a party with a friend and we get a team game we are on different teams. FIX THAT. There is a whole list of maps that you can cheese to win. Fix the game.

This game pretends like it has a bunch of maps, but you'll be playing the exact same 2 - 3 trash maps over and over. The on screen controls are complete garbage; the joystick position will just reset while you're holding it.

The game is near perfect. The exit game button doesn't do anything, I must force close the game to get out. Update: game was fun and near perfect until I reached level 10. Now it got so difficult that I can't even pass the first round most of the times,I think that many people are cheating by using a modded apk that exists on the internet, shame.

It's a alright game, but the most difficult part I am finding is when I load into the game it shows me a loading screen and it proceeds that I have to login later and after a day I log back in and It brings me to the loading screen to do the same. I have no idea if it's a bug, but I kinda am getting kinda irritated about it.

Overall this game is very good, I'm a fan of it but we need some skill based matchmaking or somethin like that. Because after we play a little it becomes kinda hard to keep up. Also hexagon level is my favorite but it won't come very often. Rating 4.5/5

Fun game, reminds me of Total Wipeout but has a few issues... 1) Missing map, in some rounds parts of map don't spawn in, making current level unplayable. Modders/Network lag? used to be fun with good levels and fun gameplay, but i left because it became much too buggy, the maps arent fun any more, special emotes are way too op (like punch) and make the game pay to win. Great game, love how quickly you get into matches and just how snappy everything is. It's a good first run for sure. Perhaps before monetizing though actually flesh it out. The ridiculous nature of allowing certain emotes to knock other players around essentially gives an unfair advantage. Not truly a fair game and as soon as you get a few wins the game pairs your with hardcore pay to win players making it impossible and thus unplayable.

The only reason i put half a star is because I want the developers to notice this. You should add a practice mode where players can choose the map they want to play on with friends or alone. And you should remove team maps because they are annoying.

review_text: Everyone buys all levels in the premium pass and the punch other people with the emote. Plz make all the emotes available to all without paying for it. Everyone Show's off with the emotes. Otherwise the game is good but also add a feature in which people can vote which map to choose.

This game is honestly really great but the punching, skating and hugging emotes being only pay to win takes away from the experience big time, also there's still some bugs to be addressed such as falling through the floor randomly, otherwise it's a really fun game to play with friends being a fall guys copy

Well this is the copy of fall guys but free. Yeah and everyone likes fall guys yep for sure.so here's my feedback it is very good game and I like to rate it 4 star. The reason I'm giving a 4 out of 5 stars is that they need to make a Australian server and need to fix bugs when you go through the map. Any way great game keep up the good work :)

Exactly what I expected, clone of a mid game, but actually better. The game is really time killer... Its awesome.. But the problem is with the map.. The map is selected randomly.. Its ok.. But the usual map is being selected most of the times.. review_text: This game can't get worse. Every time I try to turn with my joystick it turns the tiniest bit when I go. It's not like some sensitivity setting because there isn't one. And now there's ads every round which is just insane. You have to press the jump button in the direct middle which is a big problem in a game like this. Make it better.

Overall this is a good game but I just wish you can customise the maps in the party mode or add an practice mode where you can practice a specific map. Also it would be great if you can't use any special emotes like the kicking, hugging, and punching in the final round since it gets really annoying that you came so far and lost because someone punch you

I like this game, being a fallguys player I know how to compare the two. It is great to play while out and about and I like the fact that it differs slightly from actual fallguys. One tiny thing is that when I try to watch an ad for a free spin, it says I need to give my consent for targeted ads. So I tap on the button, and *drum roll* nothing happens. I don't know if this is just a glitch for me but I'd like to see this fixed at some point. Great game though.

Stumble guys is a great version of fall guys and I think the game is really good. This game is a awful rip off of Fall Guys that is unnecessary since Fall Guys is now free. The physics are broken, dash once and you will never get back up. Did you touch one slightly bouncy object well your going to get pushed over and given no chance to get back up. Making one mistake in a later match basically means it's game over for you. The music is annoying and never changes and the level design is annoying. Don't bother playing this game. 2 stars

Very fun game and super addictive to play although there are some things that irritate me like the way you just fall through the map when your winning and when the guy doesn't want to stand up after the double jump... But overall it's one off my favorite games to play

I downloaded the game in both of my phones but for some reason it runs very slow in my Xiaomi mi 9 but in my Samsung note 5 which is an older device for runs very smooth and I think the Xiaomi have more power than the Samsung's one, correct me if I'm wrong overall it's a very fun game. I will give better score when I receive a reply from you guys.

This game looks fun on the surface but it's actually boring once you start playing. It's pretty straight forward that anyone with decent math skills can win, but that's not why it's so boring. It's the ads. There are so many ads you will spend more time watching them instead of playing the game. They pop up when starting a level, picking a weapon, finishing a level, building your castle, or just sitting idle in the castle screen. It's just obnoxious.

The game is straight forward enough. You get what you're looking for. But the ads, they are unrelenting. Every single level finishes with an add. Just finished an add to get to the next level and now you want to go back to the main menu, another add, sit idle for like 15 second at your castle thing, add time baby. I understand needing to make money off an app but this is a shameless, low effort shot for some add revenue.

This game sells "no ads" in the app, but then still forces ads on you the moment you open the game. And that doesn't take away all the ads to get power ups, bonus levels, and more. And it even tries to trick you into watching ads by making the "ad" symbol really really small. For a game that isn't that much fun to begin with, they put way too many ads in there.

A waste of time honestly. I felt like taking a bullet for others that might think of downloading this game and paid the dollar for no ads. It doesn't help enough to warrant the money. Most actions in the game take ads to earn, even for simple things. If you choose to play anyway, the ad-required weapons at the beginning of some levels aren't needed. If you have time to throw away then this is the game for you.

The Ads have ads in this game. Cheesy, cringe worthy. If you choose to watch an ad, you get an ad. If you choose not to watch an ad, you get an ad anyway. Definitely made for 14 year olds with 2 friends. Developer should just be ashamed of this complete lack of effort. The ONLY upside is the animations when two characters collide. Makes ya think of older YouTube clips. Everything else is lame. Especially when they included the girl Characters as 'sexy extras'. They clearly paid for 5* reviews.

This is NOT a game. This is an ad viewer app, with 15 second interactive breaks here and there. "OH, but the ads are how the developers get paid so the app is free." Ads between every round. If you don't click to start the next round, it will push another ad on you. Finish a level, it says, "Watch an ad for bonus coins, or take 100 coins." But if you click to take 100 coins, it STILL pushes an ad anyway. ZERO skill involved. Just attack an enemy with a lower score than you, guaranteed win.

This game would be eh if it would actually work properly, on top of that I couldn't report the issues due to the report screen quickly disappearing. It is so prone to crash I can't even load anything right, especially when you try to play an ad to get further, definitely stay away from ads if you want to play this game but, I would just stay away until they fix the crashing and report for bugs/crashing issue.

This game is garbage and all the positive reviews are bots. Which should tell you all you need to know about the devs. Before you even start the game, there's an ad. Then, if you take more than 5 seconds in the menu, there's another ad. And they're those irritating type of ads that don't just go away when you press x and take you to the play store if you even breathe on them. The gameplay is like a 30 second break from the ads. Horrible. Don't waste your time.

So 70% of this game is ads. I understand making money but there is an entire level that is just watching ads to progress. You like 7 ads in a row minimum to progress to the chance to actually do a level? If so highly recommended. To make this even better is the mission that is literally watch 7 ads and then wait to gather coins while getting ads every 7 seconds. This missing comes after the first like 5 regular levels. Also "Funny Huggy Wuggy Stick Enemy" with the same animations of regs.

Meh, this game is pointless around level 100, possibly way earlier then that. At level 100 you will have enough credits to max out two castles. That's without watching ads, playing with WiFi off. Now the real bs part is you have to watch 5 ads just to upgrade a castle and if you fully max out the first castle there is no reason to upgrade the second one, or any other castle. Playing with WiFi off is the way to go. None of the rewards from watching the ads in this is worth it.

Quite bad. The concept is good, but there's just ads after every turn. Sometimes when you're not even doing anything, an ad shows up. Sometimes you click an ad for an item and you don't even get the item. Just ads everywhere. Oh and the ads are very long. So bad, don't get it.

The developers also bought or added bots to get their stars like most games on top. 100% DONT recommend

Don't bother installing. When you start off you get an ad(a literal scam ad). When you get so far(3 levels) you get an ad. The game might have been moderately entertaining for a short while if there wasn't ads every 5 seconds. You can't do anything without another ad popping up. The game is so enjoyable and fun, but there are way to many adds! Every level had an add it was so bad. üëπ
I like the game, the puzzles you can try in the game. I know the ads are annoying sometimes, but I love the game! Thanks!
Best game ever.. If you play online, there have ads.. But if you play offline, if no have ads and everything is alright.. It's so fun to play! 5 star from me!‚ú®Ô∏è‚ú®Ô∏è‚ú®Ô∏è‚ú®Ô∏è‚ú®Ô∏è
Insane that there's ads after every level. Turning on airplane mode does stop them though.
You spend more time dealing with ads than you do actually playing the game. Don't download. Literally ads after every round.
A 30 second add after every single 10 second level. I get they gotta make money... but its excessive. not worth a download
I rate this a 4/5. I don't like one thing about the game and thats the fact that when you draw, it takes your stars away.
so basically here's how it's 4 stars: 1. Turn off wifi for no ads 2. A lot of levels 3. Not p2w 4: MEME FROG Other than this, the alot of ads üé∞ I think it's fine
Love the game except for annoying add every stage, pleqse make premium one so we can purchase without seeing the ads every single stage
Too many ads. Each stage will pop out 1/2. ads. Very annoying. Gonna delete the game. Sorry üòë
it's a really fun game but can you add more skins and maybe make the stars go down slower because on all of my stars it's 2 or 1 Stars only so please fix that ‚ù§Ô∏èü•∫
Genuinely fun game but an ad after every level is ridiculous. Uninstalled after 10 minutes.
There is way to many ads its ridiculous I spend more time watching ads the playing the levels it's so stupid.
Too many ads, and there's no purchasing for no ads version... are you kidding me? do we have to suffer every stages just to watch ads?
I have fun with this game, but the Ads is really massive, every done level, the ads will pop up. Ok you looking for money, but i am not enjoying enough. Thanks. uninstalled the App

Terribly made, my lines get replaced with laggy stacks of lines, making me watch the dog die in slow motion, bees can go through walls, lines, just a terrible game overall, especially with all the unskippable ads, and ads after every stage.

WAYYY too many adds..I mean maybe every 3-5 stages I wouldn't mind but this is every stage! ans it's so annoying I literally can't get myself to play because of it. And also it's so hard cuz the bees can get through the lines and literally lift them off of the dog EVEN IF HES IN THEM. like what??
This game is extremely addicting and very entertaining and not time wasting. But the problem is that it has to many ads but i still like this game because its super addicting.
the game is addictive, but TOO MANY ADS AND THAT'S SO ANNOYING!!!! like why you put ads on every single stages, that's way too much.

A Bad joke, first level solved after 3 seconds. After directly 30 seconds advertisement, when I wanted to cancel advertisement got forwarded to play store. 3 seconds game time 60 seconds advertisement. Stands in relation.
Too many ads! Spent more time on ads than on the actual game. I uninstalled it after getting annoyed by all the ads
It have to much ads some how it's fun but timer is also to fast when I draw a line the timer stops and the bee ºs come fix this bug I hate it if not I will delete this game!
It's a fun game. I just wish there wasn't an ad after every single level u complete. U have as much ad time as game time

This would be a great game if they're weren't a 30 second ad between every single level. A couple of ads every few levels is more than enough thank you. For this reason I'm uninstalling. Man, I get you have to make a dollar but every level it's do you want to buy this? Or pay extra for that? Pay this and double your reward? And here, you're going to watch TV commercials regardless. Forget it. I've got way better games without the hassle and they're "free" as well.

These levels are so boring. I kept going, thinking they would get harder. I'm around twenty-five levels in, and the last one I played aa literally impossible to lose. Any order of pins would have been successful. When I finished, I saw an interesting looking level pop up,and I momentarily pleased - until i realized it was an ad. Speaking of which, the ad at the end of each level takes longer than the level did.

Got to level 1200. Not sure how I've put up with the game this long aside from challenging myself to do the levels while saving extra pins. I have over $5M coins, and nothing to spend them on. Game needs some tweaks to keep high level people interested. I have all puzzle pieces except for the museum pieces, which are excessively difficult to obtain. I have contacted support, and have gotten ZERO response. Sucks when you pay for "ad-free", and they just don't care about their customers. BOO!! :(

First, the game is way too easy. Second, there are WAY too many ads. Third, most of the ads are EXTREMELY long. Forth, most of the ads, when you click the X at the end, it's supposed to go back to the game (like most ads/games do), but most of these ads completely ignore that and just take you to whatever it's advertising. Uninstalled the game.

Don't bother paying to have ads removed, it's a scam! Very few ads get removed, so there is still a ton of waiting for the ads to play out. Overall, it's an OK game to play, very simple and easy for the most part. Some of the boss/challenges can be a little tricky, but still fairly easy overall. I just hate all the constant ads and then paying to remove them to still have 90%, WTH?

It's overly easy and after about the 500th level it's boring. The challenge levels are far more intriguing but are EXTREMELY slow in getting to open. I'm sitting on over 2M "coins" with nothing to spend them on. Whatever the "house" section is, it's just as slow and I'm maxed on that waiting to level up on the extremely boring and repetitive easy levels. Plus the amount of ads they play with no way to turn them off, even for pay, is astronomical. I'd rather play the challenges with my coins.

I have 2 games from the same publisher and they are both a waste of time!! You can only get so far, build your skyscrapers and you get to a point to where you can go no further!! I have over $25 Mil in coins in one game and $15 Mil in the other but I cannot do anything but collect useless coins!! Unless you put out a complete game don't send out a partial game!! Would NOT RECOMMEND!!!!

It was a fun game. Then as always death by a thousand ads. Ads after every level is excessive. Its understandable that money needs to be made but with the rounds lasting only a few seconds it seems that you spend longer waiting for the ad to allow you to skip than you do actually playing the game.

Could have been a good idea except the programmers chose to create an advertising nightmare where you get to play the occasional level between ridiculous amounts of ads. Even when you choose not to watch an ad for whatever bonus, you guessed it, you have to watch an ad. Get a clue guys, pull all the ads and you might have a decent game.

Ads, ads, ads! I understand & appreciate that developers need to get paid; that's why there's ads on free apps. But, Dang! The puzzles started simply & progressed in difficulty slowly. The ads for other games locked you into watching (waiting) several minutes to resume the game. I was enjoying it but eventually just couldn't abide / endure the ads.

A lot of the other reviews on here have mentioned the ads being too numerous and annoying and repetitive. To those complaints I would like to add that it seems like every four or five ads you get one that is deliberately put on a canvas that exceeds the edges of the screen and you can't close them! I don't even find the number of ads or the over abundance of them nearly as annoying as the fact that some of them will just stay on the screen and not let you close them without exiting the app.

While it is a simple puzzle game good for killing time, the challenge is lacking. At level 100+ I find no increase in difficulty, so I am already bored. Sorry. Update: I broke down and paid the $3.49 for an ads-free game and it still requires ads for the same things it required them for before purchase! WTH Then, after watching the ad, it doesn't return to the game! I have to reopen it! Why? Shouldn't require ads at all! I paid to be ad- free!

Too many ads. If you are into spending more time watching ads than playing a game this is for you. Basically after 2 fast levels you get an ad. And not the easy to skip ads either. You have to watch for a moment then press the arrows. Then it pops up an x after like 5 seconds... then after you press that one you get the imbecilic "get" option. On occasion it actually pops up again immediately after pressing the x yet again.

It just keeps crashing. Mostly on the boss rounds, but it's really annoying to get halfway through a boss puzzle and it freezes up or just flat out closes. And there's no way to get back to the boss level when you restart the game. I even paid for it to get rid of the ads and I feel like I wasted my money. It's unfortunate because I was enjoying the puzzles.

Boring! It doesn't get difficult until around level 200+. I'm at 308 and now its glitching. I've tried skipping puzzles but it always says 56% done with no pins left to pull. I've tried 6 different games all not able to finish even with no pins left to pull and all balls in the container. I didn't see any fall out which I don't know how to prevent anyway. It was ok for a while but I'm done.

This is a puzzle game. The rise in difficulty plateaus really quickly. Also, the game seems to be an excuse for ads for additional games. Frustrating, but the game is useful when other entertainment isn't quite stimulating enough. However there are some bugs. Most notably, puzzle 813 has a glitch that fails the player automatically and I can't get around it. I can't resume additional puzzles or challenges at all. I'm stuck. PLEASE HELP! I'm on a Samsung S22 Ultra.
app_developer_reply:
Please make sure to check the Play Store for the update version 1.30. This latest update should solve the issue of the failing levels.
We are sorry for the inconvenience.

review_text: Two things: First, I'm on level 51 and it is still way to easy. I keep thinking it will get harder, but it doesn't. Second, there is way more ad time than game time. This game may have the most ads I've ever experienced with a game. Most of them have 3 clicks required with wait times between each one and most of them are games I already have. How many times to I have to sit thru a Wordle ad (which I have been playing for a year) on one level of the game? I can't take it. Uninstalling.

I love this game - and the reason it got only 4 stars is because while the main levels are super fun and addictive, they are rather simplistic - but the boss levels in comparison are really difficult and the number of moves is limited also. With some effort and practice you can beat them though! Also, I strongly object to being offered a 'gift' - but I have to watch an ad first!! Having to watch an ad is NOT a gift!! ;-) Some gifts are given freely, but I will not watch an ad for a 'gift'!!

Fun game, but too many ads which make it insufferable. Also, the ads don't have a close button and just hang on the screen for about a minute. Furthermore, one of the stages I could not figure out. I finally asked for a "hint" which played an ad. Afterwards the hint showed me exactly what I was doing the entire time, which wouldn't you guess, actually worked this time. So essentially they intentionally make you fail the level until you watch an ad. All in all, this is an ad, not a game.
app_developer_reply:
Hello Ryan,

Can you please write to support@popcore.con and explain what happened with the hint? I'm sure the team would like to know more and investigate this behaviour. Thanks for your collaboration!

review_text: Edit* Fortunately, the issue was fixed. I really enjoy this game, but there's a really bad bug that prevents the player from being able to preceed. It gives and automatic fail and has been ongoing for about 2 or 3 day. There's no option go report an issue and the auto fail bug appears on every screen, be it a new level, switching the balls, dailies, and other options. An update on a fix would be greatly appreciated.

This could be an enjoyable little game to play for a bit to pass the time, but it is overrun with ads. You can get through most lvls in ten seconds or less, and there is an ad between every lvl. I have absolutely no problems with ads in a free game, but it's just too much. Edited to one star. I paid to remove the ads and there are still ads everywhere! Need to replay a level? Watch this ad! Spin the wheel for a "free" prize? Yep, watch this ad! Never seen such a blatant lie about removing ads.

2 star because the game is entertaining, but only while you actually get to play it. The number of ads is just unreasonable. You spend 3x as much time watching ads as you do playing. And it's no ads to gain rewards or bonuses, either, these are just between levels ads, and only sometimes skippable. If you make a mistake on the challenge levels you can wind up watching literally minutes worth of ads just to restart. It's just not worth it.

Terrible developer. All of their games have the same problem. They all have a ridiculous amount of ads. You play a 5 to 10 second round, then it gives you the option to watch an ad for a bonus. If you click to skip the ad for the bonus, you get rewarded with a 1 or 2 minute ad and don't get any bonus. Most of the ads are extremely spamming, and force you to "exit" them multiple times. Don't waste your time with this game.

Have had this game for two days, and many levels later all I can say is ADS. The only things remotely challenging or interesting about the game are the boss levels and getting coins to build houses, that then just get you more coins without any other purpose. Every transaction or "win" has an ad attached to it that you have to click through. Thoroughly disappointing and am uninstalling.

Fun, mindless game, including most challenge levels. For some reason I don't get puzzle pieces anymore. Can't complete Museum Weekend. No real reward for doing that, but I like to obtain all the stuff. Also, I don't get the point of buying property to upgrade. Idle coins? I have over 6M coins! Boring. I liked winning puzzle pieces and new skins. Give me extra stuff for completion of levels with moves remaining. On Boss levels pull pins at the bottom before it scrolls up. Often helps!

Aside from being just plain out boring, after every 2 rounds you get ads that cover the screen so much they're out of format with your screen as well. You'll find more than half of these popups either making you close out the app and restarting it to continue, or installing whatever garbage it forces you to wait up to 1 minute in some cases to continue. It's really just not worth it for a game that is just so plain. After all though, it is a free mobile game. Fits the brand really well.

Fun game to play and it definitely occupies your time but the levels are very repeatative. Also the Biggest Problem of all is the non stop Ads. I even wasted the $4 to go Ad Free but all that did was stop the ads from popping up in the middle of a level, that's it!!! That's a bunch of horse üí©. There are still ads every time you blink your eyes. Need an upgrade, watch an ad. Wanna open your prize box, gotta watch an ad. It just Ruins the game and the work that was put into creating it. üëéüëé

Does anyone else have a problem with "not responding"? Seems like every 2-3 minutes it's not responding. Not to mention an ad after every single game. I'm starting to believe it's intentional on the developer for the not responding, because all your progress is lost and once you restart it, that's exactly what you're doing. It has potential but with the intentional sabotage from the developer it's more irritating than fun. Greed can destroy a good company with potential of progressing.

Time Waster Scam. Ads!!! So many ads that pop up every 4-5 turns. Each ad last 30 seconds or longer when 2 ads would play in a row. It became so annoying that I paid the $4 to remove them & why I call it a Scam. Paying Did Not Remove the ads at all! Made it to level 101 because that's the longest I could stand the ads. Levels were super easy, took 5-10 secs to solve then became repetitive & boring quickly. The "Boss Levels" that popped up every 6-8 turns were the only "challenging" levels.

So I actually like the easiness of this game it makes it more relaxing But... it all comes down to the ads. Its not the ads themselves, its the fact that when I try to get a reward with the ads half of the time I loose the reward because the ad ends before I can claim also its extremely annoying when the game just decides that I can't watch a ad to claim a prize then the whole game itself shuts down. Very Disappointing.
