I got all the way to level 1200 with more than 200,000 coins and many accomplishments. Today a level came up that didn't even allow me to start playing before it said level failed. I retried many times with the same result. Finally I uninstalled and reinstalled the app, but I lost everything and had to start over at level 1. Totally disappointing and frustrating!
app_developer_reply:
Please make sure to check the Play Store for the update version 1.30. This latest update should solve the issue of the failing levels.
We are sorry for the inconvenience.

review_text: I'm used to ads with these companies, but dang! So you get an ad somewhere around 1 after every level after level 8. They are 15 seconds. Then, for challenge levels, you have at minimum 30 seconds, and more often I had, a full minute: JUST TO REPLAY THE LEVEL. So you sit there spending more time on the ad than the game! And so if you didn't feel the pressure to buy the No Ads, they really put it on you here. Very bad way to go about this. Forcing people basically. Good game, hate the company

I have been playing this app for a while now and just got bored. I have unlocked all the customization options, have built all houses possible, and have completed all puzzles. I have alot of coin and nothing to spend it on. The basic puzzles are too easy and the more challenging puzzles are harder but too touchy. The last update helped the game but it was a little late to help me.

Whatever the update did today, it's now causing an automatic fail on the level you're on. My daughter has the same game and loves it also. We're having the same issue on different levels and, based on the most recent reviews, it's happening to almost everyone else too. I paid for ad free for both of us. If it's not fixed soon, I'll request my money back and uninstall the game.

I can understand an occasional ad, but I can't get past two quick rounds of one puzzle each before I get another long game ad, longer than the game playing itself. I am dumping this game. It's too bad I could never get past the ads to enjoy it. Trying to exit a completed ad is darn near impossible too. üò°

ALMOST addictive! Trying to figure out the strategy on some of these games almost makes this addicting, however the ads after every other board are frustrating and make it painful. You cannot mute them and it takes 4 delayed clicks to get out of the ads and back to the game. Also, I started playing for the board that was shown in the advertisement. I am on a level in the 90s and have not come close to something that looks like the ad.

It's easy to play. I like the Boss puzzles and the more challenging ones in one of the categories. I seem to be playing many of the same puzzles multiple times. I upgraded and have new puzzles, but still see repetitive puzzles. I have over 400k in coins, but don't know what to do with them. 7/19/22 I now have over 1mm points, still playing the same puzzles over and over. Boss level 176 has a glitch in it in the middle of the game.

Good concept for a puzzle game. I like it. I get that you need to monetize it, and I was considering paying for no ads, but I'm worried I'll still have to sit through them. I'm 30 minutes in, and about 6 minutes were spent playing. The other 24 minutes have been ads. Very concerned a mere $4 will significantly cut down the number of them

I would have rated it much higher if it were based just on the game play. Easy at the beginning but definitely gets you thinking later in the game. But oh man, the ads!!! I understand it's their revenue stream but minutes long ads every couple of levels is too much. I can't play it anymore.

Honestly, I only played about 20 levels but I wasn't a fan of it. I know there's more game to play but the challenge was minimal even for the beginning of a game. Also, the ads are way too much. I know it's free but to get a 15 second ad every two games that take a total of 1 minute to complete is just too much.

The game will intentionally glitch/drop a ball so you have to watch an ad to re-try a level. You'll be bombarded with ads, even if you pay to "remove" them (just reduces ads, doesn't remove them). The normal levels have 0 challenge to them, the only thing that's fun is the challenge levels. Also the in-game currency is useless. I have over 1.5 million coins and literally NOTHING I can do with them. This game is a scam, do not pay for ad removal because you'll still get ads forced onto you.

The game is fun, and has many skins which makes me wanna collect them. But, not 4 or 5 because 1. Ads 2. They added some restraunt which is laggy, and won't let me out of it. 3. Sometimes I watch the ad for the prize and don't get it, also, I work up to the present, üòÜ, but don't get it D: , because I need to watch an AD. 4. Because one of the boss levels I had open a hatch to mack the bombüí£ go out so it wouldn't explode the balls, and the balls went out which made me loose. Please fix.

When you get to the higher levels, they cheat on the boss levels. You drop all the stars in the basket, but they still say you only dropped 95 %. Are there hidden stars somewhere? Do-overs require you to watch the ads, and you still can't win. I don't like puzzles with no solution. Guess I'll try different game.

Fun game, but needs some bugs fixed. On the boss levels sometimes the balls will bounce out the side, due to the way the walls are made, no way to prevent it. Also sometimes the balls and the bombs get stuck on top of some of the places they are supposed to roll off of. Please fix these bugs, them the game will be great.

For the simple minded to think they are figuring out hard puzzles. This is too easy, then there are the ADs..... Out of control with the ads. Entirely made, imo, trying to push as many ads as is feasible in the first few levels before new people uninstall as I am. Though I am sure addict minds waste their lives on things like this, so good for you. To developers: Bet you would make more $ if you didn't push this 10x more than is expected.

I'm enjoying the game. For the most part it is excellent despite the annoying advertisements. Only one adjustment I would like to see. In the boss challenges the pot doesn't fill up to 100% when it obviously should, even when you try it again successfully üòâ.

This game is ok. Not great, just ok. Taking off a star because the puzzles are ridiculously simple and keep repeating ad nauseum; I got tired of it after about five days. Also taking off a star because there's a sort of glitch that sometimes tells you that you lost even when all the balls go in the bucket. You can do the game the exact same way the next time and win. That being said, some of the animations are pretty and a couple of the backgrounds aren't bad.

Boring and Broken This game challenges me to the "Boss Level" challenge every now and then. I have to pay 350 coins to try it. I keep trying but the game frequently freezes at the very end of the challenge or simply tells me i failed when I clearly have not failed and am about to win. OR almost worse, it just freezes. But the game is semi-fun. Once you figure it out, it's almost impossible not to win (the normal games, not the Boss Levels). But it's visually attractive.
app_developer_reply:
Hello

Sorry to hear about the issue you encountered.
The team is aware and currently investigating, we hope to solve it as soon as possible.
Thanks for your collaboration and understanding!

review_text: Forgot I had this 2 years ago. It's extremely easy to play. Major issue is it's constant adds at the bottom of the screen and adds after almost every single level. Adds to open almost everything offered as in game prizes. So if you enjoy add laden games this one is for you.

It started out too easy, got better. Then what made its rating go so bad was several times the boss level said I failed when I still had moves at the end. I had all the balls, but I still failed. I think the only fail is I didn't watch enough ads to make it a win! Sorry, I made you enough money, uninstalled out of fairness to the honest games out there!

Ads ads ADS!!!! This game is so fun and I understand that the developers have to make to a living through the revenue from the ads but gosh! And ad after every other level and I have to click the "x" button 4 to 5 times to close one ad while half the time "missing the x button" and now having to close the play store AND I have to watch the same 5 ads 50 million times? It's enough to drive someone insane....

All of a sudden the challenges went away , that's the best part of the game. I can beat the levels and boss levels very easily. I liked the challenges but now I only see challenges 1 and 2. I've completed all the levels on both. There were a lot more to be unlocked but I don't even see them anymore.

Extremely annoying with all the commercials. I understand that you have to watch some of you want to play for free, but out of 10 min on the app, you only play for one minute and watch commercials for the remaining nine. Not even challenging, now on level 70+ and they are as easy as level 1.

Worst commercial ever! This game would be simple for a toddler but they would have abandoned it earlier. You beat a simple level they make you watch a commercial. You win prizes by completing levels. You have to watch a commercial for your prize and one for completing the level. Often times the video will take you away from the game & you do not get your prize and have to redo the level you just beat. Sure you could buy the no ads version but no I would rather do my own dental & uninstall.

Super fun game but same commercials over and over. I wouldn't mind them but they are way too long. I love playing the game, it's great just spend 2/3 of the time watching ads. Sorry, just being honest. If you could cut down the time on each ad then I'd play more often as it's one of my favorite apps!! Please consider üôè

Fun for the most part, but when you get to a "Boss Level" game, you can only see about the top third of the puzzle that you're working on. When you come across a bomb or bombs, you can't determine which pins to pull to safely detonate it (them) because you can't see the rest of the puzzle. The "Boss Level" games pretty much cannot be solved. You can try again as many times as you want as long as you are willing to watch a 30 second ad for another game......

Too many ads. Too many ads in which you have to X out 3 or 4 times before it gets the hint. I am on level 3413. At about level 1000 I realized there's nothing new to obtain or challenge. I've done it all. I have 21 million coins, with nothing to do. Too many push notifications. I get 10 or more a day. The only reason I keep playing is because I need something mindless to do for various reasons. It was great at first, but it's run its course to fast and not worth the ads.

Full of ads to the point of being unplayable, more than that the levels are predictable and easy, and it never gets to be a challenge. Not unless you count the in game physics losing track of a gem and failing your game; at which point you can watch an ad or go back 5 levels. I'm uninstalling, honestly.

I JUST added this app. It seems to be a fun, challenging game (what I've been able to play.) But I have NEVER encountered so many ads. Win-ad, Lose-ad, Questions-ad, Reward-(you guessed it.) I'm taking it down now. Play 20 seconds and watch a 30 second AD! Also, some instructions would be nice. Good luck with this.

An ok time waster! A lot of repetition in the levels unfortunately. A lot of pointless side games also! Make sure you are using an ad blocker on your internet and you don't have to worry about being overwhelmed with ads. Good luck enjoying this game without some sort of block. It is absolutely horrible the number of advertisements they dump on you!

I would've given this game five stars if it weren't for the ridiculous amount of ads it has! It gets to the point where it's just downright annoying and sometimes that's I stop playing for a while. If you win a prize, you have to watch an ad to claim it. If you want an extra puzzle piece, you have to watch an ad to get it. If you want to replay a level, you have to watch an ad to do so, etc. It's beyond annoying and I'm actually being generous by giving this app three stars!

I got to level 1200 and the game tells me I failed . I hit retry and it goes back to failed. I have gone back and forth at least 100 times and the game won't move on. I had almost 10 million coins, all the properties possible, and was almost to the 200 challenge. Too bad I have to Uninstall it!!
app_developer_reply:
Hello

Sorry to hear about the issue you encountered.
The team is aware and currently investigating, we hope to solve it as soon as possible.
Thanks for your collaboration and understanding!

review_text: It's an ok game. Bonuses are repetitive. I'm also frustrated when it comes to the challenges. There's a few levels that I can't complete due to them being frozen or something. I've tried multiple times. Lastly, like everyone says there a LOT of ads.

More ads than any other game I've ever played. The sad part is the ads are often broken links. Requires you to watch a video nearly every other level PLUS there are on screen ads in the game. Was not interested in the silly side games..The realtor can keep there house and I don't care how fast some other person did the game...I just want to play the puzzles.

I like playing the Challenges. However, there's so many in there that the pins don't pull, so it says I failed the level. I didn't, the game is failing me. Not being able to play the game because of glitches, annoys me. The biggest annoyance I've ever dealt with and never had in a game before, instead of showing me an ad, it says "no ads, check your internet connection". There's nothing wrong with my internet connection. Fix this, please, before I give up and uninstall.

Paying the 3 or 4 dollar fee for the game eliminates most ads (unless you want something extra) which is well worth it considering all the aggravation and time wasting you can avoid. Oddly enough, I seem to be stuck on level 215 with no way to get past it. The hints that are offered result in failing the level every time!

Annoying. It keeps having adds pop up and fine I'll watch an add as it is a free game... What I find annoying is that it won't let you exit out and resume playing after watching add... It instead takes you to install said app that was the add. You back out instead of downloading the app and it keeps playing same add and it's just a vicious cycle. Uninstalling. No thanks. Game isn't good enough for the hassle!

It's kind of fun, however the ads immediately after each play are insane! Every single short story you make, less than 30 seconds, immediately an ad that lasts at least 30 seconds. It's too much for a free game. I know it's to get you to "pay", it's just not worth it. It's a shame. No wonder I am always #1. I don't think anyone else plays. Probably because of all the ads!

Thought I'd enjoy this game. Then the ads got annoying after the first 1¬Ω mins of playing. THEN the tiktok ads wouldn't stop, wouldn't let me continue with the game, kept having to shut the game off. So in less than 5 mins I have tried to play and now I am writing this review. I don't care if they fix the bug. Not playing this again.

So many ads make the game not worth playing. The game itself is overly simplistic that it feels like there should be more to it and I just misunderstood the virtually nonexistent instructions. Feels like a game for 6 - 10 year olds. Maybe it gets more difficult as it goes, but you can't get anywhere past the numerous ads that you cannot even skip through. Like I said, not worth it. There's a million other games out there. Don't bother with this one.

At the upper levels, some screens are unsolvable. Even the Hint button gives a solution that fails the level and then you get stuck and can go no further. The last time it did this, I had to uninstall the game and reinstall it to move on. Its very frustrating. I sent an email to the developer, but I have not had a response. And I actually paid for the game.

2-second puzzles with 30 second ads between every single puzzle. The game is not playable. You can bypass this problem in airplane mode, but then you find out the game is utterly brainless. It never gets any harder even after 150 levels.

Edit: the game breaks at lvl 1184. You auto fail before even pulling a single pin. This is a free to play game and it shows. The graphics are basic and there are ads. I'm not mad that they have ads, it's how they make money cuz no one is paying for this game. I'm mad because the ads don't play right lime they don't fit my screen. I can't hit the X button to close the app cuz it's off screen. I have to close the whole game and redo the stage. That's my biggest complaint.

I was enjoying this game till something went wrong in the programming. It is stuck on a level, it automatically fails you before that level even loads. No way to bypass and go to the next level. Guess I will have to dump the game if they can't fix it. I would have given it 5 stars but sense it is not playable...

Love the game, It's brain food but my goodness ads galore and no way to rid of them. It is annoying to have one automatically every two levels and when you earn a reward. I earned it.. Why do i have to watch an ad to get my reward? Id give it 4 stars and recomend the game to people as easily distracted as i am but the ads arent fun.

Thank you!!! ***************************************** I like the game but it broke sometime around 7/4/22...just after the last update. You can't skip the level because it fails before you have a chance to do so. It was really cool before that. I had gotten quite a few points and unless it's fixed it was a waste of time. I hope it is fixed. (I'm using a Samsung A50.)

Everything has gone very well until I reached level 213. As far as I can tell, this level is simply impossible to play. Even after watching an advertisement to receive a hint, and following the hint, it's still impossible. No matter what you do, the 2 bombs drop to the bottom and blow up, destroying the bowl. I have not needed a single hint until this level, and have not skipped a single level, however the only way around level 213 I'm afraid is to watch an advertisement and skip.

I actually enjoy this game but the overload of ads is crazy. I think I've watched more ads than I've played actual puzzles. Also, the game tends to freeze randomly or doesn't allow me to close out ads. I don't want to uninstall the app but I feel as though nothing will change.

The game is fun, even my 4 year old likes it. However, the "boss" levels are literally impossible. The bomb will get stuck, they will not give you enough moves to pull the pins or the pin you need to pull is literally on top of a pin that will make you lose. Also, there's a whole other part of the game that they don't explain. I found it on accident because the hub at the top was annoying me and I pressed it: you apparently get to build buildings too ü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

It's an awesome game. But it is constantly freezing when I play the bonus rounds that I paid coins for and slows down during regular play. I've reset game several times. At first it runs fast and smooth. Too many ads so quickly. Otherwise I would have e given a 5 star review

Fairly straightforward game. Pull the correct pins and get the items into a pot. Issue is that the pins sometimes are very close to each other and end up pulling the wrong one. MAIN issue is the pot is too far and the items spill out and you fail. There's zero control over spillage, and have to watch ads for replay, weird right? Good for a 15-20 minute escape from reality to relax the mind. At times balls get stuck in odd places so you'll fail and have to watch an add to try again, also weird...

Fun but way too many ads. I paid for"no ads" but still have to wait through them at every turn. In addition, it freezes often. In the puzzles that are longer than the screen, there is no scrolling to see what's coming. The "rewards" one gets for successfully passing levels are pointless. For example, you can get a puzzle piece, but it changes the puzzle sort of randomly. There is no clear way to navigate through the various levels. It's too bad because some of the levels are challenging and fun.

This game is fun and all, but seems to ultimately have no point. The levels do not seem to increase in difficulty at all, and you end up with tens/hundreds of thousands of gold, but nothing to really spend it on. Too many levels required between new parts of the building aspect. Certain things say completing puzzles will unlock them, but all I ever get for finishing the puzzles is 300 gold. And way too many ads for what this game ultimately is.

If you want a good puzzle game for Android, go play "Okay?" instead. The level design of Pull the Pin is just abhorrently bad. There are a couple of stages that have a challenge to them, but so many levels are the exact same noob garbage repeated over and over. There's no mental stimulation or problem solving involved a lot of the time, it's just boring and uninspired. And to make matters worse, the ad provider is way too aggressive with trying to get you to click on pop-ups.

Boringly, stupidly, easy. Looking for a mildly challenging game to pass the time and give you a small bump of accomplishment? Do NOT download this game. So easy it's dumb. If you want lots of ads that are designed to make you accidentally click them when you're trying to skip or end them, and "puzzles" that are difficult to get wrong and only require near-thoughtless tapping on the screen, then go for this game.

This is a fun game so far but I wish I was able to enjoy it fully. I spend more time trying to close ads, or having to restart the app than actually playing the game. I don't mind a commercial here and there but I don't need one after every level played in addition to all the extra stuff. Some ads have the x or >> to close pass the ads but it automatically take you to Google store to download instead of closing and returning me back to the game. There are definitely some improvements needed.

This is a good game to pass the time. The challenges are complete bogus though, which is a big bummer. I've had to get 100% (doing the SAME THING twice in a row, AFTER having to watch an add) at LEAST two times in order to pass each one. It seems like a simple fix, but it's really agitating. Please change this?

It is a fun game that requires little skill to play, it has lot's of ad's, but that's normal for a free game. When doing challenges and boss levels, you can't scroll up and down which makes it rather annoying on specific ones. Also, on some of the boss levels, 1 or 2 of the small balls would get stuck, making you fail when you pulled the correct pins.

Sooooo ad heavy. You spend more time on ads than you do playing. Seriously, I bet the ad/play ratio is around 65%/35%. And the build houses thing is a little confusing. Other than that...I'll give a couple stars for amusing game play. I made it as far as level 29 before getting so frustrated with the constant barrage of ads that run longer than my game play that I un-installed. At that point the games were still not very challenging.

Great at first, but now every 1-3 levels I get an ad that won't close out unless I restart the game and do the level over. Sometimes, I get stuck on a level for hours, not because I suck, but because the ads won't quit. Look, I get it, you need your money. But for the love of God, please fix the ads at least. They make your game nigh unplayable.

The game is stupid easy. A little common sense and you'll pass first try. The ads are over the top. Finish a level, "Want to watch an ad for a bonus?" NO. "OK. Here's an ad." Play 15 seconds, watch 45 seconds of ads. Boss Level? "Here, a puzzle several screens long, we're not going to show you enough of it to be able to get through without watching a bunch of ads." Zero challenge, overabundance of ads, and a bunch of side stuff that has no relation to anything. Don't waste your time.

I'm at the point where museum puzzle pieces awarded. Whenever I complete the level and am to receive a puzzle piece, it is the same one. The puzzle doesn't get completed. This is very frustrating üò§, it's been going on for way too long. Please do something to get me unstuck. 4-13-22 Now the game won't allow me to receive any bonuses. It claims that I don‚Äôt have internet access when I have plenty. Doggone it!!! Fix this issue üòí I have advanced too far to quit, but I will, and delete it. üò†

Pretty simple except for boss levels which I can never seem to complete. Lots of ads of course. I think it's impossible to find a game without invasive ads and I refuse to pay to remove them. Don't understand why there's a town/city building feature incorporated, makes no sense. Still, a decent casual game to waste time on.

I would never recommend this game. The ads are a nightmare. Sat through 5 minutes of ads after failing a boss level. Not enough moves to pass the level. Too many bombs. Several times the game went to an ad during a level while I was playing. This game could have been good but the makers need to work out the kinks.

The game is fun. But it's also riddled with ads. Especially the boss levels which is where the real challenge is. The boss levels are also where the game likes to cheat. You only get one try on the boss level, fail and you have to watch an ad to get another try. Problem is I've had more than a few instances where I'll have it in the bag and the game decides I don't get to win so Itll spit a ball or two out before all em can be collected and I'm failed even though I did everything right.

Easy, boring, and ads constantly. There is occasionally a boss level that provides a little bit of challenge but that's it - mindless otherwise. And you spend much more time on ads than playing. Ads are fine, it's a free game after all, but imagine watching a TV show and there's a 3 minute ad for every 1 minute of actual show.

Edit to add: Quit playing this game for 5 weeks, just came back to see if it was better - its NOT!! I love the "idea" of this game. But the ads glitch ALL THE TIME! And when you do the challenge levels some of them are rigged so there is NO WAY to win! You can't control your screen, it scrolls by itself as you play, but then some of them just stop scrolling! You can't see the pins, the only pins available to see are ones that shouldn't be pulled! I can't stand games that cheat or are defective!!

Describes itself as "relaxing" but spoilt by the constant bombardment of adverts, many of which are more challenging to "close" than the puzzles are to solve. Also somehow took me to a dodgy "survey" site with misleading statements and false pretences. Edit: tried again turning off data. A lot better but still a constant hard sell of "view an ad to do/get this". I've now completed everything I can without doing so.

This game really frustrates me. It doesn't matter how many times I play most challenge levels, it says I've failed the level, even though I don't run out of moves. I replay, making sure there are no balls missing, and ensuring all the balls fall into the container, but when it gets to 99%, it comes up as failed before the last ball falls in. I can't see any point in playing anymore.

This would be a great game if it weren't for the insane number of ads! Half the time the ad doesn't give you the option to close it once the required time is up and so you have to close and reopen the game. Billed as a relaxing game but any concept of relaxation is lost with the frustration of all the ads. Sadly un- installing this.

Ads do require patience. I think the mini-games don't really add value, and the boss levels are a bit buggy, not really BOSS in terms of hardenss, and is probably better placed at intervals in the main game. The main game is very simple and easy, so if you just want to WHILE TIME AWAY then just ignore all the other features and disconnect from wi-fi and data (it helps reduce ads, too).

Love game play but the boss levels are impossible, I get to the bottom, no bombs or anything around only 1 pon to pull and it says fail....very frustrating. I actually prefer boss levels as others are to easy. I actually spent money on no adds but to get a gift you have to watch ads, even after paying $5.99!!!

Was fine to play but now suddenly a glitch in the game has made it unplayable. If it isn't fixed in the next day or so I will just have to delete the app. AS the newest level is loading, it INSTANTLY stops and says level failed, but in reality the level itself hasn't fully loaded and you haven't had the opportunity to do anything yet. It goes from new level to failed immediately. No way of getting passed this 1 level and no way of stopping it, the game is in a glitch cycle.

Was fun for a while, but having to sit through ads to collect items you've won gets extremely annoying. That's after paying to remove most ads too. Also, if you manage to plow through and get to level 813 you'll be met with a major glitch in the level which causes you to automatically "fail" within 2 seconds. No chance to actually play the level, or even skip it. As soon as you press the retry button, some of they grey balls turn into dust immediately. Would give 0/5 stars if possible

In order to stop the ads you have to pay, but even then you have to watch a 30 second ad every time you upgrade an area AND open a gift and restart a level! I paid for the ads to be removed completely, total scam! Apart from upgrading the houses there is nothing else to spend your winnings on and that is absolutely boring to say the least. Its totally repetitive. GET RID OF ADS WHEN PAID TO DO SO! Level 1209 automatically fails as soon as you start it. You can't prevent it. FIX IT! Lost a star!

If you want to play a game full of ads with the odd puzzle in between then this is for you! You have to watch three ads after every puzzle. Some of the ads go on for ages and some of them do not display an 'x' which forces you to either open whatever it is its advertising or quit the game and restart. Pity because it's not a bad game but adverts make it unbearable.

This game is fun, challenging and engaging. But! several of the ads run for longer than 30secs. No indication of when they will stop so I resorted to leaving and re-entering the game. I purchased the ad-free version, definitely worth it, but (again) the 3D matching ad seems unending when doubling rewards.

The game is good and all, its pretty fun. Until level 177, its just unplayable! When you spawn in the level it immediately ends because the gray balls are too close to the goal point. Overall its good, just... maybe fix stuff like this? (By the way, there are bugs in some levels when the balls either get stuck, or just sometimes stay in a corner. This is really annoying in challenges and boss levels.)
app_developer_reply:
Please make sure to check the Play Store for the update version 0.130.1. This latest update should solve the issue of the failing levels.
We are sorry for the inconvenience.

review_text: Game is fun to play, altough not that challenging except for some boss levels. Howeverx, coming up to level 177, the game gas come to a stop. It just keeps on saying 'failed' even if you haven't done anything yet. After 3 seconds, it just is done. And saw numerous complaints about it, so not my device that had an issue. So, 2 game you can't proceed in, can't get more than 1 star

I just make sure I've turned Wi-fi off before I open the app. That's ok up to a point, but if you want to replay the levels you previously failed on, you only get one free replay of each level per day. Otherwise you have to sit through the crummy ads. I'm glad folks told us that paying to remove ads doesn't actually remove them: I can't find the price of this service so haven't bought it in case it's horrendously expensive; and I shan't be buying it because it doesn't remove ads! Thanks guys!

Really low effort and quality game. Tried for about an hour, didn't fail any levels. A horrible combination of slow and tedious animations with boring, repetitive level design which every 15 levels or so has a slight chance to make you think for half a second before picking the first pin. Would not reccomend, the ad which made me try is out was also extremely misleading.

Glitch on level 420. I'm absolutely stuck and can't do anything at all as a failed level message repeatedly appears over and over again over the top of everything. The level resets but fails before I can even pull a pin, if I change screens to do a challenge, the same happens, plus the adverts keep popping up because the game thinks I've just played a level. Uninstall imminent.
app_developer_reply:
Hello

Sorry to hear about the issue you encountered.
The team is aware and currently investigating, we hope to solve it as soon as possible.
Thanks for your collaboration and understanding!

review_text: I think I'm spending more time watching ads than playing the game!! VERY frustrating. I don't find it challenging at all. You should make it so one has to choose and plan carefully, like a type of maze or something like that, so its an actual challenge to complete. Got to level 174 and it fails immediately, I cannot do anything at all. Now completely stuck & can't go further. I really hope you can get this sorted out.
app_developer_reply:
Please make sure to check the Play Store for the update version 1.30. This latest update should solve the issue of the failing levels.
We are sorry for the inconvenience.

review_text: Game is too easy. Even the boss levels are too straightforward but still quite pleasing to complete. However 1 star due to bugs. One level is unplayable as even before pulling pins, grey balls fall and the level is lost. Have you heard about testing? Before that, another level is buggy with explosions*sometimes* affecting grey balls that are not in same compartment as the explosion.

I reach level 60 and I find nothing challenging, it's too easy game as if it is targeting audience have 30 IQ üôÑ, the boss levels are unsolvable and bad bescause you can't scroll down and you will surprise of obstacles! one ball out you will lose, the transition between levels is very slow and boring, another negative point is a lot of ads more than usual, I think it isn't belong to puzzle games.

Started off great, but when I reached level 423, I found it impossible. As soon as you reach it, you fail immediately! You can't win because somehow the lowest balls fall into the container. Nor can you skip it because you fail so quickly you don't get the chance to click on it. Hopefully, this is a glitch that will be corrected. Who wants to play a game that plays itself and then loses?

Same complaint as others. Game keeps crashing at Boss levels which is very frustrating . Furthermore to retry , which again results in game crashing, you need to watch an ad. I specially paid not to watch ads but it seems same doesn't apply as well. Can someone explain why game keeps crashing......??? PITY

first of all the ads are way too much. more than half the time is spent watching ads. but then I realized I can turn off wifi and data and play with no ads! which brings me to my main complaint about this game. there are way too many easy levels. I played for over an hour and it didn't even start getting hard. just hours of easy to solve beginner puzzles. I'm uninstalling because it's obviously going to take hours to get to the challenging puzzles.

Could be really fun, however when they force an ad after ever round, or second round then it's not worth paying. it glitches your phone out and just aggrivates you. If you turn off your data and wifi before starting then it runs smooth and fine. But if you're downloading something don't waste your time trying to play.. you spend more time watching forced ads then you actually play the game. I understand needing to make money for development of the game, but that many ads? for real? Way too many

The sheer number of lengthy ads makes this game so annoying that I might uninstall it. Another grouse is, despite setting it on mute certain ads bypass the setting and play the audio at such a shrill volume that it gets embarrassing and annoying, if you're not alone. The boss levels in the game are interesting, regular game is too easy.

The graphics are nice but the puzzles are to easy . If it's your first pull the pin type game then it's not a bad place to learn. For some reason I couldn't work out I was also building a city on an island ?? After 2 days of play I have racked up 200000 gold and can't find anything to do with it . Lots of ads as well....needs some harder puzzles even the boss levels are easy!! Uninstalled

I made the no ads purchase and it is a price higher than average, but all it does is remove the ad bar at the bottom. Additional rewards, etc, still requires ad viewing. I dont recommend making this purchase unless the dev team do smt about it. Game wise, interesting enough to tide over boring moments.

I paid to remove the ads, but ended up deeply disappointed. The boss and challenge levels are repetitive (often the same puzzle 3 or 4 times), and the normal levels are mind-numbingly easy. You need to grind the boring, easy levels to unlock challenges. I'll download this again if the difficulty level improves.

Far too easy. Although it could be addictive the only real challenge are boss levels, which seem to be getting easier. So you end up completing levels in seconds and watching another advert, in that sense it works for the developers. You earn coins for no reason. The concept could be good if levels were worth playing. Needs to be more of a challenge, far too easy which makes it tedious and really designed to make you watch adverts. Shame

Ads just ruin this game. Most levels take about 5 to 10 seconds, followed by 30 seconds, a minute, or even more of ads. Can't sit through them. THEN, when you come back to the game, you have to redo levels you have already completed. 1 star is too much for it. Deleting the game!!!

My best suggestion for anyone looking to play this game seriously. Turn off wifi and mobile data, that is the only way to play the game without getting hit with all the ads. I got to level 245 all without watching ads and it's an enjoyable experience just too bad the developers put way too much of the game behind the ad walls to make it worth playing with wifi/data on.

There is a problem at a certain level... cannot go forward... it doesn't let me do almost anything, and in about 3 seconds it says I failed ü§î I have purchased the game since there were too many adds. I had so much fun, until that level. Please acknowledge that if the problem persist I will request a refund! Thank you!
app_developer_reply:
Hello

Sorry to hear about the issue you encountered.
The team is aware and currently investigating, we hope to solve it as soon as possible.
Thanks for your collaboration and understanding!

review_text: Boring. Level 80 is just as hard as level 1. Not very challenging, and then when a boss level comes along it's 10x harder which is great, but keep failing the level from weird glitches like the balls just slipping through solid walls. Only 2 star as it actually represents what you play, not like other games that are completely fake. It's just so boring.

Very bad experience with this game 1- it freezes many times and you have to restart, then the game draw you back to the beginning of the level!! 2- screen touch is very sluggish or even refuse to respond !! 3- advertising time is 10 times more than playing time !! 4- boss level is nonsense and impossible to solve with so many glitches .. while the normal levels are so trivial for an adult !! The best thing that you can do with this game is to uninstall !!

Way too many ads, even if you pay for no ads. I paid & still have to watch ads to upgrade grounds (5-8 per unit), replay levels, or get prize I earned through solving levels. Totally ridiculous to have so many ads even on paid version! I will NEVER download a Popcore game again! They should admit $$ is just to reduce # of ads, not call it no ads! Deceptive!

One level takes 5 seconds to a maximum of 10 seconds to complete. It is then followed by two sets of advertisements, one of which is 25 to 30 seconds long. So you end up spending much more time watching advertisements than playing the actual game. Result is simple - UNINSTALL, period.

The game itself is very simple and not really challenging at all but in some ways that's part of its charm... The two star review though... I'm particularly fed up with the adverts especially as I've paid for "no adverts" OK sure it's less of them but still it's nowhere near "NO ADVERTS" this has left me feeling lied to and ripped off. Not impressed.!

Level 177 fails instantly. The entire game is unusable as it just keeps going back to the fail screen. Also I purchased the "no ads" option and am still forced to watch ads when opening earned gift boxes, and there are still too many ads in other areas. There should be more options to use coins instead of watching ads.

It's ok. Yes, all the levels are essentially all the same and there's no actual challenge, but that's kind of what I enjoy sometimes so maybe mind numbing levels is what you may want if you're gonna play this. Honestly just turn on airplane mode, the presents aren't worth the ad revenue they're making. My issue with the game is how some of the levels are made, there are times where I should be passing a level but due to some gravity or dumb item gets stuck somewhere I fail. Dumb. Fix lvl 1208.

I really enjoyed this game, however after purchasing it to remove the ads the ads are still very much there. Unfortunately it doesn't remove the big button asking to watch it, and when you do click it accidentally it forces you to watch until the end. You have to wait for the small 'continue' button to appear underneath and it's just too frustrating. I would actually have paid more to completely remove the ads but there's no option for that unfortunately.

This would be a great game if it wasn't for all the ADVERTS!! Every level... advert! Then for every advert you need to tap 3x to get rid of it! Such a time waster. Then sometimes you can't see the bombs, you use a lot of coins earnt to play extra challenges & the tool bar has annoying alerts which won't go unless you spend more coins. I've only just started playing & already fed up!

Too many commercial breaks! Some are 30 seconds! Most levels are dead easy unless your an idiot. The "Boss Challenges" are at least a tiny bit more challenging. Don't bother unless you pay to go ad-free otherwise you waste more time on ads than playing. Great concept though.

Far too many Ads!!! I paid $3.99 to stop ads and it only stops the banner ads. Don't really know if the game is enjoyable since all I have been doing is watching their stupid ads. Removing the game and eating the $3.99. Think perhaps that's their ploy...load it with ads, then when you pay, still get ads and delete the game at least they have gotten your $3.99. Best advice...don't play!!

very horrible app. i did only like 3 levels, and not only did the ad take forever, there wasnt an X button, since i was watching something i wasnt paying attention too much, but it has been 7 minutes, and still no X button on the ad, and if i clicked the ad, it woukd take me to the app store and i'd go back, and theres STILL NO X BUTTON!ü§¨ü§¨ uninstalling right now

This is a simple and fun puzzle game. I'd have been happy to give it 5* but for the ads. Paying for ad free removes SOME, but if you want the in game gifts or boss level redo then that's ad only. So if your network runs an ad blocker then you lose a lot. A shame because its fundamentally a good game.üò≠

Fun idea but the boss levels are unforgiving you need so much luck to finish them because there set up in such a way that of even one ball gets out you fail and one always bounces out right before you reach the bottom. Because of this I'm deleting this it's frustrating getting so far and then losing and having to watch a ad to try again.

So many ads. The first few rounds you get thorough with none but then it gets to where there's an ad between almost every level. So annoying I'm deleting the app. It's not a relaxing game at all because you spend all your time trying to exit the ads you can and muting the ones you can't.

Good, if a little simplistic, puzzler. However, while I understand the need for adverts, I am growing tired of the game often restarting at the end of one, forcing the player to redo the last 3 or 4 levels. Pretty shoddy.

I like the game but its too easy, as you go higher in levels it doesn't increase in difficulty. To add to that... I paid for no ads but you are still required to watch just as many ads to get the prizes you "won" as in the free version. What a rip off

I like the game, but the regular levels are too easy (challenge levels are good) but you have to slog through 250 regular levels to get to the next island. WAY TOO MANY!!!! Probably will stop playing, too monotonous to do so many easy levels.

fun game, ads get a little old but at least they aren't every level, leaves a poor taste in my mouth tho when you say no to playing an ad to replay a boss level only for it to give you an ad anyway PLUS not let you redo the level update: -1 star, woke up this morning to 5-10 notifications from this game, recommend turning notifications off for it ahead of time, game gets boring fast, I Uninstalled the 5 second levels aren't worth the "skippable" ads that force you to wait and hit skip twice on

This game is good fun but there are far too many ads that are too long, with stupid demos that you end up stuck in a loop with. I've just got so frustrated trying to play this, every game there's an ad that lasts longer than the round, so I'm out. Uninstalling now.

I would rate this as 0. I just installed this game and tried to play. But when I finish level 1, it automatically redirects to Lazada app. Then when I went back to the game it launches from the start and I'm back to level 1. Then finish level 1 again and redirects to Lazada app again. So frustrating !!!!! You programmed it that way so users will be forced to pay for No-Ads. But even if you paid already its still showing annoying ads. Uninstalling !. NOT WORTH MY PHONE STORAGE !!!

The game itself is great!. The only problem is that like solitaire, bubble shooter, etc I play solo & hate the adds. In this caseI paid for add free but still got adds. Was about to uninstall whe I realized that if I claimed certain things, gifts, 5√ó's coin , I'd get a damn 30s add. Nowi can enjoy the various levels add free & now all I need is for you all to stop pestering meby ask where I am and how you miss me. I play these game for complete relaxation toget me tired enough to fall asleep

So many ads and the levels thing is a scam. I finish the level the way I'm suppose to but it purposely makes me fail it by pouring 2-3 balls out even though I did it right and it won't let me complete the level unless I watch some stupid ad that will let me redo it again and then it finally works.

Your game has loads of problems, mainly with the ads! They either rob me of my bonuses because they refuse to close out or they keep bringing me to the play store forcing me to close the game! Too bad as I was enjoying the game DESPITE being inundated with ads. Uninstalling until you fix the problem!
Ads are far too intrusive. Gameplay is interesting at first but does not become more challenging. Maybe the difficulty ramps up later but I couldn't stick with it because of those freaking ads.

This game is quite simple but it is not "supported" by adverts as suggested. It is simply a vehicle to run as many 30s adverts as possible, presumably for revenue. It is possible to play it offline without ads but then most awards and options aren't available to you.

Simple to the point of boring, I made it to level 50 and have yet to find any level even remotely challenging, could be easily beaten by a toddler. There are also full 30-45 second ads that are unskippable.

Already built every building, now they add new items you can only get through building so basically you cannot get them. Also rewards you get from playing daily take so long to collect you have already finished everything Still no sign of them fixing the issue!!!

Fun game....but...the levels progress too slowly. Of course this is made 1000x worse by the fact that they force you to watch lengthy ads. I played for about 1 hour, but now I'm uninstalling it. The constant forced, lengthy ads are just not worth it.

Disappointing!! The Boss level CHEATS! Played the level SIX times consecutively. Balls settle before moves 9 & 10, but balls bounce OUT of the martini glass and you give me 90%!? We can't control the angles. It will never be 100%. Boooo!

Paid to remove ads because challenges can't be completed with the ad banner at the bottom. After paying, the bottom banner was removed, but there's still tons of ads..ughhh. Not worth the paid version. Fun for free, if you don't mind ads after each level.

Ads make it unplayable. What should be a fun game is interrupted after every single attempt to achieve 1 successful level. It's relentless, utterly annoying and uninstall came very quickly. When will you learn not to take the p!ss? Save your energy folks.

I enjoy the game but there are a lot of ads. You should be able to use coins or watch an ad to do the upgrades. It keeps getting stuck at times when I complete a level and will not show that I completed it.

Too many ads. Regular levels are simple but the ones that require an ad to retry have over lapping pins so you're unable to accurately pull the right pin. Constantly it'll also just flat out cheat and say you fail when you did nothing wrong by saying it's 99% filled.

I downloaded this thinking it would be fun for the grandkids, boy was I wrong! To play at level takes about 1.8 seconds, get to play two games both about the same amount of time then a 30 second ad every 1.8 seconds over and over and over! Boy this game sucks

So many ads. To replay a level you have to add and then you have to watch another ad to actually replay the leve which makes 60 seconds of ads for 30 seconds of playtime. Fun game but not worth the sheer volume of ads you have to watch.

The last pin on the 1st challenge won't come out causing the challenge to fail. Same things happen on the boss challenges. I paid for the ad free version and still a ridiculous amount of ads. Rip off. Uninstalling.

Enjoyed til I passed 2000 regular levels,all 120 Challenge levels+all Color Challenge levels-are there more?Built all upgraded hotels/maxed,have over 1 million coins-now costs more coins to do gumball than the 2000 coin reward,no more plots(Coming Soon sign-WHEN?)I completed all the puzzles but still have a locked tail under the 'unlock by completing puzzles'?The last locked item in most decorative categories are 'unlock by completing base building progressions'-what does that mean/how?

I'm at level 2209. Yea the game can get a little boring and the levels and challenges seem to be the same, but it's a time killer. I don't mind playing. The game just needs a little more challenges but not crazy hard.

Boring and very repetitive Far too many ads, which make this game, which is nothing like the ad that drew me to install it in the 1st place completely unenjoyable, now uninstalling as can't be bothered to spend my bit of free lunch time on it as it doesn't get any better.

Way to much ads and they are 30 secs long. Most of the time you can't get back to the game after watching the ad. Have to get out then go back into it. I've given up after 10min half of that time was adds and trying to get back to the game after.

This game is simple enough for young kids to play & win levels that makes it fun for them. PROBLEM is the BOSS LEVEL I made it through to the end before the clock ran out then was not rewarded, twice so far, Disappointing. üòû. The kids don't like that one bit & has labeled this game "A CHEATER!" üò°

Nice idea for a game, but they exhaust you with tons of rookie levels at the start which are not challenging. I didn't have the patience to go through all of them to the more interesting and complicated phases

The game is okay but all the ads are annoying. Some of the ads have nothing to do with the actual game it's advertising. I've played or am currently playing a couple of the games, and haven't seen what the ad says can happen.

TOO MANY ADS!!! And at some points after getting 100% and you get a gift box to open, guess what, it was a 1 MINUTE LONG AD WITH NO X! I've only been playing for roughly 6 minutes and I've had quite enough of you! Uninstalling and never coming back!

To many advertisements. You have to many ads. There is a advertisement after each level and they are to long. Game is fun, but stressful with all the ads. I would give 5 stars if there were not as many ads.

Had to Uninstall due to glitches. Game kept automatically failing the last round i got to and became unplayable. After I reinstalled, I now have to start from the beginning of the game and there is no way to restore back to where I was. I really enjoyed the game until this point. Goodbye!

I love this game! It is so fun. I paid to not have ads so I only watch them now when I want to open my prize or claim my income. However, it often says there are no ads and to check my internet. My wifi is on, full bars and working. It does this a lot and takes a good 5-10 minutes of trying to claim prizes before it works. If that would get fixed, I would give it 5 stars!

The game is fine but after every level, they play an ad which takes about 40 to 50 seconds.... these ads are annoying and breaks the link, ruins the fun of playing game.... an ad in every 4 - 5 levels is still understandable, but I will not recommend anyone play this game. Much better similar games with less ad. Go for those games instead of this.

I just installed this, then uninstalling after 10mins. Lol Just leaving this feedback before I do that. When it says contain ads, it really has MANY MANY ADS. LOL üòÜ Every level it has ads. Ads play even longer than you play the level. üòÖ and some ads cannot be close, so you'll be stuck there, you need to restart the game app to play again. Not recommending this game.

very glitchy and crashes frequently when switching over to commercials. i have lost out on several game pieces because of it. other than that, a fun physics game. Edited: also, not everyone likes to be in competitions. dropped rating from 3 to 2 because of that.

Same challenges repeatedly. Very data intensive. To progress you are forced to view the same boring ads over and over again. On the boss levels, although sometimes follow identical steps for balls to fall into the bucket, it sometimes happens that a ball 'mysteriously' miss the bucket, and is a clear set up for forcing the player to watch additional boring ads! Not recommending it.

Nice fun game but the ads are crazy! I understand ads help keep the game free but they're so frequent and you have to skip the same ad 3 times before its over with it kinda ruins the joy of the game. If it were easier and didn't take so much time to get through them it wouldn't be so bad but as it is I feel like you spend more time on ads than the actual game

Relaxing to play, as I wanted, and with a lot of skins and trails to get. A few glitches but relaxing otherwise. The big glitches I've recently got to are Boss level 51 and 57 screens not moving down to the end of the puzzle, so can't be finished and stage 2 of level 215 missing a pin so even following hints explodes the cup so fails. Of course I can skip 215 but it grates. The other issue I have is it won't display the levels route even when I select the levels icon, or between levels now.

Wow fix this game! I got to level 2672 or so and then the next level fails immediately without any interaction and no amount of pulling pins helps stop it. Along with the coming soon updates that never came, it's not worth your time! Wow the adds are pretty annoying as well with many of them requiring you to close the game and open it again to get past them. Badly programming on this game! Developers fix this mess!

Fun game. Would give it 5 stars, but levels are easy and you can see its all about posing ads. Also when it's 95% in the bowl and all are in the cup and none went over the bowl. It happens alot ‚òπÔ∏è
There's a bug in the game in which all objects are collecting in the basin, but the percentage is not registering at 100%. Thus, it's not counting the level as complete. Please fix

Game glitches way too often. Too many pins to pull so that we often fail the level because the balls got stuck on a protruding pin. There's not enough moves in one level, yet there's at least four left on another. We didn't fail the game. The game is failing us. Fix the game.

Not enough explanation about objective to complete each level. It's as if they want you to fail a few times to learn what is required so they can generate more ad revenue. Ads are far more frequent then in other games. Also not very challenging. Going to uninstall. My first negative review ever.

Real easy kid game . 3 stars because you spend more time on the fan fare after win and adds , than actual game play . I realize developers have to make money ,but go easy on the timed video adds. Space em' out . Not each every game break / move to next level.

Eh. The game is alright. A lot of ads, albeit 5 second ones that you can easily exit out of. Lots of similar games with the same graphics had options to watch ads. They make the gameplay more enjoyable to their players & in return, we watch their ads to give them money. In this game, you are forced to watch ads which implies the developers are in it solely for the money. Read the reviews folks, they speak volume
Levels are too easy and there are WAY too many adds and the adds are extremely long. It takes about 10 seconds to play 1 level and after 2 levels you have to watch a 2 minute add.
Too easy and every time I finish a level, it says You've won a prize, but all that happens is an advert comes on, and the only way to continue is to delete the advert and restart the game.

I was having a blast with this game, even with repeating puzzles and at least one that is unsolvable. Now I've reached a point where the game is no longer giving puzzle pieces (even during the promo weekends) nor the Wall options. I'm racking up tons of coins, but have no need for them besides building my city. If a fix can get me back to getting collectibles, I may feel more motivated to move forward. Solid game otherwise.
Too many ads, you spend more time watching ads than you do playing the game. Also, the first several levels are just way too easy so it's basically you're just sitting there watching ads

The game is pleasantly relaxing, but the ads are a buzz kill. If all the games that are pitched in the ads are like this they aren't worth the time to download. Most of my time is spent waiting to play the game between ads.

I don't know about the insane amount of ads because I played with the Internet turned off until I encountered a level that was impossible to beat and to skip it you have to....guess what?....yup, watch an ad! Crafty way for the developers to get you to turn on your wi-fi!! UNINSTALLED.
Pretty sweet game, very nice smooth controls, not too many ads! There also seems to be a second game within the game. Great way to kill time while dropping a deuce!

Crashes at level 177. I liked playing this game but it started crashing at level 177. I got message "Level Failed". I tried everything...force stop the game and what not but nothing helps. The message pops on the screen at all the time. Probably I have to delete it and loose my entire progress.

I haven't played this game for some time, because I've earned all the prizes. So it was to my delight when I saw that they had added new prizes. However, I'm not able to win then because I've maxed out all of my base upgrades. It would be nice if they'd add some more buildings.

The concept sounds fun, 1. the game sends multiple notifications each day 2. every time you decide quit and do something else, you have to replay the level you've already won. 3. the levels are repetitive. It makes the game boring very quickly

Could be good, has definitely potential. But as others complain as well... it's just a money making machine, ads, ads, ads, ads. There is nothing wrong with earning money for all the hard work creating a game. But lately many are really overdoing! Just a nuisance. Even when disabling WiFi it's not worth all the hassle. Deinstalled.

Uninstalling: The adverts are impossible to close! I have played the same puzzle 4 times, because the adverts won't let me move on! Everything I do to close them.....even clicking the X keeps sending me to Play Store. I've had enough. Such a shame really, as this is a nice little game......but advert obsessed!!!

Love the game, it's pretty cool. It has something for EVERYONE. Horror, adventure, memes, story's, and just very random games. It's online,so you can make a lot of friends. For the most part it's kind friendly too .Though I do have times where my screen freezes completely, then I get kicked out of the app. Then I try again multiple times, and it does the same thing. Overall it's a good game, 9 outta 10. üôÉ

This games really great for when your bored,and there's lots of experiences for anything you like there's sports games, mystery games,meme games, and lots more. I do have one problem though,sometimes in a game when I go to friend somone and I get back off that screen it makes my screen freeze or it starts to just go crazy and do thing I don't tap. But overall pretty solid game, they fix that one bug and perfect game. 9.5 out of 10

Game is awsome! There are so many games to choose from and you can edit and so many other things!! But I rated it 4 starts because sometimes I type in a normal question and it tags. Also, when I buy something, after like a week it's unavilable. It really frustates me and I really wish we could refund! There's also been a problem with the screen. Sometimes when I'm playing a game It locks and I can't move and can only zoom. But very great game! 9/10! I play it everyday!

This game is amazing! I do have something that I have been having issues with, though. My Chrome is touchscreen but it is still a Chromebook and the game always counts it as mobile even when I'm not using the touchscreen. The game lags constintly on this device and I'm not sure if that's just me or if anyone else has been having problems. I also wish you could change your birthday whenever, becuase you may have accidentally put in "2011-12" and you cannot change it until like, three years?

Very good game a lot of genres. but there is this glitch where I start running in a game and the screen sinks, and it get frustrating because you have to lower your speed in order for it to be straight; And let's say you're playing a survival or shooter game you'll just keep on dying and, the only way to fix that is if you leave the game and come back. Now that probably won't sound like a big deal, but most of the time it just kicks you out of the app. Id be helpful for everyone.

One of the best games I ever played. Though.. there are a few bugs. I get kicked out randomly and have to restart my tablet. Other than that.. This game is perfect for anyone who likes games! Horror, Adoption, Roleplays, it has something for everyone! I don't really mind the bugs THAT much anyways. I recommend!

Very fun and socially expanding game. Love the community I have found myself in, having made some very close friends over the years. One issue I have been having for a while is the way the chromebook aplication's version of Roblox works. I do not know if it is just my chromebook or chromebooks in general, but when I am in the home screen I cannot scroll. Same issue occurs when I am in the shop, search, and play section of the main menu. The web version works perfectly fine though

I absolutely love this game it's so easy to make friends unlike other games and there's a lot of different categoried games it ranges from like dress up to war games it's cool. Ive been playing for years I first started during 2012 and it's 2022 I play it sometimes now but it's a really awesome game. I gave it 3 stars only because I feel like we shouldn't have to spend so much money just for one product on a avatar. The accessories,faces,and hair and so on should be priced like the outfits.

This game is super good! It's amazing that we can interact with other people. The one problem that I have is every time I go to reset my character, my screen would always act weird and absurd. Every time I would move my screen it would make me zoom in automatically when I'm not trying to. So for that reason I'm giving it a four. If that situation was fixed, then I will bump it up to a 5

I'm not a game player so I liked how easily I was able to get around this ap. I would have downloaded this game if it wasn't for my kids and their love for it. I connect with them a few times a week and play many different games. Provides fun family time. Sometimes However it does get buggy like character starts jumping non stop, can't control them anymore, game freezes ect. But usually you can go out of game and restart to fix but can be annoying. Overall, love the game and even spend $ here

I love this game and the app works most of the time, but lately it's been cutting off sentences in the direct messages portion of the app (out of the games) and has been really frustrating. I Also have been receiving no notifications even though all of my external and internal settings are correct. Please fix this, I'm getting tired of trying to read messages that get cut off completely mid paragraph.

I have been playing this app for a really long time, I think since 2015 or 2016, the games are honestly still really fun and exciting! But the app is also glitchy sometimes like for example; when I am typing in chat, I will press auto correct when I mess a word up, sometimes it'll glitch my keyboard and I have to wait like 5 minutes or I'll have to power my phone off and on to fix it. It has also been cutting off sentences out of game in chats, please fix this, it's honestly supper annoying.

It's a great game but I have some problems with it. For one. Layered clothing is best used with rthro type characters but there is no blank rthro in both male and female type. Being a problem because designing a female avatar can be fun. It would be nice if that was a feature. And secondly. It is buggy. I cannot leave in first person or with shift lock or else I'll have to restart my computer to avoid my character following the direction my camera is facing.

Although this is a fun game to play sometimes, there are one too many problems and issues with it. Literally a second after joining I would get disconnected and then I would have to rejoin but the same thing would happen again. My screen also just turns black all of a sudden then it would keep loading. A new glitch that continues to happen to me is that all the players in the game that I'm playing would just stop moving they would freeze and then I would be the only one moving around.

Personally, my experience with roblox has been very inconsistent. Over the course of 6 years, everything went downhill during 2020. The game started to become really buggy, there was a lot of controversial things happening in games, a lot of chats were getting tagged unnecessarily, and many other things. I know Roblox has been trying their hardest to fix these problems, but they just keep happening. And with all these new updates, I feel like they could work on these old problems more.

I gave this game a five star rating because, of course, the game has tons of games to explore and the same goes for the avatar shop. One thing I see the game is lacking is the varieties of items in the avatar shop, because sometimes I can't quite find what I'm looking for. The game is fantastic, but sometimes the game won't turn on even though I have full bars.

This game is fun, and a good game to play when bored. But one problem. Sometimes when I open the leaderboard (in settings, on mobile) each time when I would try to turn around the screen would either shoot straight up or straight down. It gets really aggravating when it happens. Pls fix!

I really like it, just 4 stars because it tags out things that aren't a bad word. But it's overall a fun game! Also, there's a lot of scammers and hackers out there. I would reccomend this game for 8+. Also, for me I am having trouble updating this game, maybe it's the app stores problem? I don't know. But if you could fix these listed problems it would be a 5 for sure! :)

It's a fun game but every time I get disconnected or have to leave the game to rejoin because something happened, I can't go into the same server. I don't want to have to friend someone to go into the server so could you (UPDATE REQUEST): Make an update in which you could see the previous server you were in of that game. It would be really helpful and would make the game less frustrating instead of going through every single server. Thank you

So many games to play!!! It's literally my world ik that sounds weird but yeah. I'd rate it 5 stars but there is lots of hackers. My account got hacked but I made a new one! I do get screen glitches when I enter the area to leave the game and go to settings. So there is no way I can fix that so I would have to leave the game. Anyways thats it beyyeey!

This is a very good game with time and effort built into it but there is always room for improvement. Sometimes when I open the app it just loads and it won't load in unless I exit and come back in,On Mobile there is a glitch where your screen can move and only zoom in and out, I see toxic people in every game I play. If you can fix that then I'll give you a higher rating. If so continue making the game better!

Overall really great playform. Not much lag or system issues, runs great for most games without high graphics as well, the catalog has a lot of interesting and unique items to customize avatars too. It just disappoints me that we have to sign into a browser just to equip 2 shoulder or back accessories.
author_name: Matt Dusek but as a pumpkin deer

review_text: I could go on and on about all the bugs. If i did we would be here for hours. I'll just highlight the most common one. First, we have the zoom bug. This usually happens when swapping to another tab and then back into Roblox. I'll be playing having a good time or I'm in some competitive match and I accidentally swipe up my screen and then I go back in and it does this thing where the only way I can move my camera is in and out. I usually have to reset the game. Other than that pretty fun.

This game is very fun to play. I've been playing it since I was 7-8 and I'm about to be 17 now. Theres multiple games to play and although there are a ton of mobile issues, on PC I have no problems with this game. If you want it to run smoothly you'll need at least 5-8GB of RAM and a relatively good graphics card (GTX 970 or better at the least). If you wanna put the graphics all the way up in-game I recommend getting at least 12 GB RAM and a very good graphics card. Good luck and have fun! :)

This game is amazing, and it has any game for any person like horror, Memes, guessing games, and roleplay games. I do have problems with the catalog though, whenever I try to put something on it will either say "No items found:(" or sometimes it will delete something and its really annoying because then half my cloths are gone. That's why I rate it a 4. Other than that I love it and I play it all the time. Please fix these bugs.

I've been playing for YEARS and I have a few bugs here's and there when I'm on tablet. Just minor glitches. It's great for Xbox and PC, as it runs smoothly without (normally) any glitches. The catalog is FULL of unique items to customize your character and millions of fun games to play! I definitely recommend playing it as it has been my favorite game for years.

Overall, I like this game. Most of the servers run pretty smoothly, and the overall experience is pretty fun. There are only a few things I'd like changed: 1. I wish the scam games could be removed or reported sooner! 2. It would be nice if there were more free outfits/hairs/facial expressions 3. I would like it if I could get Roblox Studio on a Chromebook, iPad, or tablet (it's only accessable through Macbook or Windows) For the most part, it's a good game.

Ok, heres my thoughts, the game is good, robux is affordable, game is a 5 star, BUT. When in avatar editor, it will only show some of the classic shirts or classic pants, same for hats and other accessories, I've also been having trouble with a shift lock screen, and crashing. Other than these minor inconveniences, the game is great. Also r-thro stinks

I love this game! You can do a lot of things, you can play your favorite games, you can customize your character it's amazing! But there's this one thing, for example sometimes when I'm in the middle of customizing my character it will freeze for a few minutes and then it would kick me out of the whole game. I do love this game dont get me wrong but maybe just adjust the lagging a bit please.

This is a great game to play. I love it. It has game for pretty much every person weather you like horror or adventure and so much more. But there are a few bugs. Your screen gets stuck and you either have to reset your character, leave and rejoin, or close roblox completely and get back in. It also gets stuck in shift lock. Very annoying. But other than that, it is an amazing game to play

Its good because you get to talk to your friends and maybe family. You also get to play it on any device! But there are some issues, when you make a mistake on spelling. The systems tag it out, when you go to move your joystick it moves your screen, and when you go to update it, it requires you to delete most of your apps. Overall good game!

This game Is good but I have 3 issues. 1: when I play a game and go to the playerlist and go out of it, the camera angle is stuck where it is! Im not saying the game is bad, but you have to fix it. 2: The same thing when I go to the player list and go out of it, when I walk the camera goes with it! And 3: when I'm playing a obby and when someone friends me, I accidentally touch the accepted button and miss the jump and fall all the way down! Please fix this!

I use a Chrome OS laptop, so I need to get roblox on the playstore rather than just downloading it. That causes most expiriences to think I'm playing on mobile, and some functions are restricted to touch screen. My laptop is not touch screen, so it's pretty disapointing when I can't play properly. Also, words like the r slur are allowed or are easily bypassed which is very uncomfortable. Other than that, I've had a great expirience.

It was great but it some times doesn't load but I have full bars of wifi and it will tell me that I'm disconnected from the internet. Sometimes it kinds sucks. If roblox cooperation sees this I would like to tell them that they might need to tweak eoblox up a bit cause it's kind of glitchy, not only that, I'm sure other people have the same exact problem. You haven't fixed the problem and you guys said you did. I really hope in the next update you fix this. Overall it's a good game

I love this game its so much fun but there is a glitch that gets your screen stuck. sometimes even moves when you move the joystick this is annoying bug, I recommend adding a camera glitch fix button in the in-game settings so you can fix your camera and not have to quit and rejoin. That has caused me to have to stop playing with a nice guy I met. The friend limit is annoying I keep having to leave so I can get new, friends very annoying please remove. thank you for your time.

This game is great! Although, if Roblox was to change ANYTHING, it should be the simple mobile bugs. Alot of times the screen glitches, or just simple things that I need to reload the app for. I would rate five stars IF, mobile bugs weren't there. And really, nobody likes the realistic avatars that are now available when customizing you avatar. Although, it is good for the people that may, like that. But if mobile bugs were fixed, I'm sure many people would be happy and relieved! Thank you!

Amazing game but the updates are pretty annoying. Like changing the logo and such, but it's robloxs choice. Overall the game is really cool. But it's hard to play on mobile, it's not really the controls it's mostly the bugs and lag, for example, the screen will randomly freeze.. or the game will randomly just lag for no reason. Even if you have good wifi or internet.. it'll still lag. Still a good game! I'd usually play on laptop but my mom's laptop broke. Good game tho! Ty for reading! :D

i gave it a five star because it has no ads and there are plenty of games to play. it's the only game i play and can never get tired of playing, but there is a problem i hope roblox fixes. whenever i accidentally click on a notification and go back to playing its hard to move the screen. while i move my character the screen moves aswell and it's annoying everytime because i always have to leave and rejoin the game. i hope they do fix it so playing can be alot more fun for everyone!

It's a great app with many games but sometimes it glitches and kicks me out even if my wifi is great. It also sometimes glitches when I play with friends. I would also like to point out that sometimes it says the same experience launched from a different device. I have changed my password so many times and have never given it to anyone. I think it might just be a glitch but it gets super annoying sometimes. Edit: sometimes when I use my tablet I type in some games and puts it as a laptop setup.

Great game. There are a few bugs and issues though. On certain games your screen just suddenly stops turning around and goes in and out, no matter how you move it. Sometimes, it gets really laggy and glitchy that it kicks users out of the game. There should also be a option to change your main screen to any color you would like and have more clothes options for people without Robux. Other than that, I would love to keep playing this game! ü§ó

Great app. The only things I can complain about is the lag. It wasn't happening but all of a sudden I've become really laggy. Also it disconnects randomly me if my wifi status isn't all the way full or 1 bar away from being full. it only happens when I play the game, so I know it isn't my phone. My wifi will just randomly go off. You have no idea how difficult that makes it to play. Also my screen will sometimes freeze, and sometimes it'll lock too. Please fix it. I really like this game. Ty ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§

This is a pretty cool app,I love how there different games, I really love simulators and more! And when I play I don't have any issues, it clear and great quality üëå. However sometimes the screen glitches and when you try to turn your screen it zoom in-out, and If you try to reset your character it doesn't work and you have to rejoin, but some if you wait it will Un glitch,but other than that no other problems.
