I'm giving it 5 stars because I grew up on this game it defined an entire generation, not alot of games can accomplish that. However there are some issues,in some games when you exit the player list you can move your camera at all, and sometimes the dynamic joystick bugs out and control ls both the camera and the and the players movement, usually this isn't a problem, however with my device I have to use the classic joystick, which makes it difficult to play because I play on my phone. Fix it?

I rate 5 stars because I grew up on it, but there are some issues and bugs if you could fix them roblox I would play more. #1. Sometimes the screen bugs out and u can't really walk unless your screen gets zoomed out, but you can fix it by getting in a car if ur in a game like brookhaven, adopt me, etc. with cars u can but if there are no cars you can't. You can't reset your character and it go back to normal, you would have to rejoin. Well that's all I can think of right now I will re-edit it

This game is fun, you could play with a bunch of friends, games, and more. I've been playing this game for years and I wanted to say a few things.. if you press the menu button and try moving the joystick, the joystick moves the screen. it's an annoying glitch and I'm pretty sure that it hasn't been patched yet. also, i would recommend adding an "recommendation" thingy so we could request what we want in roblox and also other people could see our suggestions!

I definitely love Roblox. I usually play it on my laptop but I lost my mouse so I have been playing it on my phone. I know a lot of people have glitching problems, but personally I don't. I don't like that in some games the developer has the option to choose which movement mode you have to use, but I guess I can overlook it for now. Overall, great app!

I love this game! It's super fun when I'm bored. I would enjoy it thought if the jump button wasn't so small for mobile device. I think a lot of the items in the shop as well as gamepasses are very spendy. Also, not sure if this is only me, but whenever I try to install roblox after unistalling the game, it usually never installs. It's always pending, and I can never get it to work. (Edit) I've changed my review, and I love it more. I still think some items are a bit spendy, but overall, love!

Great: but I have a issue This game is very great, most of the time when I get the chance to play this game I do, but i do have one issue. Sometimes when trying to move the screen it wouldn't move, it can only zoom in and out and it was interrupting my gameplay, and most of the time I have to exit the game for it to go back to normal, and sometimes I get disconnected randomly as well Other than that, this game is very fun, just needs a little fixing then and there.

I love this game! This game is full of loads of fun and other stuff. Although, there are a few downfalls. Some games can get laggy for no reason. You could have perfectly good internet and nothing happening in the game and it just starts lagging. Another thing is that there is this bug in ANY game where you don't have control of the screen and it just starts zooming in and out. I find that annoying because it ruins my experience in a game. But it is really fun and an awesome game! I recommend!

Best app no contest, it's almost perfect but there is 2 flaus, 1. when I go to play a game it's almost instant when it shuts the game off and put me on the home screen then I have to shut the whole app down to get it off the main screen, & 2. Sometimes when I play a game, the screen locks and its really annoying, but other than that, it's perfect.

This app is great. It allows you to interact with others and make friends, and you can also learn things on the app. So its an educational experience and also a fun app to cure your boredom. Its a fun game for kids, and adults! But sometimes there is a few issues. For example; sometimes when I am still for a moment, the screen glitches and zooms in and out. I hope that it is fixed soon. Other than that, Im rating it 5 stars.

Roblox is one of my favorite games to play but there are a few little problems. The first problem is randomly the screen will lock and I can't move, and the second problem is sometimes when I go to move the only thing is does is make the screen go in and out.... other than that everything else about this app is amazing and I recommend this to whoever is reading this!!

This game has so many different kinds of genres such as Jailbreak, Adopt Me, and Brookhaven. And they're all super fun, definitely reccomend. Glitch #1: When you go to the player list there's a big chance your screen with glitch out and you won't be able to play normal, your joystick is like you're zooming in and out, you can't move your screen and it's just horrible. Roblox is a great game, lots of experiences. And is a great game for u and ur friends. I have 1 problem tho. Sometimes when playing a game the screen glitches. It doesn't move. Other than that. It's a great game.

This is a great game, my top favorite actually! But there are alot of glitches like for example, sometimes I'll be playing a game and my screen will lock and I can't move it. And another one, sometimes I'll try to move my screen but instead of changing the view it just zooms in and out.. and there should be more avatar options that you can choose without robux because some people like me can't get robux but I don't wanna be a bacon or something like that. But overall this is a great game.

It is cool, there are lots of games to choose from. I like that you can play on mobile or pc, however there are some glitches on mobile that you don't find on computer. For example sometimes the screen/camera glitches and you either cant move the camera or it zooms in/out instead of turning. Besides that it is pretty good. I like that there is so many character customization options as well, although you have to pay for some of them.

I love this game! It's a very fun app, but I have my complaints, sometimes I'm trying to join one of my friends and this has only happened a few times, but I was joining one of my friends the other day, and right in the middle of joining it said Same account launched in different experience. Also a while ago my wifi was messed up and now I'm really laggy, please fix this.

Roblox is a great game that has plenty of variety for games, but there are some camera glitches on mobile I would like to talk about. Sometimes, the screen freezes, and I have to leave and rejoin. Other times, when I use the joystick, it's as if I am zooming in and out of the camera. If this could get fixed it would be an easy 5 stars, but otherwise, it is a great game to play with friends! It has it's uos and downs, but it's a great game.

Amazing game! My favorite accualy. But there is this bug , but I'm not going to give it 4 stars because of that. But I doubt that, because my phone is brand new. Otherwise, great game! 100% recommend. If you could fix this bug that would be great! Keep up the good work, creator!

This game is going down the rating for me it is a great game it really is but there is bugs and i really only play this game anymore as a time killer other than that more about the bugs, It constantly closes for no reason also the fact that im supposed to be able to turn off shift lock, it does not work and its really annoying when i have to fix it by rejoining. there are so many games to play. I like that it has different types of games so you can play what you want. This is a great game,YOU can make so many friends and there are so many games! It's so fun to play I'm addicted to it. I would rate it 5 stars but I have an issue... It's great and has multiple experiences but people can bypass and do bad things. Buggy but it's fun. Roblox is definitely one if my most favorite games. This app is amazing! I have had it for many many many years now and love it! I have made lots of friends, met new people, and had so much fun, my favorite games at the moment are Adopt Me, Cheese Escape, Aperiaphobia (I think its spelled), and many more but the reason I am leaving a review is because I saw alot of people having a problem on mobile where the screen wont let you move as it zooms in and out, all you have to do is get off the game clear it and then turn your device off, get back on.

Roblox is a great game that me and my brother love playing, but there are some bugs that are only on mobile. One bug makes it to where we can't move our camera at all and have to rejoin. This game is nearly perfect. everything is fine if u are on a good device, works well even for Android phones.the catalog has many items to choose from. The games are unique and fun to play too! You can easily find the right game to fit your criteria if you search for it! Five star rating.

I've been playing for years and it just keeps getting better. The graphics are vivid once in possession of the right device and excellent service. There is an abundance experiences to choose from. Avatar customization options are infinite, due to the frequent updates, and the ability to design the outfit of one's Avatar.

Interesting idea for a platform. Sadly super annoying. Reconnects in game will always kick you out of the game, eating my battery alive(not sure if that's the platform or games or the combination of both) And fast, but pretty unhelpful customer service. That was for me the point when i have up on it.

Pretty good. But after a long time (Like 1 year or 2) it gets kinda boring. Also I belive this is a commom glitch but sometimes when you are playing a game (For me it has just been bloxburg) you try to move you view / angle you can only zoom in and out. But this is a minor glitch and all you have to do is rest to fix it. Thats it! Overall GREAT game. Now I am off to play some more.

The performance is the main problem, roblox isn't optimized to performance as expected. There should be a setting where you could toggle textures on/off and that would be really helpful. Overall the game is great, the community is a little off sometimes, and there's various games to go around and play/enjoy so I'd give a 4 stars due to performance and poor optimization.

love it. This game is full of apropiate and parrent aproved games. There is a variaty of games too choose from. This game is AWESOME, but... 1. Whenever I'm playing a tower, and someone sends me a friend request, I can't jump because the request is right on top of the jump button(FOR MOBILE USERS). Maybe Roblox can change it so it's somewhere else? 2. I was happily playing a game when I got a disconnect error saying "Account launched from different device." Which is what shows when u get hacked. I logged back on quickly(simply got in and out of the app) and my account was perfectly fine. This was SCARY.

I mean, sure, it's fun for the first year or so, but there are a lot of issues. To name a few, Roblox recently removed the classic and beloved "oof" death sound and replaced it with a weird new sound. I can't describe what it sounds like, but it's.. odd. I feel as if Roblox is losing those unique little details that make it Roblox. Also, there is a glitch where your screen gets stuck and you can only zoom out while playing a game.

This is an amazing app. I been playing with this app for around 3 years now with many different friends and family members. It offers people to join have multiple games such as adventure/explore games, shooting games, meme games, and so much more! Also, it allows regular members create games that they want to create. However, there are some bugs and will make you have to update the game sooooo much! Which does make it a bit annoying. Otherwise, the game is a masterpiece and I absolutely love it

I personally love roblox, but there has been many issues stated in the reviews and the issue has still not yet been fixed. One problem, when you use this certain thumb stick, when you try to move it moves your screen as well. 2, My screen locks for absolute no reason, or when I tap two fingers on the screen, or tap the screen repeatedly. I can't move it at all! 3. This is the most common glitch for mobile, your screen locks and zooms in and out for the same reason as 2! It completely ruins it.

This is a very good game I have to say but it does act stupid at times like when I would go on a game and it just shows a black screen. Or when roblox is down alot. But other than that it's a very good game. But I do have issues with chat at times and it does glitch alot in games but I love this game you can spend time with friends and just hang out.

I've played the Stepford County railway game and it's a brilliant idea for a virtual commuter railroad experience, but unfortunately this game is riddled with bugs. They have recently updated to a new version where they have rebuilt some of the stations and improved signaling. But players are constantly de spawned due to bugs in the system. I'd have been happy without the mostly superficial updates if the concentrated on getting rid of the bugs.

Very fun and social game, good for kids to make new friends, robux isn't too expensive, very fun experiences, and no adds! There's just one problem though, when I play my favorite game on there called Fashion Famous lots of times when I get in my screen will freeze and lag, and sometimes it even kicks me out of the whole entire app, and then I have to restart my tablet or otherwise it won't let me get into the app. Fix this bug and I will give it 5 stars but for now, it's gonna be 4 stars!

This is a good game overall, you can play with friends, costomize your character, and Robux is fairly cheep for a good amount. There are a few bugs tho. Which can be very annoying in unsavable obbys/tycoons and such. Other than that, very good game and would definitely recommend to my friends

A lot of games but frustrating waiting on the server to load and stay functional as well as touch screen options can be frustrating. I have tried different devices and so have others here. The game's server needs updated a lot.

Okay, Everything about this game is amazing, but every once and awhile the screen just gets stuck and moves only in and out, it gets nerve-wracking to play with, and usually the only way to get rid of it is to completely exit out of the game, Multiple of my friends have had this happen but I have only seen it happen on mobile, never on pc. If this could get fixed that would be amazing! Other than that small thing I would definitely recommend this to anyone on pc and mobile!

Its really fun but there are a decent amount of bugs and glitches, like if your jumping for a long time and you let go it will keep jumping. Also if you are walking it randomly starts keep going and you have to reset. But I guess overall it's a very good game!

Honestly, this game is AWESOME! I would give it 5 stars but.. I cannot sadly. I'm actually pretty pissed at this game right now, because I can't play my favorite games. Definitely one of my favorite games, but when I play on my phone, sometimes my screen will move around while I walk and if I try to use my other hand to turn, it just zooms in and out and the only way I know how to fix it is by leaving and rejoining the game I was originally playing. Roblox is a fun game where you can play with friends and family, though, I have some problems with it. The game is very laggy on mobile, and I hate how a lot of games can't be played on some devices. For the most part, I've always loved Roblox as a game. It's fun, and not too laggy in most games I play. Recently though, I've been experiencing an issue that majorly changes my opinion. This game is nice and really popular, and I love all the games you can play with your friends.I would rate it 5 stars, but I do have a few issues. Please...

this game is really fun and takes my mind off stressful things. i love all the options for games to play and i love how cheap the currency is however, i have been hacked once and they did change my pass but i got the account back at least but anyways i really hope in the future you can change that abillity. ive had a great experience with game and no issues except for that one time. if you are looking for a game to hangout and make friends with, this game is perfect for you like it was for me!!!

I love Roblox, and I grew up on it. I do have two issues though. This game has it's downsides, for example getting rid of the oof sound, lots of hacking issues and I could go on all day. But to be honest, it's not as bad as the average person says. There's also some REALLY good graphics in a handful of games as well. There's also literally BILLIONS of BILLIONS of games of your liking! Overall, it's not the best, but awesome!

Its an amazing game with so many new people you can meet, and its quick to get into a game or server. Best thing is, you can even make your own game! A great game. You can choose all the games you wish, and whatever you search up is most likely there. Some games are for specific devices, and some are masterpieces alone. I love this game, I use it almost all the time. It's very fun to play with friends. I'd recommend children 10 years or older can play. Great game! I saw a lot of reviews saying that they can only zoom in and out, I have experienced this but I know how to prevent it. DO NOT click the roblox icon (settings) in a game while walking or using joystick. THAT IS WHAT CAUSES THE ISSUE. I know some of you will think "But it does it when I don't do that," It might sometimes, but if you stop doing what i said, it will happen WAYYY less. It is not a problem for me anymore! ........ Roblox is a great game, with many options. 9/10

Really good game. but there is some bugs like when you play on mobile. the joystick is very small"not really a bug". however i do play on tablet so good for me. also sometimes when you go to the player list. and then turn your camera. it zooms in or zooms out. and when you join a really laggy game that is really good. it just crashes. Roblox is one of the best apps that I dream to play as but there's a few problems with the game at time when you join games the screen will turn out black and I heard that some things will be deleted and that thing that made it help to be offered to but because of that is that incident there's a lot of glitches and a lot more than I probably need to be fixed but all out it's a great game that I dreamed to play!! :7

I've been playing roblox since 2015 and I do really love the app and I've met some great people on it. I do have some complaints though. #1, phone there is this glitch where your screen gets stuck every few minutes. #2, on iPad, I get kicked out every few hours or so because It says "Same account launched off different device" even though I do not cause this. #3, the catalog on phone is so laggy. I'm hoping these bugs can be fixed in the future, but overall pretty okay game.

For the most part its a good game, it's very interactive and it can be very fun as there is a large selection of games you can choose from. You can also make many friends and customize your avatar, or sometimes make a game, not on mobile though. My only problem is when you play on mobile sometimes it glitches and zooms in to where you can't zoom out and its hard to move.

I love this game, so much, but there is bugs, like with the new ui. You'll just yap it and then tap a button to close it then suddenly its stuck on your screen not allowing you to move. It gets stuck in just the right amount to allow you to not do anything pretty much. It's extremely annoying. The only way I've found to get rid of it is to just leave whatever game you were playing then come back to it. But sometimes you make to much progress jn a game to just leave, please fix this, thank you.

This game is so fun for me I love playing it. However sometimes I recieve little bugs on some games and glitches where it just kicks me off the game. It's also a little hard to play on a computer. Especially obbies. But other than that, if those were fixed, I would give this game a 10/10! I would definately still recomend this game to anyone. Especially younger kids :)

This is a wonderful game, but you really need to fix the controls on chromebook and on phone. Whenever I go to chat on my chromebook, my screen always lights up and blurs, and it is only fixable if I leave and rejoin, but it will still be there if I decide to chat again. ALSO- please update your skin tones! As a half black, half-white person there is not a skintone that fits me well at all. Other than that, it's a pretty awesome game!

I love this game i play it all the time. my only issues right now is that I have upgrade it so many times and then I have to delete apps just to play the game and the joystick bugs out at the worst time when you are playing a game (like a horror game), and at times it will think you are on PC, also I would like to talk about how me and many other people keep gets ban for no reason it makes no sense.

Roblox is amazing! You can make tons of friends! You can also change your character!! But there is some problems, First.. Sometimes when you play a game it's really laggy but even tho you get a private server it's still laggy, Second.. When you move the screen it goes in and out however you do it it won't go normal, Last of all.. Also whoever made this we will recommend to play this so happy to play it!!

I like this game! But every single time I update its says it doesn't work please send a feedback. And I always click on something my screen doesnt work it just zooms in and out even on the moments I worked so hard on, I always have to rejoin the game, sometimes l click on resume many times till it work, but if you play a game that is a srory it will work again. So, Roblox please fix all of the problems that everyone has to deal with and thank you for reading this review! Have a good day

It's a lovely game, very very nice, just have something I need to talk about. Mobile glitches. 1. Sometimes the screen gets stuck and I can't look around so I have to leave and come back. 2. Sometimes it makes it where I zoom in when I'm trying to look around. 3. When I try to get into the game it's stuck loading so I have to close the game and open it again. Other then these things the game is amazing, lots of things to do, lots of games, and great way to make friends or play with them!

This app is basically the only app on my phone (And my touchscreen chromebook) I rate it 4 stars, though, because 1: the camera Mostly ALWAYS glitches. I either can't move the screen or it when on mobile, i cant move. all the screen does is move in and our, in and out. and it forces me to restart my phone and even sometimes reinstall the app! 2: sometimes, reports DONT work. 3: it mostly always sensors words that are spelt wrong, so you sometimes can't say a spelled wrong word. That's all!! üòÅüëç

I've been playing this for years, It's really great! I love how much they put into it. I hate how everyones rating it 3s or 4s because the bugs, It doesn't happen often. Please just respect how much they put into roblox. The zoom in and out glitch is everyones problem, Like I said "It doesn't happen often". Just rate it 5. Don't worry about the bugs. Please:)

You can make so many new friends and play different varieties of games from horror to role-play to parkour! Although, the updates involve a large amount of storage space and the games seem to glitch more that expected. I would appreciate it if these problems weren't as bad as they are now, but I have come to a conclusion that this is a fun app. üòÑüëç

Nice gameüëç. I've had the same issues as all the replys. The in and out bug. Now the only way to prevent this from happening is to not press the Roblox Button when you are moving and in the game. And that's not even a bug it just normally happens if you accidentally press the Roblox button (happens to me alot of times..Unfortunately..). And it sometimes happens when you press the home button on your phone (ios or Android). I hope this helps for the people asking to fix the issue up.üëç

There are a lot of issues with the game right now. The game has no ads, lots of fun games, but when I go to play a game, it says "Check your internet and try again." My internet's FINE.Also the Kohl's admin incident. Please fix that! Also, on mobile when you go to look around, it only zooms in and out, and when you try to type it won't show what your saying. Other than that, super fun game!

This game used to be a really good game with few bugs, and you could customize your avatar however you wanted too. Now if I press the jump button for too long, it stays stuck, when if your walking for too long your joy stick will make you keep going in that direction. The worst bug is your Perspective, when I jump and accidently open the menu, my Perspective on the screen is stuck on where it was before, and makes it harder to play. I hate the hair update too. üòí

Really good games, a lot fun when playing with friends. Best experience playing is on a computer you have more control than on a mobile device. It's more difficult to play some games than others on mobile. But other than that would highly recommend for people of all ages (being at least 5 and up). Great games and great quality.

Amazing ü§© many games to explore and experience! But the one thing Roblox has to get rid of is the hackers. It isn't fair of how hard people work for their Roblox account and it just goes to waste. Please fix this as best as you can. I have been hacked before and I hated it. I still continue to play now but it's just not fair. I hope you can fix this. Another thing I have noticed is in most of the games we are all blockys. I hope you can fix that too. But overall, the game is great!! Love it!!!

Really fun, but sometimes it glitches. Specifically when I'm listening to music bluetooth and playing a game same time. In general though, sometimes it just kicks me out of games for no reason. It shows up as an "internet issue" but my internet is fine and the game was running smoothly at the time.

This app is very fun and entertaining, this app is just an app where people (who have certain devices) can create games and clothing to allow others to play and create their character. To create a character, most clothing, hair, accessories, etc. are robux which you get from buying gift cards and stuff like that. There are many people who you can interact with and make friends, I have made many friends but I have made a zoom call and hung out with 2 of them, very good way to make online friends

Roblox is a great game, and I've been playing it for years. After switching to playing on my chromebook, it was good and all, but then I encountered a problem. Whenever I join a game- no matter what game, I can't seem to see chat bubbles. Which means in games without a chat box, I can't even talk to people. This only happens on my chromebook, but my iPad works just fine. Overall, Roblox is a great game to play, and it's really fun!

I have had amazing experiences with roblox! since 2018 I have loved this game, before then I wasn't really interested, now I figured I would finally give a review. The only problem I have had and still do have is when i'm playing, it's really slow sometimes and I think it might be my device because I play on a laptop. I thought it was wifi but it can't be because I have used other people's good wifi and I still have the same problem. Other than that this is my very top choice!

I really like roblox and I've been playing it since 2019, it's really fun for when you're bored or just wanna play with friends. It has many games and ofc some little annoying bugs for time to time. I currently can't get to open the app tho, it just shows a black screen and I tried re-downloading it and updating it. Please help me with this problem!

It's an overall alright game, but it seems to always freeze and crash, not letting me use chats and deleting my inventory so I can't access it or anything in it. This is a huge issue which if it wasn't this review would probably be a 5 star review. When it freezes I can't move or look around, this happens around every 2 mins, so I don't play it as often as I used to, I've also stopped buying stuff as when it freezes, it gets rid of everything.

Great app. Gives good opportunity for people to create games for other people. Small problems, though. If I'm playing a game that requires me to drive, or fly, I need to shift my perspective view, which is hard enough on mobile already, and puts me at a disadvantage when getting out of the vehicle to fight other players. All up, though, its a good app.

This game give me a good childhood. There is a very small bugs that impact the game a little bit for mobile. I'm not gonna say it because some already did. The game has a really good system. A really easy way to find friends. Friends limit, resolution, lock screen, zoom, add friends, favourites, profile and many more. I really liked it. I hope you can add more features.

Roblox is a successful and amazing app, really is. But a reason im thinking about taking a break from it: glitch. Every single time i join, after a while, my screen randomly slides down, so that i cant click the jump button. Please fix this, im getting really annoyed about it. Thank you! PS: This was happening on multiple devices, but only on my account.

It's an amazing game but there's a lot of glitch's while playing in mobile. When I play a game, sometimes there would be an annoying glitch, it will go zoom in and out instead of rotating which happens often. And another where is the screen will be stuck, you can move but the screen will be stuck like that. It's very annoying and I have to rejoin the game!! Roblox please fix this..

It's a fantastic game, I must say... But unfortunately it has a lot of lags and it is SO bothersome for us mobile users. I have been gone through STRUGGLES to load a proper game, and it is not my WiFi's fault at all! I have played a lot of games and I haven't gone through the same struggle in Roblox. Sometimes it says I have to reconnect because I got disconnected while my WiFi is on. So please fix it as soon as possible.

The game is very good overall but I'm having a problem regarding the graphics setting because even if I have the graphics at max, I can berly see what's happening in my screen cuz it looks like the whole screen is just censored plsss fix this cas this make the game almost unplayable most of the time, and I know I'm not the only one who is having this problem that's all and I'm hoping u guys can fix this as soon as possible. Thank you for taking the time to read this

Roblox is Amazing! Been playing it since 2018, sure there are some bugs but to be able to play any game online with friends without any ads is great! You can create games,play games,creat clothing and anything you want. Also I have been having this glitch in which the items I brought are not equippable but I can see others wearing the same thing! Sometimes it would let me wear them but it happens several times! I waste my Robux for nothing! Please fix it. Overall the game is great I love it ‚ú®

A fun game to play, and fun to explore many different games like storys, disaster games, water parks, theme parks, and a load of other types of fun games. Really like that you are able to create your own player/character however you want because you can buy many different things for your player/character, you may even be able to find a couple things for free.

I love this game soooo sooooo much the only thing i can say is that sometimes the controls go a bit funny and it takes ages to load when u want a new game but it might be different for u. But it does make up for it as there are so many types of features to you avatar! One of my favourite things to do with these games is the variety of different challenges and characters!

I really like this, but I would like to report 2 bug! 1. Os whenever (sometimes) when I'm playing the game the cam doesn't move when I move in the game it moves along and there a hack if your game has dress up go there and move your avatar, trust me it works! 2. When I go to save my avatar it won't let me unless if I remove the woman's right (or left) arm it will let me then when I go to put it back it's gone! Overall it's a really great game! I think there should be more events!!

Hi there. I am a very big fan of roblox and I have to play it everyday. All the games are good and everything is fab there is just one problem..... The screen is freezing like a lot and the character won't move and I have to restart the whole app. And even if I do restart it the same happens after 5 seconds. Plz fix it as soon as possible

Like every other mobile user I hate when the camera gets stuck and it either zooms in or out only or it doesn't zoom or move at all. Another bug is the bug when you have a lot of items like t-shirts and 90% of them don't show up in the customize menu. The third bug is when it randomly unequips an item that is still equippable and says it isn't. It would be nice if these bugs were fixed and overall it is an amazing game and I really recommend it but not the bad games and inappropriate images.

This game is great, but there are a few things I would like to point out. first, I have been playing this game for over five years and in that time I have run into many problems with hackers, I have voiced this to roblox a few times and so far, very little if any change has been made. I have been added ramdomly has people friends, despite not sending or acceping a requist. I have also run into hate and other problems regarding speech/sterotypes. good game but there are things to watch for.

Very good game. Hundreds of games to entertain yourselves, lot's of free items and even good choices of robux. But what I like most is it's ad-free. It's for any age, privacy settings are there too. But, there's one issue. When you say "hope" twice, it gets tagged on second try. You don't need to tag common stuff. But, Great job on the game.

Hi, I love the game and how the avatars work but I have a few problems. 1: Whenever I'm playing an obby or tower, I press the jump button and it doesn't let me jump. 2: So, I'm playing with my friends and then all of a sudden, I'm just lagging. My internet is on four bars but it keeps doing that for some reason. 3: Once I finish playing Adopt me, it doesn't lead me back to the home page and I have to re-opem Roblox to go onto another game. Please fix these bugs, that would really help

Roblox is a great game. I play it on many devices but one of those devices are a chromebook. I don't know if this is just a me thing but when I play roblox, (Through google play) and I go into full screen if I turn my mouse in a 360 angle, it won't turn because the mouse get's stuck on the side of my screen. Also the settegs tab and chat tab is no longer there. So I have to close the screen to leave. Although this happens on chromebook and maybe some devices it's still a amazing and fun game!

I've been playing since 2018. Great game! However, the moderation is honestly terrible. I also have one issue, I have a lot of items in my inventory and sometimes it won't load. I've tried a lot of times to find the roblox visor in my inventory and it just won't load. I checked, I own the item. Please fix this!

I joined roblox in 2019 and I have really enjoyed the games so far!<3 yet there are times where I have been really frustrated with the game. There were times where I would be logged out for no reason and there have been times where I would lose accounts. There would be bugs and glitches and it would be annoying when playing with friends. But honestly this app brought so many memories with my friends and got me even closer to some of them<3 I highly recommend this if your looking for some fun!

It's a good and fun game, even if the some of the community is kinda gross. There are some problems tho, sometimes (but not often) when i like check my notifs, tap the roblox logo at the top left and resume, etc. The screen goes stuck and when i try to rotate the screen it just zooms in and out, same when i am walking/running. It's still not fixed, pls fix this! And also, in another game , when i search something there, the screen goes a bit lighter

Really the best game ive ever found. But i do want an update where you have a switch to turn on shaders and off, and 2 more, when you reset it ragdolls you, last one. I think i'd want to make my own shirt. Overall, pretty good! Thanks for making roblox! Edit: sometimes your screen gets stuck and you cant move the angle but you can move the jump and walk, and another bug: when you move the angle, it zooms out and in.. please fix this

This is a great game! Just if you play on chromebook with no touch screen you can't play some games and sometimes it won't reconize your chromebook as pc. For example when I play Flee the Facility I can't hit as beast and i can only play as survivor. It also won't let you shift lock in some games and sometimes it extremly laggy. Over all great game!

Roblox do is a really fun game. Roleplays, Obbys, Tycoons, etc. I really like it. But the problem is the camera glitches often. When i try to move my camera left or right, up or down, it instead gets zoomed in or zoomed out. Another glitch, the jump button gets pressed on its own. It's pretty annoying that the player keeps on jumping at one place, for no reason. Please fix these.

Hating this game is to much but still have some bugs to fix. I will give five star if the games better. Its pretty hard for mobile players like me cuz sometimes when I play a game, the screen is gonna freeze into only one directions. So when I move, the screen will start zoom in and out. It's kinda annoying so pls fix this. Not hating, love this game.
author_name: It Just C A N D Y UwU

review_text: Roblox is really good, but I have some issues with it, like when my internet has a great connection but when I play this one game (mm2) and I'm murderer in a non-private server I start lagging for some reason. Other then that, it's perfect and easy to learn how to play! There are games for everyone, so you can have fun by yourself or with friends!

Well its really good! But i have a problem that probably goes with other mobile players.. the problem is usually called "camera glitch" and that happens when you accidentally press the roblox logo.. and i mean the one in games. so when you do that, there are 2 things that would happen, 1: you cant move your camera in any type of direction, just zoom in and out. 2: its like number one, but you can only move your camera freely when you stand still, when you try to move its just zoom in and out.

This app is very fun, i love it! I played it for 4 years. Sometimes it lags.. But its okay! Overall I love it and recommend. The only problem is, Sometimes when i play games it wont let me in and i check my WIFI and the WIFI is very full. Please fix the problem if you can. Oh and also mobile problems. My screen zooms in and out, hope that can be fixable! Please fix all problems we all have if you can, Great app! Thanks.

This game is great and all, but i want to report a bug. Its really annoying and it happens in every game after a few minutes. Because of this, i can't enjoy the games. This bug happens when i move the screen around to look at a different perspective, it instead zooms in. It's just really annoying so please fix this bug. Overall, this game is entertaining.

Yo this game is perfect. Sure it lags but only if you are using an old gadget or an annoying wifi. But my problem is the fact that when sometimes the screen pauses, I can't seem to get it back. And then when I fianlly get it back, I can't move at all, like my character just freezed but I can still press the buttons and stuff. So in turn, I have to rejoin the game which is ANNOYING.

Actually this app is good. Unless about the lag and the fps(not included). But when it comes in entertaining, this is the best because of the features, so many games to play and when the freeze happen (like u can't drag the screen from left to right or right to left. (vice versa) I just click the roblox icon then it came back to normal.

Its pretty good, and there are a variety of games to play. However, there has been a bug that I have been encountering lately, its when for no apparent reason, the screen freezes. I am unable to control my character during this period, and I can't even open the menu to leave. I hope Roblox can look into this.

Roblox is an amazing "experience" as they call it. You can try out different experiences creators have made, customize yourself, play with friends, or create something yourself! One bug/problem, usually in mobile devices roblox can sometimes make you rejoin the game when you leave the experience. It's kind of annoying to have to reload laggy experiences again even though you wanted to exit.

Don't get me wrong, I really enjoy playing this game and tbh I spend most of my time playing this game. There are a lot of different games choices and a lot of game categories selection. There is almost nothing to disappoint you in this game. But there are some minor issues while playing a game with the camera. It sometimes freezes and sometimes it zooms in and out when I try to move / control the camera and its roblox's responsibility to fix it. Otherwise I highly recommend / suggest this game.

I have nothing against this game since its not disappointing at all. But with all the new updates come new glitches. This is such as disconnecting for no reason, having the screen zoomed in an out and with me being the only person moving during a game. This roblox's and only their responsibility to fix. It's still a very nice game as it also doesn't have any ads.

Best experience ever. Multiple games in one app, create your own games I definelty recomend. But there is just one small problem, when switching phones if you have premium the payment goes through but the robux doesn't come in so you have to refresh the subscription and that's a bit frustrating but I can deal. That's why I give it 4 stars. Hope this helps!

I play on a chromebook and the game is very fun. Although, I'm having some issues with the first person in games. Whenever I go in first person, it works just fine. However, whenever I click, my cursor teleports somewhere else on the screen. It happens in every game no matter what, so I cannot play first person shooter games or games that use first person in general. Please fix this bug, it is so annoying and I would like to play Roblox with a working first person.

I really love this game like a lot been playing it for more then 5yr, really recommend it it's been my childhood game, has a lot of options of games to play and more are being made, then the clothes and the avatar are just amazing. but after the new update my PC can't load anything ;-; it just keeps loading so I don't think I'll be able to play unless i buy a new PC, which is going to be really tougher...

Roblox is by far my favourite game. I like to play with friends, and I love how there is a wide variety of games to play. It occasionally glitches, making it so I can't spin my camera view around, or it will activate spam jump. It also tends to make me have to re open the game whenever I leave the app.I'd perfer if there was free robux, but other than that it is fine. Fix these few bugs and it will be a perfect game!

Don't get me wrong, I enjoy playing the different optional games, it's very addictive and fun. Where it's no longer fun is after I die more than two times during a game my character becomes uncontrollable. Whenever I try to move, their movements and the game viewing is like one, I try to move my character foward, I'm looking towards the ceiling for some reason. It's very annoying and makes getting through obstacles difficult. Also hitting reset character, does absolutely nothing. Please fix.

The gameplay is acceptable although they have to put a control customization, the button are small and the positioning is not good for mobile players as it is placed on the corner screen of my phone. The censorship system too. I also came across this bug where the camera gets stuck at a certain angle, it often happens when i take a screenshot. Hope this gets fixed soon. Aside from that, the game is good, really fun with all the game choices and I love the character customization.

I absolutely love this game! I can play mutiple fun exciting games with my friends, or by myself. But there's an irritating problem on mobile, sometimes my screen will freeze In a game. I can still move around but my screen isn't able to move which makes it harder to play. I can only fix this by triggering a cutscene, or literally just leaving. Hopefully this is something easily fixable, I made a lot of progress on a game, and then it froze and I had to leave. It was really annoying, please fix.

Roblox is an awesome game, you can play with friends on different servers. But why i gave this 4 stars is because of 2 "bugs" that happens literally all the time. The first one i a bug that happens in servers. Everytime i did a jump after 3 jumps, my joystick and my screen can't be controlled. The second one is about the app stopping. It would show my ping, cpu, memory, etc on my screen. My phone storage is absolutely fine, but the bugs keeps happening. I hope you can fix it. Thank you.

It's a good app with all types of game. Although, I have a few problems. First, the camera always gets broken, such as being to control it properly or being stuck. Then, the search sytem. Whenever I search for a specific game, numerous unrelated games pop up in the results, sometimes even going first. Events are also turning into grinds which is exhausting. Lastly, almost anything gets censored all the time especially if it's in another language. It's such a hassle trying to communicate.

This amazing app has really feasted my free time. I absolutely loved it! There are so many sets of games and I really am interested into all of them. Not to mention to graphics, max graphics looks amazing, even with the copy and pasted surroundings. I had no problems with this (well sort of) the only thing I'm concerned about is the robux system. I mean, I know you need money, I totally understand, but I think that the items should be a bit cheaper. But I'm glad that it gives you free items!

The games pretty fun because you can play a wide variety and games and such and you can customize your avatar pretty freely. The reason I give it 3 stars it of a glitch that has been happening recently, I don't even know how this glitch triggers but sometimes the camera would just stay stuck or it would just keep on zooming in and out if I wanna move it left or right. It's really annoying and it mostly happens when I just got into the game. I hope they fix this because it makes games unplayable.

It's a great game,and I play it everyday. But the problem I face is that sometimes I get stuck with a zoom in/out glitch, I'm not sure if it only happens with me but whenever I try to move my camera(left,right,down or up)the camera gets zoomed in/out instead,and I have to rejoin. Another glitch that I have experienced is when I try to walk the camera view changes,for example,if I'm trying to walk forward the camera would keep moving to the left or right,it's so annoying,please fix these!

Good app! I usually go here whenever I'm bored! 3 stars? I actually experience lag on games and even when the main menu when you open Roblox, it's also hard for the transitions to show because sometimes they're aren't synced. Also, whenever I play in a mobile, a pointer keeps popping out and it completely makes my menu to laptop layout GUI and it's really annoying. I think this is a bug.

I'd like to report a problem I am experiencing in a very long time 'til now, which I find very frustrating. I encounter this control issue whenever the game lags a bit, which happens most of the time. To be more specific, if I get fps drops, I am unable to swipe my screen to look around. At the mean time, I am only able to fix this problem by leaving and rejoining, which is not an ideal and a right solution if playing with friends. Aside from this, I enjoy the game pretty much. Please fix this.

I really love the game! Been playing since 2015, but the pointless updates are really annoying. Like for example the servers? It looks so complicated, not simple like it used to. Even removing the "location" button on the settings? I am trapped in servers where I cant even understand anyone. I hope you can fix the problems here can bring it back as it used to.

Great game! Its just that i get stuck on shift lock a lot lately, and chat filtering and moderation is not the best, but not the worst, it makes it hard to communicate to others, other than those its a great game to hang out with friends! :) Edit: the new sound is pretty bad :/ but i just gotta deal with it i guess.. But I do get why you are removing it and replacing it with a new oneüò¢ü§®

Good game, GREAT GAME!! Been playing for 7 years now and so far haven't had any major issues aside from crashing, lag, and roblox down. But on mobile, for some reason my screen is zoomed in whenever I go to someone's profile or try to buy robux, etc. It's normal on the homepage though. I'm not sure how to fix it, I've reinstalled it several times and I can't find anything on the internet.

It's a good game, my bad, set of games. However I would recommend making a more wide variation of choices on the games, and to make an offline mode to play games truly anywhere, and anytime. The offline mode is simple, basically private servers with friends joining off, and a saving system. Anyways great game, and I am looking forwards to how you will improve it.

This app is amazing!!!! Just one thing... when it says reconnect, it'd be better if we rejoin the same server not another.. and sometimes I randomly can't move my screen. It will only zoom in and out and when I try to walk like that the screen will move down and it would only show the avatars feet.. and a recommendation please listen to reports people are really mean and you don't do anything about it. Overall this is the best app on my phone <3

This game is really fun, a lot of fun games created by other players to choose to play. But Roblox, i suggest you to fix some control bugs like stucked screen, I can't look around anymore if that happens, plus, it needs improvement. I would also like to see dpad in the control options. And for the mobile users some games are laggy and some don't, so if you can, please make it so i can lower my graphics even more, I don't care if I can't see the textures anymore all i want is good game experience

Roblox is good fun to play with friends, especially the horror games. There are some issues with the game like glitches and sometimes when loading into games my avatar doesn't load correctly. Other than that, I would say roblox is a great game with a diverse range of games and it has something for everyone. I have been playing since 2017 and still enjoy it a lot. I highly recommend the game!!

I actually like the game. But once you get to level 9 of the save dog it's pretty much just luck if the bees aren't going to get it. At level 12 the middle column has a opening at the end of it so you can surround it, but you for some reason can't draw that far down the screen even though there are no obstacles to stop you. I've played games where drawing is no problem, but this one you have to move at a snail pace and it still won't draw right. 1 star till drawing is fixed, 5 stars after.

I honestly feel like the game would be better if it didn't have the save the animal part, it feels like I'm playing two entirely different games. The drawing when doing the save the animal part is glitchy and doesn't always go where you draw it. The paid content pops up abruptly and the button to buy the item shown is almost directly on top of the battle button. I played for about five minutes and almost accidently bought for seperate things. Overall this game just has too much it's trying to do

Audio still plays despite being completely turned off. Also the Clash of Clans tune is in one of the in game features. Unsure why, but that needs to go. There are times where the game will completely freeze or lag. The game itself is massive with a lot of things to do, but it's mostly pay to win. You can play F2P, but you won't be missing out on much. Game gets a bit boring after a few hours and loses appeal as it shoves buy this ads constantly in your face. At least you can save a dog or two.

review_text: Entirely misleading. The gameplay shown in the ads is a small part of the overall game. Strike 1. When you circle the dog to protect it from bees (shown in the ad), it counts down from 10 seconds and, if you survive that long, you win. Except the level doesn't actually end when the timer counts down. I waited like 20 seconds on the second level. Strike 2. Then it tried to get me to do a boss battle thing that had nothing to do with the game and I was done with it. Strike 3.

This game starts you out with loud music and a tutorial that seems never ending. I'm uninstalling it before ever getting out of the tutorial (I've played for 15 min) that LOCKS YOU IN and you can't even get to a menu to turn off a repetitive music. I thought I was going to play a cute game like in the pictures and ads but instead there's this battle card collection thing that could be fun but not as a "surprise you're playing a whole different game" gotcha moment. Just, no!

***Update... stay away from this game! It's a money pit. Downgraded to 2 stars because 100% pay to win. At first it's fun and easy. Then you hit a wall where you cannot progress unless you spend money. Keeps hitting you with micro transactions that suck you in deep. Once your characters hit a certain level, around 80 to 100, better have that wallet ready. To get to that point it's actually fun and easy. Next thing you know your wallets empty.

Bait and switch!! If you are downloading this game to play a simple game protecting dogs from bees like what is in the ad, don't bother. It does have a small amount of that game play, but it requires participation in a completely unrelated and overly complicated superhero battle game.

Feels like 2 games mashed together, I feel misled!! I downloaded for the puzzle/saving animal part, which are the main screenshots featured in the ads. The reality is you also have some weird battle/upgrade heros bit as well, and cannot progress in the animal rescue bits without also doing the battles.

The ads are misleading. I thought I was going to be saving dogs from bees and suddenly I'm fighting bad guys in a comic book style hero collection type game. There are two totally different art styles as well and that threw me for a loop. Not an awful game just not what was advertised.

I should have read the reviews. I thought I was actually downloading a game where I was saving the doge but then I found out I was collecting heroes and fighting enemies. I usually don't trust the ads I see for games but I decided to give this one a go. The ads were definitely misleading.

I saw the Youtube shorts ads and it looked interesting. But you can't just play the dog/bee puzzles. You have to play some dumb hero/fighting game in order to progress with the puzzle levels. I thought the puzzles were interesting but have no interest in the fighting game, so I'm deleting.

It's not just a puzzle game. I mainly got it for the puzzle game, it's also a massive cash grab auto battle game, which with auto battle it's not technically a game. Should allow you to use different abilities each heroes turn like a jrpg, or Pokemon. Make the battles more interactive, and not a cash grab, it'd be a great game by itself. Probably should do the puzzle game by itself, and a battle game as a separate app. Maybe the puzzle game can have a few ads for revenue, maybe $3.99 for ad free

Downloaded what was thought to be a puzzle game of sorts, but in order to gain new levels you have to play this stupid hero battle thing. This wasn't even advertised in the millions of ads I've seen for this ridiculous game. Played for not even 5 minutes before deciding to uninstall. I'd give 0 stars if I could.

Absolutely horrendous execution on a game. By far one of the worst I've seen. You get to play like 2 stages of the game you intended to download, before being forced to play some assault mech card game. Don't waste your time downloading it, the developers are clearly falsely advertising and intentionally misleading you.

Pretty fun, my only issue is I think your game is broken. While fighting, all my characters are full health and the enemy is almost dead...but then it shuts down the match and says I was defeated. This makes absolutely no sense. It has literally HALTED me completely from being able to advance ANY further.

review_text: Full of ads that you cannot suppress, I get an ad every level. Revise: what I thought was ads was what feels like a completely different game, that is integrated with it. They post these pictures, as if you're going to draw little circles and do kid level games, then put you in this horrid strategy style game. This is atrocious.

Not exactly what I wanted. I came for the drawing puzzles, got a completely different game with those puzzles being a side mini game that's locked behind the actual game, and even then they stop being puzzle like real quick. The actual game isn't even that great.

If I could give this game 0 stars I would, I saw this game through an ad and I expected to play a game where I save a dog from a bee swarm, but instead I got that game mixed with some sort of hero card game. That wasn't the only issue however. This game is so glitchy, which became clear as soon as I opened it. The tutorial asked me to press buttons that weren't there, and the bee game didn't work because it wanted me to save the dog but it was stuck on the loading screen. Worst game ever.

Absolutely terrible. You're forced to go through a tutorial of 2 different games. I really couldn't give a **** about the whole heros thing, I just wanna play the dog puzzle game and that's it. The tutorial is unskippable. Very frustrating

The battles are automated but a comic visual appeal to watch! The choices of heroes are highly unique and diversified and the mini game works as it was shown on ads. So far this game is everything it promised it would be, and that's rare on mobile gaming.

Game in ads is very different from the actual game. Very misleading. Takes long to load and can't keep a straight game but keeps going from screen to screen to unlock characters that aren't part of the advertised game.

review_text: The advertising team did an excellent job. I was lured into downloading the game, and quickly realized I wasn't in Kansas anymore. This game is not the same as what's being advertised, I consider my experience with this game to be a waste of time. Shame on the devs for using deceitful tactics to get downloads. The actual game isn't great. The only part of it that stands out might be the art.

Yes, the title is misleading. Information on playstore only for mini game inside actual game. But i somehow managed to beat all the level in that mini game. Actual game actually enjoyable but currently im stuck at 29% at loading screen. Please fix this because i have nothing to spare either to wait for fix, or just delete this game entirely. But anyway the actual game is easy, got to lvl 80 in only 3 days for free player.

I had a similar experience as everyone who saw the ad about saving the dog and I got sucked into the bigger game to unlock more dog levels. However, I didn't find the tutorial to take more than 3 minutes. And after that, it's pretty much straight forward. I grew up playing cards like Magic, YuGiOh and Pokemon and find this game very similar. Relatively easy to level up without everything being behind a paywall. Over all I enjoy the game. Current hero level ~130

You can beat the save the animal but drawing a circle on every single one I found not fun. Then they have a fighting thing you also have to do and it's not that fun. Kinda hoping for a challenge when it comes to games.

Incredibly over produced. I just wanted to save the cats. So complicated the whole game makes no sense. I wanted a nice puzzle game but it requires you to assemble heroes for battles. it's like 3 games combined In a bad way.

I'm loosing my data account, I don't even clear cache or data on the apps. The game ad is very misleading. The ad is all about saving the dog but when you play the game, there is a whole new battle game where you have to do tasks to improve your character stat to battle. 99% of the game is the battle part and the actual game i downloaded for ends after the very first day

Developers sent "VIP" awards to players for spending. I've spent well over $1,000 but when I go to claim the rewards, they are significantly less. Horrible. You play one level of what you see in the ads then it makes you do a bunch of other stuff and battle these heros. I just want to play the levels but there is a 2 minute hero battle with heros I don't care about in between almost every level.

Saw the ad on FB and wanted to play THAT game. Unfortunately, you're forced to play a whole other game in between levels. No way to skip it or otherwise get back to the original game. Absolutely terrible.

Why is this 2 games that you have to progress in one to unlock levels in the other? I'm only interested in the one where you draw to save the dog. That's the game advertised, that's the game you have pics of. But you also have this dumb unrelated game that's a cheap knockoff of a Marvel game I stopped playing. This makes no sense.

This game has nothing to do with saving the doge or artillera. You get 3 levels of it and it goes into a completely different game you have to spend money on to level up. This is not what they advertise it as. You can spend $99.99 for a small amount of coins or diamonds, it's bad.

This was fun for about two days. The portion of the game advertised with bees and a dog head is a very, very small portion of the game. The rest is a ripoff superhero gacha game. Seriously, there is one character who is basically a xerox copy of The Joker from Batman. It's fun until you hit a wall where you can't progress anymore unless you either spend money or wait several days to accumulate rewards to upgrade your characters and keep playing, with the dogs and bees long gone.
First 7-8 levels were an annoying tutorial and mixed in with some kind of strategy games??? It makes no sense. The game I all over the place. Downloaded and Uninstalled in about 5 mins.

The ads and photo previews are completely misleading. I wasn't interested in an rpg game. Disappointed I even downloaded this. I figured I'd just play through the intro and just play the dog part of the game but it's impossible.

This is a blatant example of false advertising. Period. The ads I saw on Facebook were just for saving the dog and every single screenshot of the app in the play store is a screenshot of saving the dog. There is a really lousy required battle game required every level or two of saving the dog. Horrible horrible horrible, immediately uninstalling

Bait and switch. The animal rescue game is a mini game you have to unlock levels in by playing an idle heroes game. It's a grind with poor translations and the sound doesn't turn off when you switch apps or lock your phone.

review_text: Garbage game , it gets stuck on the loading screen every time i want to play a level. It's a mash of other games and loading takes forever even when it doesn't get stuck. And it's not even the game in the advertisement

This is like the developers had two ideas for a game, got drunk, and then mashed the two games together to create something that is somehow both goes and neither game at the same time. Not super excessive with ads, but not entertaining enough to keep playing

Came to save dogs became addicted to hero card game. Really didn't think I'd like it but I do. I know I'm not the only one as it's a large fan base. Lots to do except when you hit higher levels. That's then it slows down and you have to wait each day to gain items and experience. But regardless I'm entertained for now. Give it a try you might like it. Also get to save doggo from the bees! For a few levels anyway ü§£

So far I have had it for 2 days. It is very entertaining and the mechanics are easy enough to learn but hard to master, so you can get into it right away, but have to take some time to learn the strategies of setting up your party, equipment, etc. It is pay to play, but so far I have been able to farm and continue to grow and stay competitive with others online! Just gotta have a little patience in farming for resources. Best of all... NO INTRUSIVE ADS!!!

Totally misleading ads. They let you play only a couple games of protecting the dog against the bees, then throw you into this weird game of cards, totally uninteresting. Looks like they spent a lot of money making that game but people are really interested in the stupidly simple game that they add as a "mini-game" and advertize it to lure uninformed fellas, like me, download their meaningless game that nobody wants. The mini game is better than the game itself, BTW. Uninstalling.

We just want a simple game. Installed this based on the ads but the ads that shown the simplicity of this game by using puzzle drawing base thing is not the actual focus of this thing. Its just literally a miss opportunity by the developer. Could have be the next candy crush but they screwed it up.

The ad shows a drawing game to protect a character from bees, which IS a mini game in this game. However, the main game is a very different sort of card-ish based battle game with completely different aesthetics. The main game is for a completely different audience than the advertised mini game. It's like someone half baked two games and smashed them together. It keeps glitching and exiting mid battle or mid mini game. It's hard to follow exactly what's going on and why.

Terrible nothing like the ad or even in the page, there's this other part of the game play the ad or page doesn't show and its so far off from what they are showing its stupid and boring, and the other part with the dog and bees are also boring and too easy stupid. Also the tutorial is wayyyy to long
Did not work, all it shows is the loading screen and touching the screen causes a bee sound and a failure message, only to repeat again and again. Unplayable.

What even is this? This feels like two entirely different games that, if you want to play one, you're forced to play the other. This is like making Halo a prerequisite to play tennis and vice versa. And the ads only show you one side.

Marketed as: A cute game where you save a cartoon dog from bees. In Reality: A weird game where the dog/bee game can easily be beaten every time by simply drawing a circle, then out of nowhere this big-titted stripper is forcing you to click all if these buttons to play some kind of weird superhero casino game that has plays itself. This is a confusing bait and switch that basically boils down to drawing circles then clicking buttons so strippers can win you gems you don't care about. 0/10

Boring generic sci fi RPG type type game that's advertised as a cute puzzle game and the puzzle game aspect isn't even that interesting. The early levels are just done by drawing a circle then later it mostly comes down to RNG whether you win or not.

So this game is about the most wild case of semi-false advertisment ive seen honestly its both parts hilarious and confusing i recommend downloading it or at least trying to find a video about this game because it is so far from just saving a dog by drawing that its commical. This is one of the only games that ive installed and immediately laughed after doing so haha yeah but even 1 star for this is generous (shame it doesnt let you give 0) Bad translation makes it a complete package.

Just let me save the dog. I am being force fed a heroes game that i don't care about, only able to click one pixel on the screen at a time in such a way that i only clicked in order to return to the bee and dog game. It's like having a bite of food and then having to solve a rubik's cube before your next bite.

Because of the ads I thought saving the dog from bees would be the game but it's a hero collecting and fighting game. The two themes are completely unrelated I don't understand the correlation. It seems sloppy and random. These should be two different games

Another game using ads to mislead potential players...what a surprise. review_text: Honestly one of the best games I've ever played. The game is very user friendly, and it not only keeps you engaged, but it makes you want to play it more without having to pay to get rid of annoying ads like a lot of games. In game content that is purchasable with real world money is an option, but by no means a must to actually enjoy the game or to progress in the game. This game actually WANTS you to progress and enjoy it. Truly a breath of fresh air from a lot of other mobile games out there.

Don't let their ads fool you, this game is way more than drawing to save the animal from the killer bees. It's your casual idle rpg game with a comic book style to it. Arena, guild, tower crawl etc with the merge heroes to upgrade them. Im enjoying it, not to many issues except for apparently using illegal text for guild notice (Welcome to daily players, 3 days inactive auto kick unless for notice of coming back, don't forget to change your name top left profile).

I hope I can continue to optimize the character design and the content of the story chapter activities. Anyway, I think the content is very novel. It's enjoyable.Fun-very fun; good on-hook game, first choice for killing time~ It's getting more and more fun. Try to upgrade.I accidentally downloaded this game~ I tried it and it was really fun~ Stay on your phone and play every day.

Epic boss battles where you do pretty much nothing and that have absolutely nothing to do with the dog/bee game. A whole random interface with a million inexplicable buttons to press for no reason at all in between levels. It's actually hilarious
