review_text: Out of idle curiosity, and because it was 2.99 (plus tax) and I didn't want to deal with ads anymore, I purchased no ads. However, after doing so, basically nothing changed. Everything that was trapped behind an ad (spinning the wheel, getting bonus money at the end of the round, etc.) was still trapped behind an ad. The purchase was essentially a lie and I will be requesting a refund.

DO NOT PAY TO REMOVE ADS! it's a waste. They still try to push ads every 20 seconds. Game crashes after every level almost. I thought removing ads would make the game playable but I was wrong. This is one of the buggiest app games I've ever played. At least 60% of the ads I watched for upgrades didn't go through and I never got the upgrade or completely lost a level because it crashed mid add. I like the concept of the game but this is unplayable. Fix your bugs before releasing a game.

Got to a certain level point and after defeating a boss the game wouldn't trigger to end the match. After several restarts and clearing cache didn't work I attempted to clear the data which reset my level to 1 so I will be uninstalling. The ads are annoying and the levels are very short, especially when you get to a higher level. It's a fun game at first but gets boring quickly.

This game, and games like it, are HORRIBLE! You play one round then have to watch ad after ad! You want to move to the next round? Watch an ad. You want money for upgrades? Watch an ad. You want to actually upgrade? Use money once, but then watch ads. Plus each ad is thirty seconds long, but when it's over, you have an extra 12 to 15 second countdown before the X appears to actually close the ad! These games are a complete waste of time and aren't fun at all! Don't download!

Number one reason I gave one star is because this game does not keep accurate track of your progress. After a level you can level up by paying game money. I got into the mid 20s in levels for manpower and years and after I finished another level it knocked me back down to the teens. Happened 3 different times. Second, I am NOT usually one to complain about ads. I get it. Takes money to make money. But this is EXCESSIVE. There is a forced ad, follow by multiple "opportunity" ads.

Game seems passable in quality, but the ads are insanely aggressive. I don't mind putting the phone down for a bit every once in a while, but here it's too often and for too long. Some ads require multiple steps to fully dismiss to get back to the game. Other reviews mention paying for no ads doesn't remove them all either. It's a shame really.

Got to level 5 before I gave up. When you do anything, there's at least 1 wait screen while they are trying to get you to watch a video. You want to do anything? Watch a video. You want that costume you've been slowly building for 5 levels? Watch an ad. Beat a level? Ad. Just too much. Can't play offline, either as one of the wait screens has the button disabled to continue. All that and then the game was very basic.

It's a pointless game with pointless upgrades and secondary grind game. In between every level you have to watch at least one ad and in between every action during the secondary game. I even tried buying the ad-free version just because I had nothing better to do and the ads were egregious, but even after that I was still forced to watch every single ad. Avoid this game like the plague it is.

It is possible to play this without watching any ads, but most of the progression is locked behind viewing an ad. You will see a "No Ads" IAP for $2.99, DON'T BUY IT! All it does is remove the small banner ads at the bottom of the screen, the game still asks you to watch an ad to unlock items, unlock characters, or get more than the minimum currency from a round.

I actually enjoy the base game. However, you pay 2.99 to remove ads and basically nothing changes. You are still completely inundated with ads all over the place. You basically cannot do anything or make a choice without watching an ad. I gave this game 2 stars instead of 1 because I still like the actual game. If it lived up to it's remove ads promise.

This game and games like it are basically ransomware, except specifically doe the game. You get pop up ads all the time and if you purchase the "no ad" feature it simply removes the pop up ads, not the ones you would click to watch. Specific to this game, there is no advancement that can be made in the castle area either due to bugs in the game, but the developers got the money from the ad purchases, so why would they fix it?

watched 5 ads before even starting level 3, then had to pop up asking me what I think of the game. Ad after every level and be careful of the big green button after finishing a level cause it'll show you another ad after choosing your reward. It's the option to watch an ad to get another reward after the first but they put it as the biggest button for that reason.

tons of buggy problems, it is IMPOSSIBLE to progress. -daily mission to get the gold robot "acquire two pets". If you already have all of the pets, the robot is unattainable. So you're getting punished for having progressed too fast before daily missions existed -in castle mode, it often sends you to fight someone who is already dead. This freezes the game and you must force quit. When you return, you have lost all of your coins. It is literally impossible to get past stone age. -Don't bother!

Tried the game based on the ad, thinking it can't be that hard. I have played 5 levels and managed to spend twice much time watching ads vs playing the game. I end up watching two or three ads after every level. Between the standard ad for playing without ads, there is the watch an ad for more money (needed to make levels easier) and the ad to keep the stuff you just finished the level with. They lean very hard into the whole make the experience with ads unbearable to get the user to upgrade

It's a great game but in most of these games you rather have to buy before the level or after,which is really annoying and makes it harder to control what you buy. but other then that it is an awesome game and I'm only like on level 3 and I was ready to make my review. DEFINITELY RECOMMENDED!!!! if you like upgrading attacking crouds

I was delighted to find that the game plays the same as the adds show. Speaking of adds, i dont mind the constant adds on the game. Its annoying, sure, but i think ots part of the fun to binge 10 adds and get some cool equipment or raise stats. The two star review comes from me playing the game for a month and suddenly im on a level with no board, no obstacles, no enemies, and no perceivable end. Its just my army running on a blank blue screen. Tome to uninstall i guess.

Ads everywhere, even after I paid to remove the ads, every five seconds i get asked to view an ad to get some power up. The levels also barely progress, I'm on level 50 and it's basically the same difficulty as level 1. Shame because it could be a good game, but they just want you to view ads.

I downloaded just to see how bad the ads were after reading the reviews...wow these are definitely some of the greediest developers I've seen so far. Turned on airplane mode to end the ads and just try the game. Played to level 70 which took a lot less time than you'd think. The game never got better or even more challenging...absolutely stupid game. Uninstalling

Get past the multiple adds every level. The game breaks at the higher levels when you've fully upgraded. Gets very laggy, and stuck at the end of the levels due to the crowd being too large. It's also mindless game, just aim for the larger number and avoid a few obstacles, which again becomes impossible as higher upgrades due to the crowd being too crowed.

Game is fun. Ads are annoying, but I can deal with it. I would've given it 5 stars, but the game is glitched and I cannot get passed level 60. I beat the boss every time, but no ad pops up to continue on with the levels. Game freezes up. Please fix it

Levels are way too short! They should honestly make it more like subway surfers or temple run. And WAY TOO MANY ADDS! I can't get continue the game because the ads are overwhelming. Unfortunate really. I really like the fundamental game play, but just when I'm getting into it, it ends abruptly and I am ambushed with ads.

the game play is great. the ads are horrendous. take out half of them at least and you'll have a far better game After playing a few more levels I decided to change my review. There's ads twice between levels. It's literally more advertising than game. It's a shame because the game REALLY is good but I'm definitely not giving you creators my money for ad free play considering how greedy you seem to be it'd only be a few more levels till its pay to win. 0/5 stars if possible, do better.

Great game concept! But you have to watch ads to upgrade item damage or time warp, then the videos freeze and locks up the game so you lose the item you were trying to get is my biggest issue. Other than that the game play is very choppy and glitchy and it's not a device or internet issue because none of my other better quality games (Ark Survival: Evolved) experience this problem and we have the absolute best internet and speed on the market! Fix these issues and I will gladly fix my rating.

Mehhh... Man... It is good, very fun and easy if your good at quick math. Great practice for quick math as well if you have a kiddo. But honestly it unlocks very nice things and all you have to do is watch a video for it... But press the button and it doesn't work. Rapidly press the button, doesn't work. For money, skins, upgrades... Of course, the works. Sooo I mean, if you like being shown great things you can't actually get/buy with game money, don't waste your time....

Okay so I actually played for decent amount of time and I can say for sure, this game is trash. If you play long enough to upgrade your damage past level 17, you will find that anytime you want to upgrade again, it drops you back down to level 16.. EVERYTIME. Also, nothing advances past aliens at year 8000 or so. I got up to year 13000 and it's still the same aliens. Nothing changes, the game is the same the whole time regardless of upgrades. Im at level 72 and haven't lost. It's not fun.

I was morbidly curious from insane amount of ads for it. I've gotten through level 50 and can confidently say that this game is terrible. It's more like a bunch of ads with some gameplay wrapped around it. The game is crazy easy and gets boring fast. Skip this game. This game is littered with ads. You picked up a new item, watch an ad to keep it! You qualify for a level up, watch an ad to get it! You get a bonus level, watch an ad to play it! You played enough levels, time for an ad!

Do not download! Yea, the game is great for a few levels, and the ads are bearable, but after level 5 the game just stops working. It offers an add for more money, with no option to decline. Even after closing and re opening the game, and restarting my phone, it still remains there. You are just going to uninstall the game later anyway, so do not download it.

Game doesn't get any harder no matter how much you progress. You'd think it would but I'm at level 127 and it's just way to easy. I wish it were more fun. Definitely has potential but it needs more time in the oven for sure. I guess it's not supposed to be fun though considering the amount of ads you're bombarded with. I paid for the no ads version and it got rid of the ads but it revealed that the game is an empty game with no real challenge.

Even with the paid version, you get spammed with ads for the good stuff. If you upgrade your fire rate past a certain point the bonus levels become a drag because the game limits the amount of projectiles on screen so you become a zero ranged team that. That's assuming it doesn't bug out and just shoot past the money bags. All in all, terrible game, don't recommend it.

Buggy. On the second level, or third, game slowed down considerably. My guys weren't marching, they were teleporting from side to side to avoid obstacles. Took my finger off the screen to prevent moving towards an obstacle, and they walked straight through the barricade, eliminated two of the guys at the end, then continued sort of teleporting down the platform before doing so on open air. Would've gone on for eternity if I hadn't exited. I like the idea of the game, and want to see it fixed.

Basically HAVE to watch all the ads to make progress. And then the ads are wonky and don't go through properly and 1/4 of the time. So you gotta play through the same level again AND watch ANOTHER ad to get the thing that should have already been given to you. Unless you have the patience for all the ads, this isn't for you. I'm about to just delete it myself. Interesting idea but too glitchy and too many ads. And constantly closing YouTube even when it's in the background. Infuriating.

Don't waste your time. It's basically ads with bad gameplay wrapped around it. Though, you can earn currency that lets you upgrade stats. I was level 17 fire rate, paid in game currency to upgrade (after watching an ad to get currency mind you) and it upgraded from level 16 to 17. If that makes sense, this is the game for you. If you enjoy 15 seconds of gameplay, followed by 1+minutes in ads go for it. Everyone else, just stare at a light bulb for 30 seconds. About the same level of enjoyment.

I'm morbidly curious at how bad these games are everytime I see them advertised. I know they're going to be loaded with ads, but the game itself just looks so dumb in the advertisement I'm honestly intrigued by how it could be entertaining at all. Answer is, it isn't. The actual game is worse than the ad. And you'll watch three ads to get a "bonus level," and the bonus level will crash halfway through, forcing you to watch the ads again. It's essentially a complete scam.

The game play is fine but incredibly short lived. Then you have to watch at least a minute of ads for the next level. 2+ minutes to get the bonuses. The levels take maybe 20-30 seconds so the ad time on this game is literally insane. It makes it unplayable. Might as well download commercials and just watch them back to back üôÑüôÑ

Made it to level 6. Game was exactly as advertised. Surprisingly laggy. I had far more trouble with lag than with advertisements, and the ads were buggy too. Then a pop up prevented me from playing, saying I had to watch an ad to continue, but the button to watch the ad didn't work. Closing and reopening the game did not remove the frozen pop up. Could be a meh time waster with fixes, not currently fit to be called a game.

2 stars instead of one because I like the concept . Waaaay to many " watch a 30 sec add to quadruple your loot". So much you spend about half the time playing waiting to be able to click "no thanks" Second, game crashes CONSTANTLY. That may be due to my network cutting off but still. Try if you must, you'll get tired quick.

The concept is great! Whats not great is the extreme lag and buggy game play. I looked past it at first because the game was still enjoyable at first. Then i start getting offers for power ups if i watch an add. I watch the adds nothing except the game lags even more. I tryed 4 times with the adds until finally the game froze. Then my entire device started to freeze and stopped working. Which now brings me to here to Uninstall the game. Fix the game and im sure a lot of us will be back.

If you love ads, get it. It COULD be a good game but you have to watch an ad everytime you pass a level (each level takes about 20 seconds to do), then if you want to collect the reward for that level, watch another 30 second ad. If you want to claim the things you collect during the level, watch another ad. Want to upgrade, yet another ad. So if you want to play for 30 seconds and then watch 3 minutes worth of ads, download now!

Ads overwhelmed me. I caved and paid the 2.99 for no ads. Now I can't watch any ads at all to get the perks. Game is getting harder and I can't upgrade my attributes due to not being able to watch any ads or claim the perks. Edit: as soon as I left this review that problem fixed itself. Now the app blacks out during adds and doesn't recover. Progress isn't saved upon app restart. Damage resets itself, and I dont get the coins back, game freezes when you get a lot of people, almost unplayable.

The ads are actually garbage. After every single round you can get a gun, oh watch an ad to keep it end of the round! You qualify for a new evolution at a certain level? WATCH AN AD. Oh, you want to get more money with a little ad gamble? Well, here you can! Want to get a new pet? Guess what? AD The game is so goddamn easy, and if anyone wants to have a remotely good time they should turn their internet off and play. Oh yeah, also forgot to say random ads after every other level. Im out of words

I mean, it's your typical ad-crazy app game. Luckily, it doesn't require internet, so they were bypassable with airplane mode, but wouldn't let me get past level 178. I played the level probably 3 times before giving up. Good for a time-waster or road trip game, though. Not much thinking really has to be done to beat the levels.

Fun game...if it just worked! Every single time an ad plays it crashes, which is every single level. ü§¨ You only get your rewards half the time because most of the crashes cause u to have to replay the level u just did. Bottom line is this game has some serious bugs to fix.

Gameplay: Absolutely terrible trying to play this game. Your crowd tps around around so you hit things that you don't want to hit. Also sometimes I go through a door thingy and I don't even get the years or people. Progress: The only way to actually progress in the game is to watch ads, which don't even work. When I press on the watch ad button it doesn't even do anything, and whenever it does work it doesn't even give me anything. Pretty much one of the worst mobile games I have played.

Paying for ad removal does not remove ads. A glitch in the + damage upgrade makes it reset to level 16 when you leave the page and try to level it up when you come back to it to upgrade. I got to level 35 damage, go through a round with my crowd, hit upgrade damage again at the end and bam, just paid in game currency to drop to level 16. Aweful and disappointing.

Just wanted to download it for a second so that I can give this horrible review about this app's stupid ad. Firstly and obviously the gameplay was intentionally terrible as always, but the most annoying part had to be the volume of the sound. This ad popped up and out of nowhere this awful sound, just random grinding and buzzing noizes played at an insane level of volume, my volume was at about 50%-60% volume, and I turned it down to nearly 0% and I could still clearly hear it. I'm mad.

Been playing it for about 3 minutes so far...one third of that time has been advertisements. In this game, unlike others, you are FORCED to watch the ads to advance to the next level, and that is EVERY SINGLE LEVEL. The worst part of it is you cannot pay for the game itself and skip the ads. that would even be reasonable.

Ad freaking ridden... To many ads. Nearly unplayable. Each level takes about 30 seconds to beat and you'll spend at least that long watching ad videos. You can double, or triple that if you want the double points, etc. I get an ad here and there. This is ridiculous. Good bye.

Well, it was 4 starts until I figured out that there is zero ram optimization. After about 7 minutes of playing the games starts to run at about 15fps on my Google pixel 6 pro. Close it and it's back to normal. Makes my whole phone heat up and the ads get more intrusive the longer you play. Too bad, the game is actually fun but it's just another ad hungry time waster that is just not worth playing....

Most of the weapons firing stop short most of the time in front of the beings instead of firing most of the length of the area they are supposed to fire. This bug makes it hard to kill all of the enemy. I have played 50+ levels and their is little to no skill needed to play the game. Just something to play when you have a few minutes of waiting.

Don't bother buying the no ads. The only ads that'll disappear is when you skip the additional rewards that requires you to watch an ad for. Everything you can get from the shop and spin reward is free, but you'll have to watch an ad for. Upgrading rapid fire, power, years, and manpower will reach its limit and that makes all your in game currency useless and must have to watch ads to upgrade. Having to much manpower will lag the game. Ads everytime for anything.

The ad for the game says no one has beat level 99. Well, I suppose it is true because the game glitches at level 92 and you just run endlessly on a blank level with no end point. Up until that point, it was a nice, easy distraction for when I am too tired to do anything productive, but not tired enough to fall asleep.

Im only giving two stars because the base idea of the game is actually fun however even if you purchase the no ads for 2.99 you still constantly have ads shoved at you. For example, you want to unlock any guns or pets or skins? Watch an ad. I at one point had both of the starting upgrades locked behind watch an ad and get these for free. I played 6 levels after that happened figuring it would change, nope they were locked behind ads the whole time.

So I downloaded this game because I was seeing all of those stupid ads for these kinds of games and thought it might be actually fun. It kind of is but the absolute onslaught of ads and terrible notifications spamming you to play the game is atrocious. Every single action you take in this game is met with an ad and the gameplay is a buggy, stuttering mess. Add to that apparently from other reviews the paid version still has ads!?! What a ripoff. Stay away from these kinds of games.

This game is as basic as the ads show it to be, it is just simple math and you win. On top of that I highly recommend against playing this, as it is just a lazily made game like many that fester thr mobile market that is clearly just made to fill it with ads and make a quick buck. there is an ad after every level (mandatory), and you can watch ads to increase stats higher faster, it is as basic as you can get.

Does it ever get challenging? I've gotten past lv 100 in less than 2 hrs and haven't upgraded since lv 70. There's no challenge to this game at all. If you can do basic math you literally walk right through every level. The enemies don't even get stronger as the game progresses. Pretty boring.

Not a bad game overall. Ads are pretty frequent but not required to play. On MY plays, I lost 10 levels of damage (going from 27 to 17) after viewing a single ad, and the prize wheel landed on +$300 on 8 consecutive spins, even after closing the app and restarting, despite it being only one of 8 slices on the wheel. Pretty interesting application of a specific game mechanic, with the time period aspect. I give it 1 üëçüèª.

For the sake of maximum gameplay, I didnt unlock anything other than stats. Breakdown of the game: Good time passer if you're bored. Bugged at a max 36 fire rate (no change after 20), 16 damage. Will glitch you down levels if you try higher. Max alien at 8000. Best fire rate is 4500 year. You can level evolution years and additional troops, but the game play gets stale. 2/5 cause of bugs, not much substance in terms of levels, an over-saturated amount of ads (between every level and reward)

Ads galore. Hit X button, wait 3 seconds, hit the skip button. Or hit the skip button, wait 3 seconds, then hit the skip button. Every little thing is leads to ads. When you get the ad for State of Survival and you have to play the mini game to get out of the ad. It's locked and you'll perpetually be lead to the app on the store. Only way to get out, close the game. Then you lose the reward that was locked behind the ad.

Using the method that someone mentioned in a comment, the game was fine. I had 1 ad pop up on me, and I was able to get through 50+ levels without any issues. Some things definitely need to be tweaked, but it's a great start. I did keep running into an issue where if I had too many guys on the field, if i went to pass through a gate to get more years, it would also trip the other gate causing me to lose years or something else. Yet, that wouldn't happen if it was another green gate. Keep it up.

The game was fun, but it is way too easy and is better for people who like passive games. By the time you get to the boss, you are extremely OP, and the levels are super short with 30 second ads between them. Also, the year tracker makes no sense and assumes modern time is the year 4000 and aliens come / came in 5500. Would recommend something else.

It's just ads after ads. At the end of the match you get an ad. Than you've got to wait and click no to three other ads they try to get you to watch for a reward. Afterwards you get to watch another ad before you can start another level. Otherwise the game has zero challenge and it's really decent at killing time. There's no challenge so you really don't have to worry s out failing unless you choose to just do bad.

The game is semi fun ant the beginning but it gets very very boring after a day. You never have to put in even a little effort to win a level. You have a damage upgrade but it is essentially useless because every enemy dies in one shot no matter what year you are. Yes there are alot of ads but for that you can easily turn off your internet, you do loose out on being able to unlock certain items by watching a ad but i never saw the need to give myself a advantage.

Unfortunately too many ads to be enjoyable, paid the 2.99 to disable but I still got ads. Found myself feeling conned. The game lack a degree of challenge for the most part, the levels are slow and doesn't seem to present a progressive difficulty to keep me interested. Kept me occupied for an hour, don't think I would play again.

As both a software developer and an end user, the game idea is pretty fun but completely overtaken by too many ads even if you click "no thanks". Just like many other hyper casual ones that popup in other ads... Also, at level 12 my troops started running endlessly into nothing so the game itself is broken. Terrible, wouldn't recommend downloading at all. Please fix the bug at least and improve the business model of possible.

No internet access = no game Yes you read that right: basically if you block internet access (read that as: ADS) to the game, you get stuck as soon as you finish that first tutorial like mission. You don't get to click on "no thanks", you just can't do anything because you can't play the ad, and that's your only actual choice

Interesting concept with the evolution but poorly executed. It's way too easy and there's not even any sounds. The end wave of each level is always the exact composition of very weak enemies. There's so many things they could have implemented to make this an interesting, but it's just another lazy mobile game with barely any effort put into it. There's also way too many ads so its better to turn off wifi to play this, not that you'd want to.

I played it so you don't have to. I wanted to see if this "game" was anything like the stupid ads you see all the time. This thing is so inundated with advertisements that you spend 75% of your time waiting for for them to complete. When you are actually playing there is no challenge and once you upgrade a bit you can never lose. Do waste your storage on this junk.

Yes there are a lot of ads. After each level you will get one that can be skipped after a few seconds. You can opt to watch longer ads for bonus features. Basically the same as every other mobile game ever. Having said that, I found the game reasonably fun. There's one massive glaring issue though. It doesn't actually get any harder after level 20 or so. The game is unbelievably easy and for that reason, is a complete waste of tine

I actually despise this game after "playing" it for a couple of hours. I put "play" between quotes because in the time I've been playing I've not actually played a whole lot. EVERY SINGLE round of this game is followed up by at least 1 add of roughly 15 to 20 seconds, along with a variable 1 to 3 "special offers" to receive in game items in return for watching an add. In addition to the extreme amount of adds, the gameplay is lackluster and in no way interesting. It's nog a challenge at all.

To start with the game was good but as I'm going up the levels and upgrading. All of a sudden it put all my things back to level 16 and I have to upgrade them again. It's done this que a few times now and it's really starting to get annoying to the point I'm going to uninstall it. Also there are way too many adverts after each level and it takes longer to watch them than doing the level.

Literally never played a worse game. Super easy to complete and not optimized at all. Very quickly I started having bigger groups of people and it got unbelievably laggy to the point where going through gates didn't even do anything. Once it lagged so bad that at the end of a level the characters kept going after the finish and the level never ended. That was the last straw. I'm uninstalling it.

I hacked this game to test its functionality. It turns out, if you were to invest loads of time into watching ads to get the best gear, you would be wasting your time- once you level up your 'crowd' enough, the game starts to lag and glitch out and becomes unplayable. It couldnt be more obvious that all they care about is getting you to watch the ads so they make money, then leave you high and dry.

It conveniently stops working when you're about to get free things, also it stops when you're about to move thru the right door and even when you do go thru the right door its sooooo laggy that it doesn't even register the points. And I can't believe im saying this but the adds dont work, when you want to watch an add to get something free it doesnt open anything.

The game crashed after first level. But let me tell you the experrience. Played lvl 1 for 15 seconds. FORCED to watch 2 unskippable adds, came back and game became unresponsive. Closed the game, tried again, same result. I know this game was ads watcher but I never expected to be actually unplayable at all. Shame.

This game asks you if you want to watch an add to earn an extra reward. If you choose no, they still force you to watch the add, you just don't get the reward. I understand they need adds to make money but when you spend more time watching adds than playing the game, it's time to uninstall. Also the game is pretty mediocre.

Not only is this an ad-fest, which was to be expected, you have see one after every couple of runs, watching ads is your main currency in the game as you can't unlock anything without it, and it keeps prompting you to watch ads to unluck more stuff, after some runs I had to skip 3 prompts before starting the next one. It's just shameful.

The game is fun but there's a screen with a blue character, gun and money (bonus) that wants you to watch a video and it doesn't work, that screen stops the game. I tried to watch the video but it doesn't let me and neither does pressing back helps... the game just stays in limbo. Please fix that. I know the adds are important but please add an X button to those screens, allow us to chose NOT to take a bonus because the game crashes due to that...

Even if you skip the ads for extra bonuses it'll still give you an increasing amount of ads over time between levels. Levels are simple and quick, so you can spend more time watching ads than actually playing the game. Classic underhanded tactic of asking you to leave a review before the level that the ads start at though, really dirty move by developers and I hope everyone reading this also leaves a 1 star review.

Don't waste your time with this one, the app dev cripples the game so you can't advance past levels when you disconnect your device from the web, and then when you do connect to move forward, forces ads on you. Would rate 0 stars if that were an option. Unistalling

I think you play for around 10 seconds only to have a 30 second advert and something completely unskippable come up and plead with you to download it. Terrible adverts, terrible balance between ads and play time. Extremely basic game anyway. Total rip off of your time and resources. You'd be better off making your own version of this game.

Too much wait time. I payed for the NoAdds so I expected to do more gaming time and less wait time. Home er. Each time you end a mission you are offered a reward if you watch an add. Even if you choose not to see the add, you still have to wait 5 sec for the "No thanks" option. This mechanic is many places in the game so you spend a lot of time waiting and too little time Gaming...

Game is what it advertises, but its pretty much unplayable because you will have to watch a 30s every 20s. It's basically a ad watching simulator. Plus you will get a spam of push notifications reminding you to play the game and that is kind of annoying. Would not recommend, its not a great expirience overall, but 2 stars because its advertised correctly.

Finishing the first level results in an endless ad loop that you can't escape without exiting the game. Then you start back at the beginning. Impossible to move on to level 2. I would give it zero stars if possible since it's essentially non-functional.

Terrible Experience!!! I've never dealt with so many ads. 20 seconds of play, 2 minutes of ads, and you have to close the ad as much as 4 times! I don't mind some ads generated revenue, but this is ridiculous! Deleting game!

Won't let me get past lvl 3. I beat the lvl 10 plus times, but it just gets stuck on the s reen with the guy and the ray gun and won't go further and if I try to reload it just starts the lvl all over again. I really enjoyed this game, but I can't make any progress with it till this bug is fixed.

Sometimes I'll click on an item to unlock it with an ad and it just won't move to the ad screen. Also why is it that the more people we have in our group, the shorter our firing distance? I had a pretty good size group and the bullets were stopping right in front of me! The daily mission system is flawed of we have to keep unlocking guns and pets every day. Eventually we can't unlock anything else? The character unlock screen never goes to 100%, even after 20 runs.

Ad ad ad ad ad. The game is not bad but to do anything in this game, you have to watch a 30sec ad with another 6 sec ad just to progress. If you try to avoid all 'free' items by not watching ads, there are still short ads between levels and screens that make this game horrible to play. The forced ads play longer than it takes to complete a level meaning if you play this for 10 mins, you will definitely watch 5 mins of ads. Waste of time

The levels are literally less than a minute long and you're forced to watch ads that are longer than the levels themselves. Everything you "unlock" needs you to watch an ad first before you can claim. There is no tutorial or anything that really shows you what to do in the game either. This isn't a mobile game, it's one big ad targeted to kids to get them to accidentally buy things. 0/10. Burn this game with fire. Oh and I only played for like 10 minutes.

Fun for a short while as it's still the same thing all over again with no difficulty change, evolution etc. Plus it's full of ads...and I mean full. You spend more time on ads then playing and that says something.

Good only to scratch the itch from the ads you see from ads of other games, that usually do not have this type of gameplay inthe actual game. I wasted more time in actually watching ads on this, thinking it was helping me get stronger. Today I started a new game, while using an AdBlock for games from FDroid. I can tell you that even without watching any ads, because due to the AdBlock even if I wanted I could not, I only died once on LVL 38. I stopped playing on LVL 52. I scratched enough!

Is a fun little time sink, however as others have said, there is a lot of ads.. I paid ¬£2.99 to have "No ads" but shock horror it only stops the ads after every level, if you want to unlock anything or do bonus levels etc you STILL have to watch an ad. The "No Ads" purchase is a con and false advertising!

I liked the game it was simple but fun. When I got a new phone I had to start over. After paying awhile and leveling up again I ran into some error whenever I start my characters are just running into a blue abyss. Had to reinstall game and lost it all again.

I don't like leaving bad reviews but the amount of ads in this game truly take away from the fun of it. Even if you pay and removed the ads you still get spammed with ads left and right. For the record I've played other games from this dev before and they are great so I know you can do better. I wouldn't recommend right now, download at your own risk.

So it's cool I do like it ads are a little invasive but whatever.. my problem is once you play for awhile.. and I mean more than five minutes it gets super buggy.. even when I turn my data off so there's no ads but while that does help my game ends up crashing anyway.. cool just too buggy

This game is fun, but the ad buttons don't work most the time, and you have to watch ads to get pets, weapons, and extra cash. Since I can't access most of the ads, I am constantly losing out on all the bonuses. I'll try again another time.

Should be a browser game. There is roughly an advert (or two) for each level, your constantly forced to wait to skip watching a video if you don't want an in game upgrade. Some last easily over a minute, which makes this game primarily adverts. Uninstalled for that reason, otherwise the game is a fun time killer.

The better you are, the worse the game gets. I've gotten my "crowd" so large, that the game gets stuck at the end of a boss level. I want a refund also because it is supposed to remove ads, but in order to play anything, you must watch an ad.

The game itself is a great time consumer and fun to play. However, even with the "Ad Free" purchase, any upgrades and bonuses still require watching an ad. Total rip-off and the reason it only gets two stars from me.

If I could I would rate it a zero. I finished level one and when I tried to press "no thanks"(when it asked if I wanted to double my earnings) it wouldn't work, so I clicked yes, watched the video, and yet my next level still didn't appear, definitely deleting.

I don't understand why this game, this simple game lags more than pub-g mobile. It laga so bad that sometimes you can't even run through the gates, you just glitch past them. The enemies also don't move, don't attack and are super easy to kill- if the game didn't lag so bad that your projectiles would actually hit them. This isn't even mentioning the ads that you'll get. Some of them will even stop you from closing the app... Or even turning off your phone.

Game concept is good...But it looks like the game has been specifically designed to suck the money out of advertisers. From crossing a level to a character upgrade...U have to watch an ad for each & everything. I am going to uninstall it soon...Too much ads

Is what it is, time killer. Easy game to play with. Yes, it has ads, but is from a small dev so that is the current model. I'm currently maxed all levels, just waiting for next ahe to open up. Also, being 150 tech and crowd, think it is causing bugs at finish as levels won't give me cash or stars.

I paid for the game because of the amount of ads. But the only ads you take out are the ones between levels. You literally have an ad for every single action. Very annoying and not worth paying for. The game is super fun other wise.

Locks up and too many ads. Gets to the end of a level and since you have a bunch of figures it seems the screen can't render the vertical scale and the level never ends. Also 90% of the time is spent watching ads.

Decided to try the No Ads experience. What a scam. Ads absolutely everywhere. Extra cash at the end of a level. Unlocking new skins, repeat attacks on camps, all locked behind adverts even AFTER paying for no ads. Gameplay is actually fun so I've gone for 2 stars but the developers should feel ashamed. The misleading expectations here are disgusting.

Way too many ads. Levels only last 2 mins then more ads. No challenge and game play is bland. Upgrades, years, and enemies feel pointless. You can win with upgrade but forced to choose. Feels like this game was creative for ads to generate money.

Seriously, kudos for developing a simple-to-be-addicting game, but the fact that each level lasts about 10-15 seconds, but you're bombarded by forced ads or other F2P ads left and right, played it for less than 10 minutes and it's already uninstalled. Hope there's no way to delete reviews coz this one needs to stay

Dont waste your time. Literally cannot move past the end of the first round. There's an option to watch an add and get bonus points, but when you click that it just ends up back at the same screen. There's a "No thanks" option that doesn't work, so you can't move forward in the game. If I could give no stars, I would.

Well its pretty good but the levels are not near long enough. The ads are not horrible, a forced ad here n there but mainly by choice to get extra stuff. It would be soooo much better if the levels were longer than 15 seconds n maybe a bit harder too.

the game is fun, but each level is 10 seconds long, but then the ads are 30 seconds to 1 minute long each, and there is often two ads in a row. I might uninstall this game because of how obnoxious it is having so many ads.

The whole concept of the game is bs increasing your years doesnt actually do anything except change the look of the characters. Adds are a absolut joke. Endless pop ups for more adds. If you realy want to try it out download the game and immediately turn of your Internet connection to pretend adds from popping up.

Once you complete the first level, it doesn't give you any options besides watching an ad because clicking "no thanks" doesn't work, and watching an ad just brings you back to that screen. Can't get past level 1...

Ad Generator. There are so many ads that you forget what the game actually is! Ad after each level. Ad for each upgrade. Ad banners where you accidentally hit them while trying to exit the game or play. Terrible.

Pay to remove adds but every unlock still requires you to watch an ad..... feel like I wasted my money on this. The overall game is fun but takes ages to play waiting for the skip unlock prompt to appear so I don't have to wait 30-60 seconds for a ad to finish. Avoid this title if you can

Lots of ads, but it's ok, you have to get paid for you work. When boss levels start (from about level 140 or so), the game becomes bugged, and stops working priperly. Oh, and I was thinking of boiling eggs with my phone, so overheated the battery becomes after playing for a while. Well,at least I can save so.e money when the gas bill arrives (prices are skyrocketing, every little help counts!)

Game is fine. But it's largely a means to deliver ads. An ad is displayed the whole time you're playing. But don't worry because gameplay is only about 20 seconds per round. Then an short ad. Then a 30 second ad. Then repeat.

Your watching adds longer than you are actually playing the game. Each level is short and between everything is a 30+ second add. I don't mind adds that scroll across the bottom or top or the periodic add that plays, but this is excessive.

Ads between levels are the price to pay for free games, so I've no gripe about that. In the middle of levels sometimes (rarely) is a bit much. But has anyone evolved beyond aliens? They seem to exist from year 7500 to 19000 at least, which makes things boring quickly

This game is pretty fun if you're bored my only problem is there are too many ads that pop up every 2 levels you beat there's an ad you have to wait to skip there's a bunch of pop ups that give you the option to unlock certain things by watching an ad if they got rid of the Forced ad watching I would rate this higher but but it does look as advertised if you turn off your Wi-Fi and Mobile data the pop up ads go away and you can skip all the optional ads

if you dont watch the ad, the level will restart, if you turn off data long enough to play for 5 minutes you'll see everything in the game. its completely undeveloped, not even an alpha test. there is no progression of any kind level 1 and 9000 are the same.

The app is a total sham As you get further into the game the more apparent it is. The characters push themselves into pits, the bosses start taking less and less damage as they get closer to you not matter how overleveled you are, you get ads for EVRRYTHING INCLUDING NOT WANTING ADS It's a shame as well I was genuinely enjoying the game but the SECOND the people pushed THEMSELVES into the pit, I unintalled it

I like the concept but Jesus christ!! Way too many ads... ridiculous how you can't play the game without being forced to watch ads for absolutely everything you do. Im not paying real money to remove ads. üòí The levels aren't long enough.

Way too many ads as usual and it makes so if you spend your money once on an upgrade it will make you watch another ad for the upgrade. It's just their way to make as much money as possible. The amount of ads make it no fun. üò°

You can't even play this offline. After finishing a level, an ad offer will appear. The "No Thanks" button is not working unless you're connected to the internet, thus ads will just keep on popping up. Wow

Games like this should be illegal. I wouldn't even call it game since you spend more time watching ads then playing the game. Rounds last maybe 10-20 seconds then your forced to watch 30sec ad after ad. Only way to play is to put phone into airplane mode before hand. Eliminates all ads.

What's good about this game is that it works both online and offline, but when online you must go through 4 ads per match and after a few games you're invincible + it gets repetitive and doesn't level up enemies to match your upgrades.

A copy of (a copy of) another game. Possible to play offline, but normally you spend more time on the "no thanks" ad charade than actually playing. Still not as terrible as the other junk you see in the ads.

I don't generally write reviews but i wanted to specifically take time to write that this is the worst game I have ever come across because this is designed to only make you click on ads. I usually don't mind ad supported games as long as they're free. But in this case they ask you to click on ads to get certain benefits, like age 500 to age 1000, or additional people or additional damage. But none of them have any effect on the gameplay and just intended to decieve you.

Fun little game ruined by ads. If it's not ads in between each round(2 sometimes 3 in a row) then it's in game pressure to watch a video for an improvement or skill. Not worth the $3 price tag to remove them either. Uninstalling.

Whenever you try to say "no thanks" after a level, it just doesn't work. You have to close and reopen the app just to do the next level. There are too many ads because the dev(s) are just greedy. It's a bad game and I don't recommend to install it.

Don't bother, completed the FIRST level, 2 back to back ads, select a power up before the START of the SECOND level, 2 back to back ads. Spent more time in ads than in-game. Waste of time, would have rated in negative stars if it was possible
There is literally an ad after every level... which means, you play for 5-10 seconds, then have to watch a 30+ second ad. Then, everything else is hidden behind a pay wall. Horrible. ZERO stars.
The game runs so horribly. Most of the screen remains black except the interface. Can't see the hero(s) or anything. Don't waste your time, find a similar game elsewhere.

Biggest flaw, besides lousy game design, is the amount of ads. But that's to be expected with apps like these. What I found in playing was your damage does not increase in the round when you increase your years. Having a higher year means nothing. What a horrible design

Waste of time - round ends and you have to force the game to close losing your progress. Seems to be related to the recent "upgrade" to the pointless castle subgame. Deleting as it's a waste of storage. Don't these people test games????
Levels never change. Random map comes on to flirt with new features but never goes past stone age. It also makes no sense. Adverts literally every time you do anything. Waste of time and energy.

Game was great up until lvl 499 boss level. When kill the boss he sinks into floor and nothing. Level will not complete!! Also can't upgrade past 2nd phase of house on map even though there are 5-6 more phases available after that never seem to unlock for you. Update: still no change since last rating except I'd five it no stars if possible since the devs apparently don't read or don't care about negative posts. Glitch still doesnt allow to proceed past boss fight. If nothing done I'll delete.
There's only one level I can play. After I finish level one, I get stuck in a neverending loop of watching ads for bonuses. The "no thanks" button doesn't do anything.
2 or 3 to 1 ratio of ad time to play time. What's worse, there are many ads that have no exit button so the only way to get back in and play is to force quit the app, even after thr counter hits zero

It's actually harder than you'd imagine. Not because of actual difficulty or anything, but because it's so poorly optimised that soemtiems you'll lag too hard to be able to avoid the negative gates, or you'll phase right through the positive ones without the benefits. Also shoves ads down your throat more than it should. It's a shame because the concept is fun and could have been executed so much better than this.

As you would expect from a game you probably discovered through an ad, this game's entire function is to make you watch ads. Lots of ads that just trigger and are unavoidable, but also lots of, "You unlocked X! Watch an ad or lose it!"
Overall, it is a good concept for the game, but the ads are horribly often. They just appear non-stop, after every level or whatsoever.. Beside that, game is quite easy..
Just awful. Controls are terrible, and after 3 rounds just fail, graphics are lazy and uninspired, and the game is the laggiest I have ever had the displeasure of playing. Waste of storage space.
You need to watch ads to level up. Too many ads and levels are only a few seconds. You spend more time watching ads to level up than playing the actual game. Game itself is very fun but too many ads

Unbelievable, a game that looks & plays like the ads. You're going to regret not playing those speed flash card games in school. Do I add 35 months or 1,345 days? Do I subtract 60 weeks or divide by 12 years? These questions come at you fast and furious especially in the bonus levels. I've only beaten one! Yeah there's a lot of ads but you get to play more than watch ads scrolling by. This is a fun little time waster.

Horrible. Can't progress past the 1st level. I can watch as many ads as I want, but the "no thanks" button to continue on to the next level doesn't work, and the "no ads" button doesn't work either. üëé

First off, game is fun for an hour or so. I paid for no ads, but still have to watch ads to get any further in the game. You can't even pick what evolution to use. Would be better if there were no ads especially when you pay for no ads....

I completed the first 40 levels, and the game seems to get easier. Too easy in fact. I never lost a level. The advertisements between each level are also annoying. At least the gameplay is exactly what I expected. 2 stars.

Ads over ads over ads. You get an add literally every single time you finish a level, and the levels last less than the ads they play. If you want ads more than an actual game, I'd highly recommend this "game".

Enjoyed playing for about 10 minutes, then the adds really got too much and the levels were so easy. I decided to check the price of removing ads and I was given a warning by Google that I only had the option to accept (if I wanted to proceed) saying I have to wave my right of withdrawal and enter a contract, without any information on costs. Uninstalled.
Extremely large amount of ads. The ads are also pretty long. For every 30 seconds of game play you need to watch about a minute of ads. The game is pretty fun if you are okay with the ads though

Zero stars for me. Game won't let me progress to even the 2nd level, as it asks me watch an ad, gives me the reward, and keeps me on the same page no matter how many times I watch the ad or what buttons I press.

Very bad experience!! I finished level one and it gut stuck on the claim button. I couldn't choose "no thanks" for the bonus, and if I choose to claim the Bonus I watch an ad and return back to "claim" or "no thanks" also unable to choose anything but "claim" so I keep watching ads. Must be a new type of scam to make you watch an ad 10 times before knowing that you're stuck like this!!

The only thing I don't like about crowd evolution is how sometimes the ads don't work, I know that sounds weird but sometimes I press on the optional ads to get the extra years at the starting and stuff like that but they don't work. Play so never mind I had to delete and we install the game because it was buggy and I couldn't play and now it has made me restart

HORRIBLE game !!!! Don't waste time installing....Every time you finish more than 2 levels it freezes during the ad and takes you back to where you were.....game graphics and play are sketchy and jumpy,there are a lot of better playing games out there,I am going to uninstall and not ever download another game by these developers.I'd give 0 stars if I could

I downloaded this game so I could watch ads all day. It does that well but in between ads there's a mini game where you run through gates. Luckily it's over after 10-15 seconds but it interrupts all these sweet ads I came for. If they can patch that out I'll happily rate 5 stars

Really boring, & too easy in the early levels to provide any motivation to keep playing. The game *might* merit a second star, BUT the notifications are the most obnoxious that I've ever seen. Sure, I could turn off the notifications, but I'd much rather delete the game altogether.

Ads. Finish a level? Ad. Quick upgrade? Ad. Money bonus? Ad. Ads at the bottom of the game. Ads at level progression. This is by far the most ad ridden game I have ever downloaded. I get that ads bring revenue but good lord, this is just toxic. If you like 30 second ads for every 10 seconds of game play, this is for you.

I have played this game for the past half hour or so and I can say that the game is way too rudimentary. Ads plague the soul existence of everything that goes on in this game and it becomes overwhelming how repetitive it becomes. The levels are short and provide no substance. Sorry but it's just another waste of time.

You don't get any evolution progress by playing longer, if you wanna something new you have to watch ad's and that's it. You can get same map several times, so there is no map randomiser. Gun types are not based on years, on one map you can have laser guns on year 1000+ and on next one you get bows on same year, not talking about bonus guns that you can find on the map.

Way way way to many adds? And you have to push like 3 or 4 x's on that one ad just to exit out of it you push One x and makes you wait 10 seconds you push another x and then you got to wait a few seconds and then you can finally go back to playing a game after that level you get another ad on top of the ads they want you to watch to get special items I tried to deal with it but I feel like I'm spending more time trying to get off ads than playing the game so I'm deleting it

it delivers what the add says, so I'd give it 3 stars, simple and easy to understand which is good when you're bored. The ads after every turn is to be expected from this type of game , that's why I give it a 3 star, you could just turn of your WiFi when playing to avoid the ads. Either way, pretty nice game

I like the game concept, but you'll spend more than half your time with timers or videos. If you buy the no-ads version, you still can't upgrade or get content without more videos and the timers don't go away.

It's the same old story, you found it as an ad you thought, hey that looks like a time killing app let me download it and see what it is all about, but unfortunately as soon as you start the game you're bombarded with ads, terrible frame rate and (all though rollic games wants you to believe otherwise) same old same old blob character and overall simple graphic style you have seen a million times before. You wouldn't believe me if i told you that they have "talented and creative game developers"

The game can have 5 stars but ads are way too much to let the user play the game. 3 to 5 ads to start level and to finish it. Plus I think the same itself requires a lot of changes in every aspect because it looks like the game was developed not to play but to run ads and get the revenue.
Ads with a bit of gameplay This game is fun, a good time killer. But you don't get to play anywhere near as much as you get to watch ads. The ads completely ruin the experience.

This game super fun I really recommend it. The only reason I gave it 3 stars and not 5 (which is what it deserves) , is because it still has some bugs, such as when ever I finish a round and want to get a bonus by watching a short ad, It doest work, I keep trying over and over, I even uninstalled and reinstalled the game, and it still didn't work. I hope this bugs get fixed soon because I really love this game.

I don't understand why everyone complains about ads. Yes there are interstitial ads for upgrades (30 second ones) but the others can be skipped after 5 seconds. Not overwhelming at all and actually a pretty fun and repetitive game to play. Good time waster and the math challenges aren't bad but still keep your mind thinking.
Could have been fairly decent but it's just another tale of a company not knowing when too many ads is just too many. Uninstalled after 1 play. Short levels, multiple ads between them.

Terrible Experience, After every damn level there is an add. Every single thing in this game is an add. I understand needing to make money but damn, I'm getting rid of this game because of that. To many ads and wasting time. DON'T DOWNLOAD, waste of time and memory

I paid for no ads and there are still ads after each play, further to that the play may last under 20 seconds and then you have a 30 sec ad! like really! these ad based games make people lose interest.

Concept is good...But difficulty level/length of game and ad management sucks....... You should try for more difficulty level...and if someone fails then you should ask for add to give additional upgrade.....

Non stop ads! Ads while you play, offers an upgrade if you watch an ad, but you have to wait to decline. Video ad between level. Ad ad ad ad ad!!! It takes 3 times longer to get past all the ads and ad-powered offers than it does to play the levels, which are insanely easy. No challenge. What's better, adding 5 people, or losing half? DERP!

Super boring too many ads its like an ad every level.. don't bother downloading its super easy a 7 year old could win this game no challenges or super hard levels that would up my stars if there were challenging levels.

Too many ads. I dont know why this is so needed, but if i cant play without ads, its not really worth my time. Even if the ads were only every 5 levels or so, thatd be more bearable, but AFTER EVERY SINGLE LEVEL... thats just unecessary. But the stupid ad click bait for other games is probably the most agrivating part of any app game. Also unoriginal, dont know how many games there are with the exact same format. I'd go back to playing random dice.

I downloaded it so I could write a review without playing the game... The ads and similarity to the hundreds of other games with the same concept and stupid ads make me want to say don't do what I and mainly others have done and support app creators like this. Also after trying I can't get past lvl 1. It won't let me pass up the bonus by watching an ad. And when I watch the ad it won't let me do anything else but watch more ads... This is the worst game by far

Just an Ad farm. Very basic, very repetitive game. The levels are super short. The adverts you sre firced to watch at the end of EVERY single level are longer than the actual game levels. A lot of the time you have 2 watch 2 ads per level. This is nothing but a way to cram ads down your throat and farm Ad revenue.

Game as it is, interesting, to play with 0 IQ and waste time, awesome, but Ads? I have never played a game with this much, in 10 minutes of playing you get 9 minutes of ads and 1 minute of gamr time. Catastrophic.
It's nice but the game isn't as responsive to touch as you'd expect, it freezes at times. It has alot of Ads but it's mainly when you want in-game bonuses.

I really want to like to game, but half of the buttons your supposed to press to buy or unlock don't load in or load completely. Also I have been unlocking the same character for almost 30 levels. It keeps dropping to 20 or 40 percent after every completed level. It's just too buggy to enjoy.

It is as shown in adds. I made it to level 33 without any extra items. But after that you will need to buy some power ups. But its very easy to get money without watching videos. Not a terrible game but it gets repetitive too quickly.

One of the worst app... They made the app just to made you watch their ads... Most of the time app is unresponsive... And you can't even skip ads... Terrible. Deleting the app within few minutes of download.

Trash adware. After the first 3 levels, which had dozens of buttons offering cheats in exchange for watching ads, the game begins forcing you to watch ads that last longer than the levels. If you play this trash, you will find yourself spending far more time watching ads than playing the game.

This game would be loads of fun but with the constant pop up ads as well as everything in the game being locked behind ads and the constant offers locked behind ads, they make it impossible to do things like unlock new characters without watching a million ads. You would make more money and gain a lot more long term players if you toned down the ads.

Absolutely shocking Far too many ads that it makes the game unplayable and wouldn't recommend to my worst enemies! Definitely won't be playing this game again and think games like this should be investigated!!!

played 2 levels and saw about 8 ads. at least half of those were 30 second ads that can't be skipped. every level completion there's an ad, every reward offered there's an ad, every reward received there's an ad, every damage boost option guess what.... there's an ad. between the 2nd and 3rd level is where 5 of those ads came in. I'm curious if it's compounded and the amount of ads is increase with each level. gonna pay 2 more levels. I'll report back in a week when that's done.

really good game and concept however, I suggest let players think much, like, let choices be of different units "+2 years and +25 months" or different signs "+24 years and √ó2", please not the basics. (Update) From 4 star rate to 3 stars: Laggy, but I assumed twas just my phone. Bugs, there are times where the group passes thru the baricade. Also, I'm about level 27 already, still not much hard, maybe push difficulties about 5 levels earlier than the current.

Stuck at stone age, there doesn't seem a way to progress, I am stuck at level 125 and there's nothing more than the same. Is this really it or am I missing something to get to bronze age? If not I've had my fu. For those reading this review, just ditch after 30 or 40, there's nothing left to offer or to challenge

Game lags bad. it doesn't pick up gates I go thru and when it glitches it will speed me thru the match without registering anything and I can't go any further in my game since it freezes at the boss and won't end the match.
Way too many ads. Play 30 seconds, go through almost 5 minutes of ads. If you like watching ads, with some gameplay thrown in there occasionally then this is for you.

well, at least the game IS like the ads, also gameplay is easy, just pick highest evolution years and +people. Ads for bigger evolutions not necessary to win. But that's about it, nothing special about this game
DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!! Game crashes every 5 seconds I can't finish first level AND it's overheating my phone I've had the app for less than 24 hours and had to factory reset my phone and tablet.
If you love ads, this is your game! I normally don't mind ads to an extent on free games as it helps monetize and support the development. For basically every action in this game there is an ad.

Right now I'm on level 198 and I have maxed out the amount of units the game gives me to start. Now when I reach the end the first row of enemies runs at me and get automatically killed the the second row won't move than the third and fourth are trying to but are getting blocked by the second row.

Can't even make it past level 1. Not because the even requires skill, it's because you beat it and get met with "ad for more cash" or "no thanks". Try to tap no thanks, nothing. Kinda weird. Try the ad, ad plays, back to same screen. If I wanted an ad player, YouTube has better selection and actually works

After playing this game for about 15 minutes I've figured out the scope of the game is to watch as many ads for other games as possible. You can do this by pressing literally anything in the game. Even if you pay the $3 to remove ads, all you end up doing is watching ads the whole time...

The actual play time is less than the time watching ads. Graphics are so basic that it looks the game was designed for a day. Different options have no relation to previous ones or next ones. This game is a lazy money maker

Why I can't watch any ads. I'm trying to click watch sds to get more money but it's not even responding. I hope developers can fix this problem. I want to watch ads not only to help me progress but I also want to help the game developers by just watching ads.
tried it out of curiosity. The ads implementation is horrible, no matter what you do the system won't allow you to get past the ad without going to the ad app page for download

Ads are as long as it takes to pass a level. This game was made for the devlopers to make money as fast as possible through ads because people will uninstall it due to no gane difficulty. Good game idea mixed with a dumb agressive sales strategy!

I like this game and it's very addicting. However, I am getting increasingly frustrated with the ads. I understand the ads for a reward, but being forced to watch an ad is too much. I also have issues with my high score. I have scored really high amounts and stayed on my 1st score. This isn't a deal breaker, but makes it not as competitive with my siblings. These ads are making me consider unistalling especially since it won't save my scores. It is fun and all but the ads are too much for me.
app_developer_reply: Hi, we are sincerely sorry for the ads. We understand your frustration and we will surely look into this matter. We will lower the number of ads in the game to not interrupt our amazing players in game-play. And regarding your second issue please do contact us from inside the game so that we could resolve your issue ASAP.

review_text: I like the core game. It's a decent 2048 implementation. Except it seems to be designed around ads. The rewards are not enough to progress thru the game unless you watch a LOT of ads - a ridiculous amount. Want to swap a piece? You will have to watch two ads. Ads are a minimum of 30 - 60 secs.. Many are longer & require you to interact thru 2 or 3 screens. And it's the same awful ads over and over and over again. No, I don't want to download Mistplay - Ever.
app_developer_reply: We display ads in order to support our app. However, we are always collecting feedback and might change how we show ads if that affects our users too much. So, thank you for your feedback! Please share your thoughts at: support@inspiredsquare.com

review_text: A game with simple mechanics that I can lose myself in for periods at a time throughout the day. It has helped a bit with focus for a time after playing - I have some executive function impairment so focus is hard to maintain - I only give it 4 stars because of the ads. So many ads. Everything in America is buried in ads. It's ridiculous.
app_developer_reply:
Dear user,
Thanks for supporting us and we are sorry for Ads. We will improve in the future and we will try to keep the Ads from interfering. Please let us know if you have any questions. Thank you.

review_text: Ad overload! Play the game for 20 seconds? Here's an ad! Combine two blocks? Have an ad! A prompt box opens? How about an ad! Close that box? Have one more ad! Watch an ad? Here's an ad for your trouble! Edit to address developer response to me: your claim of needing that many ads to keep the game alive is absolute nonsense and you know it. There is a clear difference between number of ads needed to keep the lights on and your pure ad-driven greed. There is no need for that many ads.
app_developer_reply: Hi, we are sincerely sorry for the ads. We understand your frustration and we will surely look into this matter. We will lower the number of ads in the game to not interrupt our amazing players in gameplay.

review_text: I love this game, it is addicting, & it involves a lot of strategy . It is challenging & really makes you use your brain. However, the incessant breaks for ads break your concentration, which makes the game much less appealing. I refuse to pay for ad free games, so I plan to uninstall it soon
app_developer_reply: Hello, Thank you so much for reaching out and writing a humble review. We have forwarded your review to the concerned department. Please also know that we have already lowered the number of Ads in the game and have even made more requests to see if anymore changes could happen so that loyal users like you wont face issues like this.

review_text: I have just downloaded your app, but first I read some of your comments listed. It was basically the same problem of overboard on the commercials. I won't even play chess anymore because of that. Games are my only time to play and use my mind at the same time. I have dropped many games that I really like. Games, today are nothing but maybe 2 seconds of the game and 2 minutes of commercials. How would you feel, if you were in the middle of a important move and then a commercial.
app_developer_reply:
Hi,
We are sorry for this, but to continue work on this free app we need revenue from Ads to manage the expenses of running the game.
If you don't want to see the Ads, you can purchase the Pro version by visiting our shop and purchasing Ad Free.
Thank you.

review_text: Nicely designed, but the ads! Not only do they pop up every few minutes, but they show up most when you have a victory in the game--so you can't even be happy about it. Not sure there's an overall goal to the game anyway, you just play until the ads wear you down. The devs say they'll find a way to keep the ads from interrupting game play so much, so I might wait a few weeks and give the game another try later.
app_developer_reply: Dear User, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We want to give you better user experience. Could you give us the screenshots of Ads that disturb you most? You can email us at support@inspiredsquare.com.

review_text: I don't know that I have ever given a game a 5 star rating. I guess some people might find a game to connect numbers boring I love it! Ads are not intrusive and only shown when you level up or if you choose to watch them to get more diamonds so you can swap numbers or smash one to get rid of it. This is how all games should be related to the amount of ads shown. i have been playing the same round for weeks now and continue to come back to the game several times a day.

Too many ads. You can double your reward after each new number by watching an ad. If you skip the ad, one still pops up anyways. Ad breaks every three minutes while you're playing, or more frequently. The majority of the ads are 45-60 seconds, way too long. Frustrating. Game play is good, as broken up as it is.
app_developer_reply:
Dear user,
Thanks for supporting us and we are sorry for Ads. We will improve in the future and we will try to keep the Ads from interfering. Please let us know if you have any questions. Thank you.

review_text: Great puzzle game, especially while pooping lol. I installed only to get rewards for a different game, but I ended up liking it enough to not uninstall. On that note, the devs didn't give enough time to acquire all the rewards. That was very disappointing considering how much time I invested in this game. -1 star for the overly aggressive ads. Especially to get my rewards, I was basically forced to pay to remove the ads. If you can't afford it, make sure you're in airplane mode while playing.
app_developer_reply: Thank you for your review! If you have any suggestions on how we could improve and enhance your user experience, please don't hesitate to share them with us.

review_text: The game itself is fun, which is why it gets 2 stars instead of 1. But the ADS. You spend 10 times as much time waiting through ads as you do playing the game. There are banner ads at the bottom of the screen, ads that pop up and interrupt game play, ads that you can watch voluntarily to get a tiny bit further in the game. However, you have to watch 3-4 ads to get one move. Your score is entirely dependent on how many ads you are willing to watch. Gameplay isn't worth the ads.
app_developer_reply:
Dear user,
Thanks for supporting us and we are sorry for Ads. We will improve in the future and we will try to keep the Ads from interfering. Please let us know if you have any questions. Thank you.

review_text: Excellent game, lots of fun. I would love to see a way to save progress to something other than Facebook. It's an Android app, so why not be able to save progress to Google Drive? I'd also like to see the larger blocks show powers of two. Numbers like 33, 67, 134, 268, and 536 look really strange to me. Just make it 32, 64, 128, 256, and 512. We are combining blocks that are powers of two after all.

I downloaded the game and it was fun until you hit the much higher numbers such as g, h...etc. the rewards are so minimal..its ridiculous and you have to watch these ads that take up more time than the actual game play. There are ad breaks that pop up as im moving the blocks, as if watching the other ads to achieve a swap of 1900 diamonds wasn't enough you can only get on third if the rewards in order to swap blocks,...Sorry but I have to uninstall.
app_developer_reply: Hi, we are sincerely sorry for the ads. We understand your frustration and we will surely look into this matter. We will lower the number of ads in the game to not interrupt our amazing players in gameplay. About the rewards we are working on the price and value structure and soon will be implemented.

review_text: This basic puzzle matching game is leagues better than other gatcha puzzle games out there. The puzzles are simple enough, the visuals aren't in your face, the audio for combined numbers isn't my cup of tea but it works. The pop ups for doing chained numbers isn't as bad as most apps. Personally, the diamond system feels out of place. Since, I never felt I needed them . All in all this app is great for quick play sessions. An maybe if you want a chill game to help you sleep.

Even with the 2/3 play 1/3 add it was still enjoyable. Even thought about buying. Then right before a block swap for first 1/2 a mil block, I set the game down for 30 seconds and when I tried to finish, the entire bottom row shifted to the top. Had a lot of play time to get to that point. Only for the game to give me what boils down to a middle finger...... So thanks for that. Uninstalled
app_developer_reply: We are really upset that you are dissatisfied with the app. We are always finding narrow paths to improve the game play and other aspects of the game. Please would you be kind enough to go to your game settings and contact us form there. We will check every single possible detail why such issue was taking place. Please accept our apologies.

review_text: I liked it enough to pay for no ads. However, they just found a sneaky way of sneaking ads into the game. I feel it's pretty disengenuous. Edit: Also, be careful when starting the game as a pop up frequently appears to buy more points, set up so you accidentally press it. 2nd Edit: I'm uninstalling this miserable game even though I paid for it. Final straw, it actually undoes progress you've made between sessions so it can try to sell you more points. This is a new low in sleazy.
app_developer_reply: Please, know that you should not get any banner ads or ad breaks or game end ads now. You will only get ads that you yourself click on to get rewards. If you watch a video to claim diamonds, then that is by your own choice. If you click on "No Thanks' at the bottom of those dialogues, then you will not get the video ads. Warm Regards Team 2248

review_text: Too many ads. Then an "ad break" too. Ad break? WTH?! Some of the ads take 3 to 4 different taps to make them go away.. Then you also have to wait for the dumb ad to play. All the interruptions make the game bad. Greedy devs. Uninstalling. But, pro tip: Turn off your mobile data and the ads are way less. That is, is you don't need to receive calls and texts while you are playing.
app_developer_reply: Dear User, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We want to give you better user experience. Could you give us the screenshots of Ads that disturb you most? You can email us at support@inspiredsquare.com.

review_text: The amount of ads was extremely frustrating, and it affected game play by randomly dragging you into an add while making a chain. I had only downloaded this app as a way to get more ink on a webtoon app, but despite having followed the steps I was denied the reward even though I completed it as required to the best of my ability. From sheer frustration between that and the ads I deleted it despite liking the game itself.
app_developer_reply: Dear User, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We want to give you better user experience. Could you give us the screenshots of Ads that disturb you most? You can email us at support@inspiredsquare.com.

review_text: A relaxing game, possibly monotonous for some but I liked the rhythm. The too many ads are tolerable because they are super sort. I like that I've been playing for a month and haven't had to buy anything. What made me give it three stars is that the leaderboards appear to be fake. With the exception of seeing myself move up, none of the other names have changed in two days. That's kinda BS, and I don't know why they would need to do that. It's enough for me to uninstall soon if it doesn't prove
