review_text: There are loads of ads even if you pay for it, because the only way to use some features is to either pay MORE, or to watch an ad. But you still can't do anything, because whenever you try, you'll be forced to sit thru ANOTHER ad! I've had to sit thru 3-4 ads and was still unable to use the number swap feature. It'll say you've won a reward, but you never get it. Don't waste your time or money, this isn't worth it.
app_developer_reply:
Hi,
We are so sorry about the ads. We will revise the time between ads so you can play more without interruptions.
Also, if there is any ad that is causing some issue, please email us the screenshot of that ad at: support@inspiredsquare.com.
We will see to it that we ban that ad. Our support team is always there to help you out. Regards.

review_text: A good game. Fun and not difficult. The ads could be a little less but they're almost all only 5 seconds and you get a little reward (which adds up pretty quick) after every one, so it's good. If you're looking for a complex puzzle game with increasing difficulty as you progress, this is not that. But, if you're looking for a fun, relaxing, mental vacation game just to play around with, moving toward no particular goal, just playing for fun, this is a perfect game for that.

Great graphics and play is smooth. Ads come in the middle of play when players are in the middle of series of moves. Not good for concentration. The game isn't an easy game after twenty minutes. It takes some skill to figure moves once the values get higher.
app_developer_reply: Thanks for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with the game. This is a known issue and our team has fixed it. Please download the update and let us know at support@inspiredsquare.com if you have any further trouble. Thanks!

review_text: this game really makes me think! I saw that other reviews were not favorable simply because of too many ads. every game we play is going to have tons of ads. get used to it! it goes with the territory. it's not fun but it happens. other than that, this game requires intense thinking without the pressure of having to beat a timer. it really requires using your math skills in your head and following a pattern. I love this. it's my new obsession!

Totally addictive. I started playing so I could earn rewards for another game and now I've paid for no ads and play it all the time. I feel like it could use some rewards as you get to higher levels. My highest block is currently 4a and it's fun to keep topping your own score. Something that adds even more motivation. Maybe free hammers or something?

review_text: An advertisement popped up at a crucial moment in the game. Now each time it ends, I √ßlick the x to get back to the game. It just goes back to all the junk f4om the add. So be it! I'm installing it √üo they can pick on someone else. I'm too old to have to put up with sloppy operators such as I've just done. That's the perfect word here, DONE, & DONE with it.

One of the worst games I've ever played. Ads freeze up the whole app and you have to quit out, but what's worse is there's guaranteed ads when you make a new block, so it's almost like a punishment for doing well. It's also one of the most battery hungry apps I've ever had installed. I play big mobile RPGs and they don't take up a fraction of what this app does. I had my phone plugged in and turbo charging and it was still depleting the battery. Garbage.

The only thing I'll say is that the sound effects could do with a bit more depth - overall, the game is great, but the same few tones playing over and over again, as you select blocks, can get a little grating. Well done though on a simple, one-screen, game! üëç

review_text: Great game. Paid for no adds nd was worth it. Only issue I had is when you run out of moves it's very easy to mis-click your way to ending the game. Can happen with one click that you end the game instead of buying some coins to play on. Has happened to me twice and the 2nd time I played straight for two weeks. Lost all progress. I would have paid to keep going. Please add a pop up that says are you sure you wish to end.

review_text: Love this game, it's a wonderful combination of being stress-free but still really makes you think about your strategy. However, it's easy to become thoroughly absorbed and then you've lost a couple of hours. I'd gladly pay for the game to get rid of the ads, even though they don't completely ruin the gameplay by being obtrusive. The only thing that could improve it would be the addition of an option to go back one move, when you accidentally lift your finger whilst looking for your next move!

Not sure how long I have been playing this game now. It's been atleast a year, I want to say, but I enjoy it very much. It's relaxing and keeps my mind focused and trained. I don't think I can ever get bored with it. The ads are nice little mental breaks and they don't last long. Maybe 5 - 10 seconds I guess. It's worth the download, In my opinion!

Could be a great experience but game play can be very glitchy. Sometimes I have to hold down for a full ten seconds as I wait for the trail to appear that connects to the next number. Also the only way to play is if you switch off WiFi, otherwise the ads are far too intrusive and annoying. Very fun when it works though

review_text: The audio is soothing and unobtrusive. I really like the clean design w/o unnecessary goofy graphics. Some ads leave the game & so one must quit/restart the app. Unfortunately my dogs jumped on me & accidentally reset the game. I had over 600+g staged to quadruple my highest block. Too bad it cannot be reset. I uninstalled in a hissy fit but liked it enough to start over again...

The ads are just overwhelming! One right after another. Great minds exercise game when you can actually play it but the ads will not let you for more than a minute max! I played once now am deleting it!

Great game so far Have spent less than $6 and been playing a few months now only a few times a week and still have no issues or complaints. If you build up supplies and join an alliance it's very easy game to advance in. Helping each other out and sharing rewards and improving the estate and guards stats are very rewarding. Straightforward game and NOT money hungry or PTW like some say. Offer very good and affordable deals with quality awards without being bombarded about it. Solid game

Honestly, best mobile game I've played in quite a while. Bravo!

The game was fine when I was able to play on airplane mode. But when they changed it, the ads got annoying quickly. I also hope they add more options in the shop to purchase with the in game money you get. Because I have about 18.k that I can't spend since I bought everything already. Used an ad block to avoid the crazy amount of ads mentioned in other reviews and even still I can't rate this all that high. The levels are repetitive (only like 4-5 layouts used again and again without any changes) and there is no challenge, no goal other than score 3 times which is criminally easy when the bots can't even hope to keep up. It's a fun little time waster but once you get the hang of it the fun fades quick. Hopefully they expand on the concept because there is a solid game in here

Great game with tons more possibilities just out of reach. The reason? Too.Many.Ads. I love it so much be able to win in under 20 seconds and being pumped... And then having to see an unskipable ad the has no ways out. I have to sit for 20 or more seconds after a match just to play again. Game would be a 5 out of 5 and if you guys fix it I will make this review a 5 star review.

The game itself is great itself but there are some problems that stop me from rating it a 4 or 5 stars. Firstly, the AI is too easy, but that's not a big problem as the point of this game is to be a time waster, and it does that well. Secondly, the coins have no purpose. At the end of every game you get 5K coins, but there is no use for them. I have thousands of coins but nothing to s pend them on. Lastly, you get clothes and such from gifts, but no one to customize which ones you want to wear.

It would be a fun game but i ended up uninstalling it only after a few minutes because of the ads. The game has very fast rounds that make it fun but you're given an ad once a round and an ad after each round, this means you're be watching more ads than playing the game. I tried to turn my internet off in order to stop the ads but it won't let you play without internet even though it's mostly if not all offline.

Great concept and style. Absolutely hate the ads after every single level or every 2 shots. Just out right ridiculous, would've been a 5 star but there's just way too many ads to enjoy the game. Please disable the ads as it totally takes the fun and worth out of this game.

I was gonna give it 4 stars because of the ads but now it's 2, there are way too many bugs the game keeps closing and sometimes the game freezes up and stops working completely. At first I thought it might be a problem with my phone but after constant bugs I had my sister download it on her phone and she had the same problems. I really hope they can get this fixed because it is a really fun game.

To the developer: You have a great concept, great gameplay. This game can rise to the top, just for how fun it is to play. The reason I hate this game is because of the ads. There were random ads druing the game, in the the middle of the round. Just a simple ad at the bottom, that wont bother the gameplay. Add options where users can watch ads to unlock special features, if its about the revenue. Please, I see a lot of potential in this game, dont ruin it with ads.

Let's ignore the fact that the game is ridiculously easy and barebones. (Seriously you can get points so fast that games end in seconds.) I played this game for about 10 minutes. I had to watch 8 ads. 1 ad before a match, 1 ad after a match and 1 during a match. Then you got the beauty of being asked if I want to watch an ad for a reward, saying no and being forced to watch one anyway. For what little time I played the game I had to watch an ad for the same amount of time. Just stay away please.

This game is a fun concept, but it's very repetitive, with limited layouts, there are ads every minute pretty much. Guaranteed after the game, and I get them in the middle if I don't immediately beat it, which interrupts the gameplay. And there are already banner ads, so why would you need normal ads. Pick one.

Its really fun but, i would like if there was a, hard, medium, and easy mode, i also saw an ad where they had axes instead of basketballs, and their main objective was to kill eachother, it was also a playable ad so i got to experience it, anyway i would love if they had it as a little mini game.

Game itself is good, great concept, gameplay mechanics, style, can be fun, but... Ads. Ads pop up mid game, after a game, you'd get an ad, then a menu pops up to pay for no ads, you close it, and hey ho, we got another ad. It's insane, can't play it. Also unplayable without an internet connection. Oh btw, I only managed to get to level 6 with the insane amount of ads before quitting.

It was a good game at first, it was a fun time filler if I were standing in a long queue but the ads just got silly, I got ads in the middle of the game which meant the ai somehow scored points while I wasnt even active, would be higher rate if you either remove all ads (except those to help) or just reduce them. While you're at it make it more challenging too, because the same 4 layouts with the same limit just gets boring, you should do like a time limit, like an actual basketball game

Fun game but waaaaay toooo many ads. First couple of games was ok but after that there are are during the game and after the game and not the ads that give you the option to exit out of them... You HAVE to watch them... Too many other games that are reasonable with their ads to waste time on this one... Sorry but I'm deleting...

As I'm checking the game, I've noticed the first thing when you finish or do anything during the game. It's called Ads. There's like so much greedy pulled moves just to get a player's attention on a single ad just to get the game's company profiting 24/7 from it. At this point, I'd rather just make a similar game to this one and just make it ad-less. The current age of ads for companies has gone long enough. If you really wanna profit from a game, get a job.

Game was fun at first but too many ads. Normally I'm fine with ads in mobile games, after all thats how the devs make their money. But these were just excessive! I was getting ads in the middle of games and i put up with them for a while but they just ruined this game for me.

The sheer amount of ads on this game make it completely unplayable. The lowest I could get was 1 15-30 second ad EVERY MINUTE. Not to mention the fact you're unable to play without internet. Wouldn't recommend this game to anybody.

Great game. Way too many ads. Can even finish one round without getting an ad. I was in the shop looking at new balls and I had to go though 2 ads. After each round you have to watch an ad. You watch ads more then you play. Ruins the game. Will be uninstalling! I do not recommend this ad filled game.

It's quite fun to play and I love the goofy controls. I gave it 1 star because the game forces you to watch a near 30 second adds then having the option to watch more adds. More adds then gameplay. Yes you can pay to remove the adds but that's only the mandatory one. If you wanted additional help you will still be watching more adds then playing the game itself. It's a joke really.

This game is good but the ads are you good they pop up in the middle of the game and at the end and sometimes when you start a new game and these ads take 30 seconds you can skip in 10sec and got to wait another 15sec for the x to pop up to skip the whole thing

review_text: Like other reviews say there are alot of ads, but also the game itself is bad. You can play for about 10 minutes and you have seen all of the game. The AI might aswell be non existant, the levels are all the same, and the goal never changes. Garbage.

I can handle ads. Banner ads? They're fine. Ads after a level? Sure. But, putting ads mid-game is just a terrible decision. The game itself isn't very exciting to begin with, and chopping up the monotony with 15 seconds of product placement is just awful. Don't get this game.

(The game got worse what is the point of it being offline then they update it where you need internet) This is a very fun tine waster game if toy have to wait a while somewhere, I agree to all it is repetetive but you can challenge yourself by trying to constantly keep getting a higher score by pulling off trick shots before the ai wins, and you can try to get the lowest score if you want, there are prob other challenge ideas. Plus it seems like the ai are kind of getting better as you go?

One of the funniest, most entertaining, and amusing "little" game I have ever stumbled across. That being said the one star is for the obscene amount of ads thrown in your face. The game itself might only last around a minute but they even throw ads in literally while you are trying to score a shot... Obscene, classless and on the verge of being rude...

Good idea but poor execution I started playing but I was bombarded with ads and the middle of the game then after the game, but I found out if you turn the WiFi off it will block ads, but in a recent update you can't play the OFFLINE game without WiFi, I get they need to earn money but its ridiculous Also the game is way to easy,and they should add more game modes, like a hot potatoe one with 5 players/a.i TLDR To many ads and to easy

Super fun game, although the ads are way too excessive and the amount of popup screens and wait time after beating a level is kind of annoying. Would love for there to be a counter for your highest score in a round because you don't even have time to screenshot before an ad pops up. Other than that its a great car game

This game is really fun you have to battle the other person to get the ball in the hoop who ever gets the ball in the hoop 3 time first wins and I'm not a fan of offline games but this is a offline game I love and there's not that much ads! But what I don't like about it is that every thing in the shop you'll have to watch as to or pay for 500! But anything but that it's a good game. I'm addicted

At first I thought "Wow what a nice game with a cool concept I think it deserves 4.5 stars. Then I saw that there was no Minato outfit (and kunai for the ball, it would be great)so I said ok 3.5 . Then I started having a ad mid fight, annoying as hell, 3 stars. Then it became 2 ads and then 3 ads in mid fight so I was like what the heck man let me enjoy the game, I don't care about Ali Baba express, let me play, so I rated it 2 stars, the performance is horrible for such a cool concept, too bad.

too easy but in the ad I played the ai opponent cheated and scored by throwing the ball through the hoop from the bottom instead of shooting it through the top and won which is weird also need better characters not just stickmen more level layouts not just the same levels repeating over and over overall fun but repetitive add dunk moves also power ups that you get when hitting an opponent with the ball ads are annoying but I understand why you have them unlike other people. make the game harder.

This game is not going to be completely 100% fun until the ads will be removed from the game, the most thing in this game that comes up in the middle of the shot the ads, and please remove the ads for getting rid of distribution and angerness such as losing the shot or throwing it wrong or lose the shot. Thank you

It is a fun game but there are too many ads. Ads suddenly pops up even in the middle of an active game. Give us a choice here, i am fine watching a add for getting something but not all the time for no reason at all.

Was genuinely enjoying the game, but the amount of ads in between gameplay is just ridiculous. One ad after every few rounds would be fine, but this turned out to just be another money hungry piece of junk.

You may think that one star rating is an exaggeration over ads, but in this game, it's ridiculous. The way it starts mid game is soo frustrating. I'm not saying no more adds, I'm just saying that the amount is unreal. Fixing this problem can really boost popularity.
The game is good, but it's not the ads, it's how the game is so easy!!!! I can literally score 1 goal in 5 seconds, and all 3 in less than 25 seconds, they need to make it harder!!!

You know it's a fun game and all but there is still problems like how many adds there are it's RIDICULOUS there also how it's really easy to win like it's made for 5 year Olds but other than those two problems it's a pretty fun game without adds definitely a top game for me.

The game is actually fun but the ads is totally not cool bro and i think the should be offline feature, and the online features should be for tournaments and to help play with friends around the world i think that will help improve the game.

You only get one star because, I understand you want to make some money by running ads. But when you stop game play to run one causing me to miss a shot that's just wrong and greedy. I'm uninstalling it. It's a shame because it's really a good game.
They'll literally put in ad in the middle of your shot in the middle of a game. Like what is that. It's not like the rounds are long you only have to make three baskets per round. Insta delete!

So this game good but the game levels are repetitive but that would not be too bad if there was not a ad after ever game 20s ad after a 30s game I know there is ad blocker but there is a large majority of kids on these apps that don't have money and that makes most of them leave the app after a couple days so I feel like you should make the player watch ad every 3 game So it makes you keep a bigger audienc Also I feel like multiplayer would make the game more enjoyable and make it replayable.

The game has a great gimmick. It's a fun game and offers a gameplay that's refreshing. Personally it's more on the casual side of things but; it doesn't feel like most small generic games out there. Really great game!

Having ads is pretty much ever app now. I don't mind them before or after a level. But, Why would you have ads in the middle of a match? And in the middle of lining up a shot. Are you trying to torture people? That's a deal breaker for me.

Even after pressing "no thanks" ads are popping too much, they already have a ad banner at bottom. Y so much? I know you have to make money, but this is cheating. Now even im gonna cheat, im deleting this app and going to download "ad free paid version" from Google. Terrible ad-mill game. You see the level stretched out in front of you with a giant as the goal at the end. There is an ad blocking almost half of the view. Each level is 5 to 20 seconds long. There is an ad that you can't skip for at least 15 to 30 seconds if you win or die. There's an ad to revive after the death ad. There's TWO ads after you win the level, one to increase the frequency of the cosmetic bonus item drop (you have to watch another ad to actually get it if you get to 100√∑), and

Fun for about 30 levels. Which sounds like a lot but takes like 15 minutes to get there. It starts off bearable with a few stationary ads but once you start they go away. Then before every bonus level you have to watch an add but there is an option to skip. But right around level 30 all hell breaks loose and the ad floodgates open. Multiple video ads will pop up in the middle of the already short level. Turns into pay to play REAL quick.

This was an amazing, I loved the way you were forced to watch an ad after each level! and the lack of music was a perfect touch to remind me to the world around me. Oh and you can't forget about the add that covers half of the level preview in the upgrade screen. But I have to unfortunately give a 1 star review due to the impossible to kill boss, I have only been trying for 3 levels and I already know that I will never be good enough to get to it.

Pretty alright game mechanics, good pass timer. Gaining width is hilarious. Although, after around Level 76, the game falls apart. Now after I open it, the game doesn't load in a course, I can't start, and the level says 1. Not sure exactly what to do or what I did but I'm pretty sure there's just not enough levels, or a way to go back to previous levels. Don't really care because the devs probably don't either. Disappointed, however, not a big deal.

The game is just another ad simulator, and you can't even finish a level without being forced to watch an ad. Also, the airplane mode trick doesn't work because you need to be connected to wi-fi in order to even play the game. I understand the need for ads, but this is basically overkill. It sucks that the ad problem kills the fun because it is genuinely a good time killer.

Game is really good, but something I find so annoying is they'll have an ad in the middle of the level and then they'll have one after the level. I completely understand it's a free game and they need to make money, but at least just put one ad every few levels and less watch an ad to win.

This game is downright awful. It's laggy, it's not even that fun, and there's a very abominable amount of ads. There's one after every level that last 30 seconds each. There's even ads in the middle of levels! At a certain point after you get to the higher levels you end up having an ad during the level at a random point, and another ad after the level. It's simply unbelievable and these money grabbing low quality games are getting out of hand.

At the least it is mindless entertainment which in our stressed world, some people prefer, but get to enjoy when the game isn't littered with ads.

Terrible. Ads are WAY too frequent, game quality is terrible, you're too slow, no way to beat the boss until level 50, and not being able to have full control over where the character goes ruins the experience. Did I mention it's glitches and is a waste of space? This is the worst game I ever installed and deleted it within minutes. The ad for it is clickbait and the ads in the game advertise other horrible games. I can't believe some people gave it 5 stars. Do not install.

Each level is roughly 10 seconds long, and plays 2-3 ads at the beginning, middle, and end of it. You will litterally spend twice as much time watching ads than playing the game. On top of it, since it's contstantly loading ads, the game is slow and laggy. To top it off, doing things like bonus levels and getting upgrades take ads. This game is part of why mobile games are just embarassing.

only downloaded it because the ads pissed me off. Unless you buy upgrades just getting to the boss is impossible. The game itself isn't bad but it's super sensitive and has almost 2 minutes worth of ads between each run.

This is the worst game to play because there are just too much ads . Each time you run and end running there is a ad to upgrade something use ad to do bonus level there is and st the bottom of the screen there is ad. To much annoying.

The "tall man" runs slow, VERY slow. Do not recomend. Gets boring, levels are boring AND the basic colors are boring. (In my opinion) If you thinkn it's fun, it's fun. If you think it's boring, it's boring. its your opinion.

It's good but 3 reasons why I gave a 2, you had to be forced to watch a add after every level and when your far enough,your level should mean how much adds you watched. Then I was so close to getting to boss and then it just took away so much like the body was to wide and it just took away all of the fat. It was so unfair. Then when you get far in levels like 82 it just shuts the entire game down and you start all over again it ridiculous!

It's just a stupid glitchy game with alot of ads you cant even win in most of the levels because they literally make the level impossible to win even if your a pro there is an ad every 20 to 30 seconds which makes the level longer like the levels are 10 seconds to complete but the ads make it 2 or even 3 minutes I also hate the fact that the levels are 10 seconds but even if there weren't any ads in the levels I wouldn't mind because it's nice and smooth but ads make it glitch wast of time!!!

I do like this game. It's simple and fun to pass the time but my god, it crashes alot and kicks me out and it freezes my phone once in awhile. Sometimes I cant even play one round because of this. Once again, love the game but it needs work...

There are plenty of morons below who cannot troubleshoot at all, and say playing the game without an internet connection is impossible. Turn on airplane mode, then open the game... not the other way around.... the game also doesn't lag when you turn haptic feedback/vibration off. Nonetheless the game has about 20-30 different levels before they start repeating. It's fun for maybe an hour.

This game was absolutely frustrating. The game itself is fine, but the amount of ads is excessive. I would often be interrupted in the middle of a level with a full-length, unskippable ad. It makes the experience frustrating and unenjoyable.

Eh...started playing this, honestly dont get it. It's not like the other games that make sense on what you are supposed to do This one: Ok, you run through whatever gets the best number results, cool, I love working my brain on that stuff. Then you get to the end > wait, you're going to get smashed down to nothing and there's these crystals to the left and right, except it seems like you can't go to the left or right and thus avoid the obstacles? Wait what? Oh,andtheresabossontheotherside

Terrible game, with way too many ads! The premise is good. But there's more ads than play time. And the only skill is weaving left to right. There's no wa to voluntarily jump. Granted I only got to level 3. But I couldn't stick it after that. Deleted

I get it. The price of "free" games is adverts. I'm fine with that. This game makes you watched least FOUR games per level. The levels are short, not fun, and not engaging. Avoid this terrible game. It's only been three levels and I'm uninstalling. Absolutely TERRIBLE!

Not a big fan of the ads, every second of the game, I don't really like the fact that the games of VOODOO are always glitching and are always just baiting little kids to play stuff like this, make it so it's not glitchy and not so many ads, then I'll start to think about changing my rating

I can even get to theplay gamwas again as he was in the world fix the odds of stopping games with me but the game is sticking and making a lot of bugs fix the odds fleas Yogim needs to be upgraded and make it so that you could beat the titan we're more easier and make sure it of different levels and it has pets and all that type of stuff and you could be on online with friends and things like so and it could do fish all battles and things like so please and McCoy plays different games like RP

The game itself is pretty fun. The graphics and the development aren't very good but the concept is great. The only thing bringing down my review are the ads. It's normal for a game like this to have ads but maybe like 1 per 10 stages! This game sadly has one on each stage, sometimes even two. The worst thing isn't even the excessive amount of ads in it but the timing of them. In the middle of a stage! Remove most of the ads, then it's a great game.

This is a fun game! I turned on airplane mode and got no adds, and I could buy the 'free with an add' items WITHOUT watching an add! So definitely turn on flight mode/turn off wifi and data, and it is a fun game. Quite simple, but a good way to pass the time. Only glitch is that you can kill the boss even when you are basically a stick with a ball head, other than that a great game!

If you pay, you still get tricked into watching adverts, delaying the continue buttons to force paid players into ad videos. You also still need to watch videos for bonus items and levels which then crashes if you're offline. Infuriating!

Game was fun until they started running ads in the middle of the runs. I understand i didn't pay for no ads and I can deal with all the ads in between but is unacceptable in the middle of a run to have a ad run. Screwed up a bunch a my runs and makes the game less fun. Uninstalled

It was fun and easy, i really liked it! I love how you can get hats, change skin colors, its really fun! But i have to give it 4 stars because i dont think there should be an add after every singke level!

ads are everywhere there are so many ads That I can't even upgrade there is an ad blocking there is and ad blocking the upgrade bar. I wouldn't reccomend getting this app unless you have an ad blocker.I feel like Supersonic didn't try hard enough for this game. The game would be better If there was less ads.

GARBAGE. You will have more ad time than game play time. I normally can deal with the ads in these games but this is one of the worst ad bomb. I wish nothing but bad things on the developers for what they are doing to games

Pretty basic math runner. You try to go through the gates that add or multiply your size and avoid the ones that subtract or divide, hit a guy at the end, nothing new. Skins are nothing but colors and hats and bonuses are locked behind an ad. The game constantly crashes when you buy upgrades, making it so you can't run. On top of that, it's very slow and you end every level pretty much in the same state, neither luck or skill are a relevant factor.
I made it through 2 levels. Ads are insane, had to click about 7 x's before one ad goes away. One level takes about 15 seconds and one ad is about 30 seconds

this game is very difficult to adjust to, in order for the character to move at all, you need to hand your finger constantly pressed onto the screen which is high-key annoying as hell. after the first few levels it is very repetitive and nothing new but then again, I've only played like 3 times before reaching the boss and it's really not that fun. I didn't get any ads so far but I can tell this game is create just to milk as much money as possible out of you.

The game itself is fine, it feels really random whether or not you "beat" the bonus part. The big problem it the ads, I'm not someone to complain about ads that much but an ad DURING every single level? C'mon that's excessive
Unskippable ads every few seconds. Literally. Do not waste your time downloading, it's just another spam app made strictly to shove as many ads down your throat as possible.
after every level, a really long ad just comes up. It's really annoying, like only one game a time?! seriously fix the ad problem. i rate 3/5 stars because i can't ever reach the giant manly statue.
author_name: Eraj's Special Kitchen With Daily Life!

review_text: This is a fun game but I'm not really satisfied or anything, first of all after each level you play there is always an ad which I'm not surprised with. Second of all its too laggy and I know its probably my wifi but maybe it isn't. Third of all sometimes the game isn't working and I don't really like it, However I like playing the game but I don't like the game.
Simply too many ads! Each round is like 10 seconds and after that you have you watch a 10 second ad for no reason. You also can't play with airplane mode on.

You will never have the opportunity to watch more ads than you will playing tall man ad viewer game. You'll occasionally be required to play an amusing game where you run over power-ups and get taller and fatter, but mostly it's just a fantastic ad watching app.

This game has a masterfully crafted illusion that makes you feel like you are constantly close to winning, while in reality, you will never win, as it was rigged from the start. This game is absolute garbage, and I couldn't even suckle of the sweet teat of victory, as the horrifying roadblocks(both metaphorically and literally), chopped off my legs and decapitated me before I could reach the finish line and say hello to Mr. Robot, the god of this world. This game is reignited my depression 0/10.
Great game! I love how the monsters get so tall but one problem there's too many freaking ads there shouldn't be that much ads on a game and you'll know that so please fix that.
Hot mess when it comes to the ads. You get them even randomly in the middle of running/moving. Unistalled. Nobody wants all those ads, it's an overkill.

Thanks For Reminding Me That If I Download Stuff Since I Have So Much Bad Luck, If I Try To Download A Game.. This Happens: Ads At Bottem, Ads On Random Parts Of The Screen. Ads In The Middle Of Levels, Decline A Boost That Costs A Ad? Understandable Watch A Ad Anyway. Want To Level Up Using Gems More Like LEVEL UP BY A AD. Games Like These Are Sometimes Fun To Play 5% Through Then Fun Destroyed. I Would List More But Theres A Characters Limit So I Have To Limit What I Say.

This maybe the worse game i found for the type of game like this. Ok, it's normal that this kind of game has ads. But bro. Ads on everystage? That's it just ruin the fun of playing. And the worst of it that this game can't be played offline. Omg. Uninstalling this after few stages. Really not recommended
This game exists solely to be ad cancer. The game itself is fun, simple, and dumb, but the app deliberately plays too many ads to force people to PAY to go ad-free. Don't let them win.

I think that this game is good. But it is also mid. I think that you can chang how tall he can get. And how wide he can get. I don't like that right when you get relly tall the game makes you get shorter
So far my experience with this app is terrible.Way too many ads and it's very slow when first start playing the game. save your space and time
Fun but it gets boring fast but it is fun to play but I wish it wasn't so damn laggy and you can actually play it the ads are too much and I don't want to have to pay to get them remove
This game is fun but like there is way to many adds and even when it asks you if you want to see an add right after that add there is an add wich is why I'm deleting it.
im still trying to get my head around this game because it is interesting but it doesn't have a sample at the beginning..the game is slow or is it how its supposed to play?

I can't stand ads that appear DURING game play. I don't mind watching ads in between levels, watching ads to get bonuses etc, but not while I'm actually playing a level for goodness sakes. One star until this changes

This is the single greatest video game in existence. It's limitless depth and world building is completely unmatched by anything else the industry has to offer. Do yourself a favor and experience this timeless instant classic.

Most games give you ads in-between stages. And incentives you to watch an ad to get a bonus not this game. It gives you ads in the middle of the game as well as shows you one if you skip the bonus to watch an ad.

Like I've said in another game VERY similar to this, this game is like if somebody with no soul took free assets and made a game with it. Which is pretty much what happened here. A soulless company made a game for a few clicks and dollars. I hate these type of soulless runner games with my entire being. I hope the developers of this game get a real job.
Ads in the middle of a short level is a no-no. Also the view angle is uncomfortable. Otherwise game is quite simplistic - the only challenge is wait through ads.

It freezes in the middle of the game. More often than not I have to shut it down and restart it to finish the level. It's a good game otherwise.. Update: now it freezes in every stage.. even time I play I have to shut down in the middle of each level because ad starts mid game and freezes each time. Becoming a Hassel. May delete it if not fixed

It's just a bad ad machine. You get an ad after every short level whether you want the reward or not. It was a long ad for turning down the rewards, can't imagine how long the ads are for the rewards. To make things better, they have ads in the middle of these short levels that pull you mid action, making you run into obstacles and miss boosts.

Not fun at all. Any appeal that was tried to convey was sorely overpowered by the sheer, unadulterated, copious amount of ads. The game isn't even fun without the ads either. I find the gameplay to be linear in that the progression is too slow and there isn't a clear goal. If I could, this game would get no stars. Thanks for reading.
Super laggy, not optimized and filled with ads. One of the Worst games ever.
ok game. the adds are way too aggressive. adds show after almost every game. touching the screen anywhere during an add redirects to the app store.

WHAY to much ads plus after like 30 levels you can finally fight the guy plus when you gwt there you so skinny plus your not that wide so i will not recomend playing this game but if you like it thats ok thats not a problem to me.

This game is so unbelievable I can't even get to play the game the in peace because of the adds and this game could be a good game it's just the adds and I don't complain about adds but it was just so unbelievable I had to say something.
I hate this game. Have ads every level I complete. I don't have mood for game after playing it. I really hate it.

Way too many ads, which is why I prefer playing offline. There are limited skins and costumes so when you've finished those and got them all, the only thing you can do is to upgrade the height, weight and speed which is incredibly boring after a while.

Heavy use of ads throughout the whole game; Not mechanically challenging plus little level, obstacle and enemy variation, gets boring pretty fast. Another bad game trying to get as much money as possible through ads, not recommended.

This game is fun but you can't even play because of the amount of ads. If you finish a level you get an ad which is so annoying and sometimes I have to close my game and re-open just because the ad can't be skipped. Please put in less ads and people will enjoy this game

each level is very short and there is an ad after each one. do not tap the options at the beginning that look like it will make you taller or fatter as a bonus for the level, it only takes you to another ad.

I keep getting ads even In the middle of the game it fun for a bit but suck that you KEEP GETTING SO MANY ADS. AHHHHH.DELETE THIS GAME.

2 to 3 adds between every round played, sometimes even mid round. Can only skip the adds after 4, or 5 or 10 or 30 seconds depending on the add itself. Terrible experience when rounds played doesn't even last more than 20 seconds. Other than its boring, no background music, graphics are clean but there's just not enough to continue with. After 14 rounds I've killed the boss 3 times but I've had enough already thanks, uninstalled.

my character is so slow and I don't really like it and no matter how much I upgrade the speed is always the same speed

this game is fun, but the blob guy literally runs so slow it might as well be in slow motion. I think this game could use some major rethinking and remodeling.

Not a bad game at all. Quite enjoyable. Simple and quick type of game. Recommend, if you're bored and just wanna burn a few minutes.

The game is alright and can be fun when playing, but it's 30% playing time and 70% ads. and I'm not sure if it's just me but at some points the game gets really glitchy especially when getting your score at the end of the run. Download the game if you're prepared to sit through the ads but if not, I don't recommend.

I have never come across a game with more ads!!! It shows an ad every 1 minute, even when you are in the middle of playing the game (which lasts 1 minute for every course) and of course another ad at the end of each course. I didn't even see the cost of the ad-free version. I just shut it down and uninstalled it. Other than that it is a fun basic game.

It was okay but ads became unbareable. Before the update it'd show an ad after every level, which is common place for these low quality games. but recently ads that are unskippable started playing mid level, sometimes mutiple times, then another ad after the level is completed. in terms of ad's per time played, id say a good 30 seconds of gameplay comes with about 4 or 5 ads. where before about 2 minutes of gameplay was came with about 1 to 2 ads. Please simply limit the frequency of ads.

Too many ads! Like usual for this maker. But I travel a lot and I have to be on airplane mode but then it just lags and says "no connection" and you lose control of the game, you have to leave and come back, and it keeps doing that everytime

This is a bad game. It's incredibly repetitive with basically no rewards, as I'm not sure the upgrades even do anything. There's ads after every game, and you can't play offline. There are hats that you can work towards, but you have to watch ads to get them. Overall, this is a do not play game.

Come on now, an ad during play and after? Even if you tap no thanks? I had it installed a few days ago because I downloaded a few games from ads and those ones keeps my interest. Decided to give this a try and yes, I will be uninstalling this nonsense. What type of game gives you the option to watch an ad for a booster, but if you tap no thanks, it forces you to watch one anyway without any incentive this time? "Oh you don't want to watch an ad? Ha! Here's one anyway as punishment"

Pretty good game, the only reason I don't rate it five, is because you can't Finnish the level without watching an ad, and there is no music. If there were music, and if the ad were to play after the game every couple levels, this would be a 5 star game.

Too many ads. Levels last around 20 seconds. There is always an ad before, DURING, and immediately after the level. The ratio of play time to ads is abysmal. I understand that they need to make money, but the volume of ads makes this unplayable.

The amount of ads in this game is absurd if you take long on a level you can get 2-3 ads. Other than that it is fine. Although I do feel like some levels make you lose too much height/width and the upgrades feel like they do nothing.

This is the most boring game I've ever played. It is the same thing over and over again. There are ads galore and it's really laggy even when WiFi is turned off. Seriously don't play this game. I rarely give out 1 stars and even I found that it deserved it.

Fun great (but unusal) concept I think the idea of the boss at the end is a good one. However, just like many games it is an ad farm!! To many ads. Like all these kind of games there are way to many ads there was one after every single round it is so annoying and not fun to sit through that many ads. Great game, but you guessed it, ADS.There are ads like 3-4 times in ONE LEVEL. It wastes me like 30 secs-2 mins of all my time in the game. Constant Ad Simulator. It even makes me download the apps and get lost in the game. Please remove the ads or I'll give it 1 star.
