Hi Supersonic Studios! So, this game has way too much ads. Halfway through the game 30second ads in my face. Whether its how money is made or not please lower the amount of ads. Also if you're going to put in the option to pay for no ads make it work please. Thanks.

Not recomended. This game constantly forces you to watch ads, is very laggy and has alot of bugs and low quality gameplay and gamestyle. Its very diffrent from the ads of this game. Anyways don't download it and if you do then turn off your wifi so they don't give you ads

I love playing this game, but like many have said the ads are annoying. To have ads after every level is crazy. It takes multiple times to click out of the ad and having to wait for the ad cycle through I could already be working on the next puzzle. Besides that issue I'm really enjoying the game. It keeps my brain active and I feel more focused while playing.

I installed the game because the shape puzzles that the ads showed. There are none. I really dislike these apps with deceptive ads like that. Not to mention it keeps showing ads that get stuck. There is no other way to return to the game but to get completely out and then back in again. If it had had the shape puzzles I would have kept it and delt with the glitches but I am definitely uninstalling.

I used to love this game and play all the time. The daily challenge is fun as is the regular game play...to a point. It started to feel old so I tried the journey and it ruined the game experience for me. Ads between every level, which means ads every 15 seconds on the easy ones. Then the levels get hard to the point of unwinnable. You are waiting for the perfect sequence related to your choices. My inability to ever get to the end of the journey drove my OCD crazy. I can no longer play at all.

I *love* this game. I play it constantly - or rather, I would, if it weren't for the horribly invasive ads after every. single. puzzle. They are so distracting and frustrating, that I knocked off three stars for them. Like, absolutely, you need to make money, but please consider an ad free version. For the amount of entertainment I get from this app, I would gladly pay five or ten dollars for an ad free version, especially to avoid a subscription. Other than the ads, I adore it.

Don't download this game. 30 second ads and you can't win. If i could, i would only give 0 stars. The game is fun and addictive. BUT it's set against you. The pieces you need never come up. It's almost like the game is programed to counter your move. Frustrating to say the least. It could be better and I thought the upgrade would of corrected that problem, but it didn't. A word to the developer, scrap it and start over.

The game itself is fine. The ads are a hellscape. I'm not talking about regular ads that have a timer for 5-30 seconds with an exit button or skip video option. No. Some of these ads keep on going until you exit the actual app. One just popped up mid-game & that means to continue, I'll have to restart the game- but another of those ads could pop up, so why even bother? It's not worth it. Uninstalling is the true exit. Yo ads is broke.

I really like the game and the periodic additions to game play. But, I'm seriously considering removing the app due to the ads. It is bad enough you get an ad after every single game played but more and more often there is no way to end the ad and return to game play. The only way to end the ads is to exit the game app. Once out of the game, why return when you know you'll be closing it again within minutes?

The game play is ok. It's worth at least 3 stars, however the reason why I gave it 1 star(I'd give it 0 if that was an option) is because the game isn't as advertised. When I saw the advertisements for it, it always showed a shape. For example you had to fill in a diamond shape box with different prices to discover your brain age...I have been playing months & I've yet to see that option for game play, & that's why I downloaded the game. I've since stopped playing because I gave up on the game.

The game is fun but has problematic ads. You get an ad every time you have to retry. It wouldn't be a big deal except that quite a few of the ads don't have an "x." That means I get bricked in an ad and have to close the app and restart it just to keep playing. Stupid glitch, but otherwise the levels have good variety in the journey mode and are overall enjoyable.

I used to love this game, even with the ads! But now I can't skip or close any ads, even when they are finished. I have to close the whole game and restart between each level. It seems like this just changed after the recent update. Offer a paid version, and I'll pay you! Or at least let me close out the ad!

This game sucks! You can NEVER win, even if there are areas that can played. And scoring makes absolutely no sense. There are too many ads and you have to either wait a while for the ads to end before getting back to the game or get out of the game and return to it. I am uninstalling this. BTW: when you lose, you can indeed put pieces in the puzzle that the game darkens and won't let you do it. This game won't allow you to win

This game is fun to play, HOWEVER the ads ruin it. I understand that ads are necessary especially for free games like these, they are expected but most of the ads in this DO NOT offer a way back into the game. You literally have to close the game and reopen because most of the ads do not go away or offer any sort of close tab or "x" once the ad is complete. I even tried leaving the game open sitting there for 4 minutes and nothing comes up to close the ads. Highly frustrating.

Demonstrates addictive and fun gameplay. Fun daily challenges and badge collecting mechanic on "joourney". Later puzzles can be quite difficult. Adds are disruptive, which is normal for a free-to-play game. However, slow level loading and inescapable adds bring this game down completely. Frequently after a level an add will not have an exit and the player will be forced to exit and restart the applet to continue playing, with slow loading further frustrating the player.

I have to admit ads after every single level is a bit excessive and kind of ruins the game for me. I know profit needs to be made, but perhaps after every 3 levels would be better? Just my thoughts.. Otherwise, I love the game and enjoy the fact that it's challenging at times! Edit: Can't play without wifi anymore :( Game keeps giving a pop up saying that I need to connect to the internet when/if I don't havw access to it.

Currently has ads that don't display and don't allow bypass; they FREEZE the game. The developers slipped on this one. Fun game when you can get it to work. Update: Still plagued with ads that don't have a close button. EVER. No way to close the ad after it's finished playing, except to close/restart the app.

Disappointed. Loved this game at the start. Played all day every day. Dint mind the stupid ads that pop up between turns. But those ads you could eventually close. Now more often then not the ads can't be closed. I have to shut down the app completely. Makes me not want to play anymore. Thinking about uninstalling.

I used to really love this game. Lately, though, the ads at the end of every level don't have a button to close them at the end if the ad. The only available button is Install. The only way ro avoid installing a game I don't want is to close Woodoku and reopen it. Every. Single. Time. I am done. Time to move on. Sorry. This was a good game for a minute.

First of all, not what the ads of this game suggested. Second of all, too many ads. Third of all, it consistently gives me pieces that will cause the game to end. Game ends within minutes. There are much better wood puzzle apps out there than this one and that have fewer ads!

It takes less time to solve the puzzle than it takes to x out the ads that come between EVERY SINGLE LEVEL. Two seconds to solve the puzzle, 30 seconds to navigate through the ad, three seconds to solve the next puzzle, another 30 seconds to x out the ad. Its not between every few levels, it is between every single level. By the time it takes as long to solve the puzzle as it does to get rid of the next ad, you will have lost half a day. I uninstalled it after level 5!

Changing my review. They have added screaming loud ads in the middle of levels, instead of silent ones between them. It was so loud I jumped. My husband heard it in another room and this was after I had turned off sounds in the settings. Uninstalling right now. I liked this game. It a Tetris type game with a twist. Columns and rows disappear when filled as well as 3x3 boxes. Lots of fun if that's your scene.

Way too many ads. I can understand the ones for other mobile games. But not the ones for weightloss gummies that lead you to a fake web page when you miss the skip ad button by a fraction of a centimeter. Those are super harmful, especially since its a scam they're advertising. The game play itself is fine, it's a challenging game. But the ads make me want to uninstall it.

The game itself is fun. I don't even mind the ads so much as they're necessary for a free game. BUT, some ads have the skip button so small and precise that it's very difficult to tap it. Many times you end up missing it and off you go to Play Store like it or not. 7/8/22: I like the game & reloaded it. Today I was at a high level and it was hard. I needed 1 more jewel to pass. I got new blocks 4 times with no jewel appearing. 5th time I ran out of space, still no jewel. I'm gone for good!

Put the game in airplane mode and you'll avoid all ads. Improves the experience immensely. Like others have said though, it is frustrating because the tiles are NOT randomly generated. The game uses algorithms as you get farther to give you tiles that are intentionally much harder to use. This takes skill out of the equation because the house is always in control, and it's impossible to set up to beat it

Too many ads with no option to turn them off. Loud ads with lots of video at the end of each round. Let me PAY a one time fee to turn off all the ads, yeesh. Also there is no sort of algorithm that guarantees it's always possible to win. Everything is COMPLETELY random. Sometimes you can get 3 of the same pieces, or pieces that will force you to lose even though you have plenty of space. Missed opportunity here.

The difficulty ranges from simplistic to extremely frustrating (with little in between). In the middle and higher levels the largest pieces come at a stupidly high rate. The ads are excessive and the game is a very bad experience overall. I got a high score of 3275 in the main game, so when I say the game is stupidly difficult at the highest levels that deserves to be taken seriously. I am deleting this game.

Fun game; would receive more stars if there was a pay option to remove ads. As it is, I avoid the ads by closing the app when the ad starts and then reopening it. Of course, once closed, there's a good chance I'll simply open a different game instead. But I guess the creators of Woodoku don't care that they're driving people away from their game. P.S.-that trick about using airline mode to avoid ads doesn't work, because the game just prompts you to connect to the internet to play.

Heaviest ad machine I've ever seen!! After EVERY...SINGLE...round (just a few seconds), the game requires you to watch an unskippable ad. When it's done, you must stare at it for a while. And a few seconds later is another ad. But after each ad, the game says it will give you coins if you watch another. But the one thing I have never seen which is INSANE!!...if you finish an ad but take 2 seconds to look at something on your phone, you have to watch an ad to return to wear you paused!! Uninstall

Alright on the surface for a few moments, but has serious issues as a "puzzle" game. The sheer amount of piece variety means that there's little strategic choice to be made, especially combined with the fact that you cannot rotate pieces. While I won't commit to it using non-random generation (presumably to hurt the player), it certainly feels as though certain more difficult or obnoxious arrangements show up more as you gain more points

Good game but ads are EXCESSIVE. Up to 1:30 Unskippable ads between EVERY single level and new game. I understand the Devs need to make money but it's insane. Imagine watching a half hour TV show with 27 minutes of commercials, that's this game. And even if it's a great 3 minutes of your show, is it really worth it for all the Ads? In this case, no. It's a fun game but absolutely not worth the amount of time you spend watching advertisements.

Just ran into my first issue. The app is closing after initial boot. I tried rebooting the phone, but no good. Tried system repair. No luck. It's a real bummer loosing my progress, but the only thing I can do is uninstall and reinstall. For those who hate the annoying adds: just close your LAN and data connections while you play. No ads! Turn on data/ LAN to download your new Journey, then shut down and reopen the app. Ad-free experience every time...

I like playing the game, but I'm burned out on ads after EVERY LEVEL, whether you complete it, or you fail, there will be a multi-clickout ad that often has the x so small that you end up going to the google play store. I'd pay a couple bucks for an ad free version, but that doesn't seem to be available. I know I'm not the only one frustrated by the ads.

I've been playing for a few days and it's a fun way to unwind. However, my FIRST 3pcs on current level already has ONE shaded meaning it won't fit. The other two won't make an area disappear with just those pieces. Not cool. If it happens again I'm just uninstalling the game. There's way too many games available to have to deal with these numerous ads and the issue I'm dealing with. Thanks

Addictive. Did not think I would like it as much as I do. The journey challenges are fun. I don't like how I have to watch an ad if I win or lose. But I get it. I haven't paid a dime yet. I will say this though. If.you ever incorporate lives and or waiting times for each life I will drop to one star and delete. I say this because some levels have taken 20 to 30 tries back to back.

This game is absolutely horrible. They want to portray it's a thinking/problem solving game but it depends on the pieces they give you. Most problem solving games give you the ability to solve but they will give you pieces that aren't possible to fit with absolutely no way of either safe guarding your moves or correcting them which brings you to an automatic loss.

It is a fun game however when you get to the upper levels it becomes extremely difficult ( takes several days to get through some levels like this weeks level 74). It ceases to be fun any longer. I am seriously thinking about un installing it as I play for fun and relaxation. Not to become stressed after being stuck at the same level for three or four days at a time!

I love the IDEA of playing this game, but it seems like half of my play time is just ads. I understand having to watch an ad to continue if you fail the level or to get new pieces. But even when you WIN you get a typically-unskippable ad that requires perfect precision to X out of... when the X finallly appears. The option to just pay a couple dollars to remove the ads would be fine because effort obviously went into it, but I can't stand playing it as-is anymore.

Will you PLEASE make sure the advertisements fit on the screen so that you can actually utilize the X (or skip video, or close) feature when you need to? It's such a pain to have to close the entire game to get rid of the ad. This is ruining what is otherwise a very fun, challenging, and addicting game.

I'm editing my review to 1 star from 5. I've been waiting for the levels that you see in the ads, and I still haven't come across one. But that's not the worst part. The worst part is the ads. After you play the game for a couple of days every ad, and I mean every ad, has no option to x out of the ad after its over and go back to the game. You either have to install the game in the ad or close out the game and open it back up just to exit from the ad and get back to the game. I'm done

Game is fun but doesn't have an algorythm that dictates corrective problem solving skills. The game doesn't put you in situations where there is always a possible solution, it just throws random blocks at you. This makes it purely a game of chance. Sometime you get all the roles you need, sometimes you get the same blocks over and over that don't work in repeated patterns. In tetris this isn't an issue as there is limited movement, shapes and ability to see ahead a few blocks. Not puzzle, chance

Great game, but the app itself is not great. The ads cannot be closed majority if the time (no x appears or it is off screen even on my large tablet) so you have to close the game and reopen. Ads freeze often too. Or it takes multiple tries to close the ad when the x is available, so placement is off; it takes me to the ad page instead of closing. Also, no login so you cannot save progress among multiple devices.

The game isn't what the ads show. It is basically a variation of Tetris, but you don't have the option to rotate the pieces. Thus, it is as much a game of chance, depending on what pieces come up, as it is anything to do with any kind of skill. Excessive ads. Yes, I can put it in airplane mode, but I shouldn't HAVE TO! I get that is how the developers make money, but there is being compensated for your work, and there is "An ad display platform that is interrupted by an occasional game."

I adore this game. It's a simple and relaxing puzzle game. I much prefer the "journey" section than just the free mode. I need some sort of goal, like things to collect. I feel a little bit annoyed that they reset so often because I lose the satisfaction of beating the journeys before they end. I'd rather just have one super long journey that doesn't change or end with a few thousand levels. My only complaint is there is no way for me to remove ads.

Disclaimer: I downloaded this game to get free rewards in another app. No rewards for review. It's a very simple game that is harder than it looks. Its the perfect little game to waste time at like a drs office waiting or watching tv. You're just trying to out do your previous score no complex leveling systems. Not pay to win and very minimal ads(usually just after a game).

Love LOVE the game, but the amount of ads, and the LENGTH OF THE ADS, us absolutely horrible! Half the time, it won't even give you an "X" to get out of the ad and go back tocthe game. You have to close it, come back and it is STILL PLAYING THE STUPID AD! I'd give it 5 stars, if not for the LENGTH of the ads. Change the ad time and you'll keep clients!

The game is straightforward to understand and includes a clear tutorial at the start. Challenging to think of how best to fit the pieces together to score the most points. The only reason I don't give a five star rating is because the advertisement for this game is a bit misleading. It shows you different shaped boards that you have to fill and there isn't any such thing in the game, it's always the same board. I wish it did give you a different board shape on each new round!!

The journey mode is rigged so you can't finish the last 10 or so levels. I have played lvl 55 37 times and the past 5 games it has given me a set of 3 tiles where only 1 can be placed and has no chance at clearing anything on the board. They definitely feed you useless and bulky tiles to prevent you from finishing.

Enjoy the game when playing it. Seems to be a problem with ads never ending. Waited a couple minutes and only option to get out of the ad is to install it? Also the game is frustrating in that it doesn't seem to provide random pieces. It seems specifically programmed to only give you pieces you don't need. So say if you leave a space for a long piece that would clear a bunch you can be guaranteed to never get a long piece.

Unfortunately the pattern is always the same. You get the simple shapes at the start of the game (like the single piece) when you could do with more complex ones, then come the more complex ones when you run out of space. Could do with interesting addition like being able to rotate the pieces. That would improve the game greatly.

The gameplay and concept are great but the developers made it so they can just manipulate whether you win or lose every single game is decided 100% by them. Sorry but a random number generator doesn't give you the worst pieces possible always. Look I'm doing really well..... oh here's three pieces that will never fit no matter where I put them, repeat. Like if the object was to build a house and they're just throwing q-tips and popcorn at me....also no way to get a power up or extra play or..üí©

Eh, it wants to be Tetris but it's underwhelming. Also, the amount of ads really detracts from enjoying this game. I understand it's free, but I have the means to pay for a paid version if that exists, and have no patience for ads at every single level. I won't be back.

I actually really love this game, addictive and love the journey puzzles. But I really wish there was a way to pay for an ad free version. The ads are ridiculous in this game. It would also be nice to have an undo button that you could use at least once per level. Sometime I just accidentally drop pieces and ruins everything.

Note: you can get around the constand ads by disabling wifi & data usage in App Info. You lose access to the Journey mode, but daily puzzles are still avalible. Review: The Game itself is fine enough to kill time, but it really needs an ad free version. I'd be willing to drop 2 bucks to get rid of ads.

Awful. I thought this game would be putting shapes in to complete the box. But for the challenges they already have some pieces in then give you shapes that you don't need. It's frustrating. And the ones you fill in yourself gets boring pretty quickly. They only give you three shapes at a time, so good luck guessing. Skills aren't a big part of this game. Guessing is.

While not like the ad depiction the actual game was fun, but over time you become aware of how unfair and un random the game is. The pieces you get are almost always ones you don't need, and it feels like it's weighted towards pieces that you can not use making you get a game over to see another ad. That combined with the amount of pieces there are make it a game where you cant strategize to get better.

The game is fun and addicting, especially the journey levels. I would give it 5 stars IF there were an option to buy an ad free version. This was my go to game for months but the ads after every level are a bit much plus they interrupt my music.

Fun game, but it feels rigged... in the journey levels, sometimes it takes 50 or 60 tries... many times you'll get down to the last part of the objective and it'll give you 12 or more pieces that won't work toward the objective at all. I love a challenge, but that's ridiculous Now more and more of the ads don't let you close them and they last forever... rating went from 2 stars to 1... developer doesn't care though

The game is fun. The ads aren't excessive. But I wish (like old school Tetris) you at least had an idea of the pieces that were coming down the pike. Getting saddled with 3 useless pieces, and a guaranteed loss, because you made a normal choice is so annoying.

I agree with the other reviews, too many ads & it's programmed to make you retry a level many times, therefore making you watch an ad after each failure. This game has been mostly fun, but also irritating because of what I just mentioned. Add some features that give us boosts, like the ability to undo our last move, ability to swap pieces, or to clear pieces off the board. Maybe we could watch ads to get those boosts. If you're going to use ads this much, make it worth it for your users.

Very addictive game... Will not let me play in Airplane mode and there are a lot of multilayer ads, with 3 or more wait periods before you can close them... A few ads totally freeze and lock you out of the game,having to completely close the app and reopen... Would give much higher rating, but not letting you play in Airplane mode is a deal breaker

I like this game, but why can't I play offline anymore? I'll uninstall if I have to, because I don't like the intrusive ads. Your own words..."Playable offline so you can enjoy this wood block-puzzle classic anywhere!" Another point, it takes so long to load the next journey, even if I go online, sometimes takes days.

This game is okay but it is very frustrating in that it seems to deliberately give you really easy to place pieces in the beginning and then after a bit all the pieces are impossible to place. You just keep getting a diagonal piece one after the other and no pieces to help you clear block. Deleting.

Can't tell you if it's a good game or not because the ads are intrusive at best and cause a severe lag in game play. Several times I tried to lay a piece on the board but it would land elsewhere because the Google sense ads would freeze the whole game for anywhere from 10-40 seconds. Fix the lag and I'll change the rating.

I want to like this game more. Unfortuantly, the flaws are frustrating. The most frustrating flaw is how the pieces change at about 500 points. I understand the game should get harder, but you feel that you can not win even with good play. It seems appropriate that pieces presented should be used if play was correct. Often, two pieces are automatically grayed out with no way using them with good play. Also, the ads often have no way of closing. It forces a hard shutdown and restart of the app.

Interesting enough to keep me playing, but the ads are so repetitive they get very annoying. Currently I tend to play the Journey because you have an actual goal of winning more awards. But an award for just 2 levels? Really?! I'd rather get more awards for getting to higher levels.

Rubbish. Do not bother wasting your time Everything a curtain advert shows there's no cross to close the advert so you have to close the window and start game again which you then have to start all over again. Update.... Got to level 72 on journey then all of a sudden it went back to beginning again. Avoid like the plaque.

I love this game but like everyone else is saying, the ads are a huge problem. Invasive, take up way too much time, and very often the button to close them is either so tiny it opens the link or just doesn't work. I would totally buy an ad free version of this game and if it functioned the same way it would definitely get 5 stars from me.

I like the game. Even with ads. Except for one ad. Strawberry Shortcake. Every time it comes up it freezes my phone and I have to reboot in order to continue to play. Getting passed about it. The ad needs to be removed. It does have the X to delete it , but go away.

Use to love the game was very relaxing, a good way to keep my brain busy. The ad bug is driving me INSANE. Please fix it! It's really annoying having to close out of the app and reopen after every single level. I'm about to just delete and find a different game.

I came to hear about this game through Swagbucks, and while the concept of the game was appealing something was off in the higher levels. Within the first 12 hours I completed the first 55, however, it took 9 days to complete the next three. If it wasn't for that and the constant barrage of ads I would rather the game higher.

You're giving me the only pieces I need not to have. Many times I receive 2 out of 3 pieces already impossible to use. Need to improve your customer's experience? Show a row of 5 or more pieces that are next to flow in access. The way you're doing it now is you analize what are the most useless pieces one could receive next...and that is what you're giving next. And it's so annoying!!! Therefore, one star! And I can't even rotate the pieces!!!!!

This is the most incompetent display of game making I've ever seen. The journey level layouts are fixed, but the pieces you're given are completely random. Random to the point that it makes the level impossible to complete. Need a blue gem piece to clear the stage, all you'll get is yellow. Need a yellow? Nothing but blue. What absolute trash. You'd think such a simple game would be coded better, or have any kind of effort put into it at all.

The app has a major add problem! It forces you to watch the whole √°dd... and then no way to get back to the game. No x or arrow just stuck. Only way to continue playing is to close and restart. Same problem on a friends phone. If no reply and fix by 8.15.22 i plan to remove and post to remove this game.... this is not the only problem. And sent feedback twice to company support for corrections.

The game is fun but there are SO MANY ADS and you can't turn them off. All the ads are at least 20-30 seconds, and you have to watch the whole thing. There is no way to exit out, and they are after every single level. Uninstalling. Worst. Ad. Setup. Ever.

Overall game has way too many ads and is missing many features that would make the game more enjoyable. Journey mode isn't great when the entire time the levels are completely stacked against you. The game is purely luck based and requires very little skill to do well

The game is mis-marketed it's advertised as relaxing but the game itself feels more of a challenge type game then a relaxing game. The game itself is fun, and even with the constant ads it is fine, but my main gripe with it is the performance. It uses a lot of my phone battery, and my phone sometimes gets pretty hot. Sometimes while your placing it thinks you tapped on an ad and immediately takes you to the play store. So while the core gameplay is fun, it's the technical glitches that get you

Can skip ads on Android by swiping back to home and reloading. Good blend between Sudoku and Tetris. My issue is the gameplay. You get 3 pieces at a time, but once you're about to place the third piece, you have no indication what piece is on deck. It should play out like Tetris in that regard. Instead, it's just a game of luck or chance. Not knowing what piece comes next is not strategic at all. Just give me one piece at a time and show what piece is next. Simple as that. Done with this game.

At first, I enjoyed the game but the boards are repetitive and the pieces are equally standard. This game is not as advertised with unique boards and complex pieces with progressing levels. I thoulght as I advanced the game would also but that doesn't happen. My advice to improve this game would be more innovation with the levels and more pieces designed to make the boards challenging yet able to be passed. Overall, this game will bore users very quickly.

Every level or challenge beaten REWARDS YOU with an ad! You may also receive a gem for your "gem collection" but I don't believe they do anything. It's not satisfying. You can't play any of the advertised "shaped puzzles" right off the bat, or possibly ever for all I know. I installed Woodoku SPECIFICALLY for the shaped puzzles as it was a different challenge to "QBlock Sudoku" - which is a much better game with the same principle and significantly less ads. SO dissatisfied, uninstalling.

Annoying AF!!! Looks like this game will be lots of fun but it keeps crashing, kicking you off after each game played. Literally have to restart the app every single time. Very disappointing and I'm not sure how much longer I'll keep this app if this is how it works.

Giving 2 stars for the fact it presents challenging spatial logic puzzles to keep your mind thinking ahead. However, unless you enjoy seeing ads after EVERY single puzzle is completed, this is best skipped. Can't handle an ad after every single puzzle. Mostly the same ad... Evony... lol.

Way to many ads! And they're not even the easy to remove ads. You gotta find this Tina little x and it refuses to work no matter how good you press it. To top it off once you close it you get another that you have to wait 20 seconds to close followed by a 3rd ad. So am I playing the game or am I playing with ads??

There's a sense that the game is rigged to let you succeed or not by the choices that appear. They do not seem to be random pieces. The pieces gradually get larger as the game progresses. If it allowed one to rotate pieces or move them around that would be more interesting and less frustrating.

Super fun and unique! Wish I could pay for no ads, though! Gonna have to make it lower now. The ads have no way of closing them. I have to close the app and reopen it. Update: deleted and re-download and it is working now. Still wish I could pay for no ads. Re-update: still happening.

Exceptionally long ads and sometimes you cannot close the ads, then must kill the whole game. And now it won't let me play on airplane mode, it says you must be connected to the internet to play, i.e. forces you to watch 2 minute ads that uses 80Mb of your data after every level.

LOVE the game, but the ads are out of control! Now they won't give you the option of going back to the game...even after watching the entire thing! You shouldn't have to completely go out of the game and back in after every round just to keep playing!!! Getting very frustrated!!!

This app has caused my phone to crash 3 times. I started noticing it would freeze or start to glitch while playing and then the ads would not allow me to exit so I would have to press report and it exit out of the game altogether. My phone would crash shortly after. I recently downloaded it again and thought it was okay until the glitches started again so I decided to write a review on hopes someone will fix this issue. Great game but it's not worth my phone crashing.

Not as advertised, just a load of squares, that eventually you just can't go any further, and have to watch ads, over and over again, got to about level 30+, and was vertually impossible to progress, ok for an hours pastime, but that's it, where are all the advertised patterns??

Fun but could use some tweeks. The daily challenge is the only reason I still have this game but I'm about to uninstall because it won't let me play previous days' challenges. Are old levels only challenging on those dates? That's just silly. I would watch an ad to make up a previous challenge and earn all the gems for the month, other games have that option so why not this one? Just saying, sometimes I have a super busy day and you don't want me to play your game longer when I have the time?

I love the game itself and the challenge that it provides. The problems have begun recently with ads. Too many ads where you tap the X and it takes you to the screen to download the game. Then there are the Unity based ads that play sounds even with all sounds shut off on my phone. I would definitely change my rating if the ad issues were fixed.

You have an ad that won't turn off. The time runs out, but there's no way to close the ad. You must close the game and reopen. It's getting rather frustrating as the ad comes up frequently. It is the Strawberry Shortcake Berry in the Big City ad. Please fix!!

Works fine but it's just a knock-off of tetris except you can't rotate the blocks. What you see in the ad is not a true reflection of the game. OK as a casual timewaster but LOTS of ads - fewer if you play with WiFi turned off.

I really enjoy üòâplaying woodoku. It challenges your brain üß† in a very simple manner. What I would suggest in playing the journey mode, could you make it last for the end of the month instead of 5 days. Most people üôÑ(myself included) may not have the time to finish the puzzle with work,school,family, etc. Thanks!

Very fun type of Terri's but without option to rotate the elements is completely down to luck on the higher difficulty (final levels of the journey). You think you are there then you get elements that don't fit completely and game doneüôÑ Too many ads!

It a fun game and the challenges are entertaining, however, the RNG pieces do not feel random. It seems like the game purposefully gives you pieces that does not fit. I've lost many games where they gave me, possibly, the only piece that would end the game. Also on levels where you clear gems, I've had games where I need one specific color and the game will not create the colored gem, opting instead to give you everything else until you lose. This is not a one time occurrence.

Cute game but what's up with the ads? They last forever and when I tap the "x " it activates the game in the ad or when I tap the "x" it takes me to the install page, and worse - tap the "x" and it won't let you leave the ad at all. I have to restart Woody to get away from the nightmare. 5 stars if not for that

I keep getting ads that get stuck with no way out but to completely exit the app and return. Also on hard levels when you're about to win they give you piece after piece that couldn't possibly win. I'm getting fed up.

The game is fun but I'm uninstalling it due to how invasive the ads are. I understand the developers need to make money but tapping the tiny x to close the ad shouldn't redirect me to the app store three times before it finally closes and since it gives you an ad after every level you end up spending just as much time with the ads as you do with gameplay.

The game is Awesome and has great potential,but drags it's experience way down because of the A word,yup! ADS, CAN YOU DEVELOP OR UPDATE THE GAME SO IT DOESNT PLAY AS MANY ADS AMD ARE MUCH SHORTER? ALSO,PLEASE MAKE A REASONABLE PAY FOR VERSION TO REMOVE ADS. AND HAVE AN OOTION TO ROTATE PIECES TO FIT LIKE TETRIS,THAT WOULD MAKE IT AWESOME.

Good but too many ads. If we had the option to skip or remove ads, this game would be great. Its also nothing like the ads that got me to download it. It was advertised as a shape puzzle kind of game but its really more like tetris with a pinch of sudoku only without the numbers

I love this game. I really do. But there are just some things that will ultimately force me to uninstall it: the ads, while very short, are annoying. No way to pay to remove them; there is no way out when you run out of spaces (even if you completed the ones offered). Why not be able to earn single cubes, build up a stash and use them as needed? So, playing a level over and over and over gets annoying.

Pretty ok game. Would be better if they didn't give you "random" blocks towards the end that you either can't use or will not help you get to the next 3 "random" blocks. They could save us some time and energy by showing a message like "these blocks will not help you, quit now."

I like this game and play the daily game and journey. Request for developers - we have the awards in the weekly journey, but any chance of seeing the actual levels as well? when looking back at past games you see the awards but they don't tell the actual story. Many a week I'm just one level short of next award. Sometimes levels are more important than awards.

This game gets me its like im back in highschool and i have a huge test in the morning in geometry, if l dont turn up the brain a little and study harder im gonna bomb it. I have played this for quite sometime and if i dont turn up the brain l could be out at 100 or l can hit 800-1000 3 times in a row its a fabulous learning tool and fun for all ages try it !! ‚Å∞

waste of time and data. not like ads. just show actual game in ads, please. i liked the look of the fitting blocks into shapes, but what the game is is just a square. also, boring until stupidly challenging

please heard me out. I strongly advise not to download the game. the game is more likely a game of luck rather then using your brain. they only show you 3 pieces. then next 3 that they will give you is the pieces that don't fit or will make you lose. instead they should show the next 3 pieces ahead or able to flip the side.(ps they only care about ads revenue). again my strongly advise not to download the game.

Too Many Political Ads - I like the game a lot and put up with the ads for games but I WILL NOT play the game anymore if the Political ads continue. Give people a break from Dr. Oz and his false messaging campaign. Stop the politics in game!!!!! I've been forced to watch the same, 30 second ad 10 times in a row and that's enough, uninstalled the game.

I had a lot of fun with this app for about a week. Found it addictive. But now it freezes every time I play, requiring me to uninstall and reinstall it and, unfortunately, losing my high scores every single time. It is no fun to constantly have an app freeze so now I am giving up on it. ‚òπÔ∏è

Good game but constant ad bombardment is extremely off-putting. I'd probably pay for a premium ad-free version, but I cannot seem to find one. Ads are relentless, literally have to watch an ad after.... every.... single.... game to continue on. Can't take it anymore, uninstalled.

I've been having issues with other apps inundating you with ads. This one has the right amount, just a short bit in between games and unintrusive banners. For actual game play, the only time I get individual blocks seems to be right at the start when I don't need them ‚òπÔ∏è Otherwise I'm addicted and improving

I really liked this game! 5 stars... It's so addictive!! BUT.....I have played this game for freaking hours .... and hours ... And can get stuck on one level for days.... 4 stars.....it's very frustrating...3 stars... I might quit... because I have yet to finish a journey!! And I spend way too much time playing it not to be able to finish a flipping journey!! UPDATE: after 500 tries to get thru a stupid level... I'm done! DELETED

Must include the option to rotate the pieces! That's the only way to get out of the madness! If the game is going to make it too difficult to anticipate future pieces, that's not logic, that's chance. If one could rotate the pieces, at least you could formulate a strategy.

Almost interesting for a mind less passtime, NOTHING LIKE THE ADVERTISED GAME, but continuous playtime is too short, being limited by the shapes supplied. But ADVERTISEMENTS EVERY ROUND !!! I know they have to turn a profit, but they won't make much of everyone uninstalls it did to adverts.

Relaxing Fun Game. 2 improvements. Pay for ad free game. The ads often play sounds even when I had the sound turned off. Right now there is a Strawberry Shortcake ad that I cannot seem to get out of without closing the game....please fix!

There's a guaranteed ad after every game which often requires to press the little tiny "x" multiple times and if you miss it takes you to the appstore which means you have to watch the ad again if you go back to the game. How greedy can you be? Also de game is nothing like advertised which should be illegal and is very bad practice nowadays.

The pieces they give you are not random at all. I never seem to get the piece I need at the time, though they're extremely common when I don't need them. The further you get, the more pieces you get that are almost impossible to place anywhere. They do this so you lose the game and get to the ads sooner. Was fun at first till I caught on. Uninstalling.
author_name: End of quote Repeat the line

review_text: Fine enough. The ads are loud even with the game volume off. I wish there was an undo button or boosters. This game drains battery like crazy and makes my phone hot, which doesn't make sense for how simple the gameplay is. I also wish the board and the blocks had mire contrasting colors. It's nore difficult to play when your backlight is low, or it's too bright outside.

This game is a waste of time. If you like a game that is irritating then is one is for you. It gives you 3 pieces you put in the box. These are use to clear lines or blocks. The problem is the game will pick patterns you can't use at all. If you're trying to clear a line or block you will fill the box before you get what is needed. The the game will give you 2 to 3 patterns you can't use. Enjoy wasting your time.

The algorithm doesn't allow me to think further. It is boring after a while as no system involved from my side. I made 2030 and uninstalled it. After installing it again I never made it above 1500. I am looking for a more challenging game.

Their priority = Greed. I understand having ads to support a free game. This has a few more than I would prefer, but whatever. Took a flight and opened Woodoku while in airplane mode. After 30 ish minutes it locked and said "connect to network to continue playing". I wasn't trying to play a daily challenge, just the basic game. Programming a lock to insure that your users HAVE to watch ads at all times or be denied play, is insensitive and just plain greedy. I won't support a company like that!

I love the simplicity and yet continual challenge of this game! I appreciate that there is a different goal oriented puzzle available each day in addition to the regular, open board puzzles (where you can try to beat your all-time best score) and the increasingly challenging goal based puzzles in the "adventure" mode. (The beautifully rendered graphics help too!)

Fun game that I love playing a lot. My 6 yr old daughter also loves trying to 'help' me solve the puzzles. However I can't allow her to play with me since most the ads are horribly explicit. Not at all what I expected from a game rated E.
Not as interesting as the adverts imply. Works a bit like Tetris, but you can score 3x3 boxes as well as lines. If there is more to it, I uninstalled before I played long enough to find out.

I like the game itself quite a bit, but THE ADS!! Omg, so so so so so freaking many ads! üòñ And LONG ones, not quick ones. Ugh! It's so completely annoying that I only play it on airplane mode now, and I'm thinking I'll just uninstall altogether. Seems to be no way to purchase the game or purchase a no-ads version -- NOT WORTH IT.

I really enjoyed this game (maybe a little too much) as I love fitting shapes together, but my experience was ruined by TOO MANY ADS. Every time I clear a puzzle, I am punished with a really long ad for some sad game. I can tolerate a few ads, or ads after losing, but this ridiculous bombardment ruins my flow. I would have paid to make the ads stop, but I can't find any option to buy ‚òπÔ∏è Rating would be higher if the ads weren't so obnoxiously frequent.

Not really a game, but an ad generator. Win-lose, here is an ad. Especially works well on lvls, where there is no room for even the intial figures. So, 3 secs of game and then 10 secs of ad. Very interesting

This game's not fun enough to watch a stupid video after every level. You can play for a while with your data off but eventually you have to turn it back on to move up. Forced videos = 1 star and uninstalled.

This a fun game, and I thoroughly enjoyed it, but i have to say that I'm uninstalling it because it jumps to an ad after EVERYTHING... win or lose, you have to watch an ad between them all. I fully understand ad revenue, but this dev team went beyond the extreme. By all means play it if you don't mind the ads between every level.

LATER: I am uninstalling this while I still have data left - this app is *chewing* my mobile data. EARLIER I love this game but the looong adverts get on my nerves. Sometimes the adverts are more than 20 seconds long with no way of stopping them (I actually timed one advert at 35 seconds). Sometimes there are 5 second ads, but 2 in a row.
Great, but the ads are obnoxious. I'd be happy to pay for an ad-free version - I like the game enough. But an ad after every puzzle is annoying enough that it makes me want to put the game down.

I love this app. There is a problem when it updates but the app itself has a variety of smaller inside apps. The section of this app labeled "journey" leaves a lot to be desired. Depending on the device you play on, everything isn't working right or it could be an eye issue that I have. Either way, I'm not going to play it anymore. I hate to tell you this but your app eats on Mt battery too.
Way too many ads...and they are a bit tricky to skip thru/close. Also, the pieces just don't appear to be random This came pre-loaded on my new phone and it's being uninstalled.

I love the game so far. The ads wait until you finish a game. Which is cool with me it doesn't interrupt during play. However when the ads do come up half the time I can't close them out for some reason I want to say size issue and I have to restart the app to keep playing.

Great base of a game. Ads between each game i can manage, but sometimes gets annoying. When you get to higher levels of the journey mode, which is the main feature of the game, it becomes unnecessarily impossible to win without luck. You can code it better. Im looking for similar games now.. Please fix the block selection for higher levels. Just giving more % of complicated blocks does not make it more difficult in a fun way. It must be beatable with some strategy, not luck.
Fun game. Except every time you complete or fail a puzzle, you watch an ad, even if puzzle takes 5 seconds you watch an ad. I spent more time watching ads than playing, like significantly more time.

Game is a good time waster. But I downloaded this game because I saw a shape fitting jig-saw puzzle ad, but there are actually no such puzzles like that in the game. So I've given a 1 star for false advertising.

DO NOT UPDATE. BESIDES ADVERTISING AFTER EACH GAME NOW SITS ON TOP OF SCREEN ADS. With this update even more intrusive ads. do you your self a favor there are way better apps of this type. they could at least offer a way to not get ads. like paying for premium version. but of course the answer is they make more money this way. or so they think.

Good concept, bad execution. Although visually similar and named after sudoku, the similarities stop there. Success is extremely luck based on all levels. There is limited strategy to it but most of your success or failure is determined by what the game "rolls" for you rather than good planning and smart decisions, which is likely because you get an ad each time you fail. It's to the company's advantage to make you fail.

I love the new additions to the game. I find it addictive. I decided to uninstall because after each game there are ads, most of which you cannot close. That means your only option left is to completely close the game and restart. That's takes longer than actually playing the game!!

Love the game but the length of the ads & the unability to exit the ad is beyond ridiculous. The ads are literally like 3+mins & most of the time I have to exit the game after 3 mins of waiting for the X to put up to exit the ad but never does so my only option is to exit the game smh. Do something about the AD ISSUES & LENGTH and the game would be 5 stars!

Just when you think your getting close, they will start giving pieces that don't fit anywhere until the board eventually fills and you lose the level. The whole game is about giving you pieces you can't use. The game is clearly rigged so if you get too close to winning you won't get the pieces you need to close the puzzle. The game is designed for you to fail. And the freezing every fifth time you play so you have to uninstall and reinstall just got to be too much. Permanently uninstalled.

Very clean and well designed, this game sticks to the basics without all the annoying bloat and extras that ruin most games. Ads are not overbearing and only show up after you have completed your game, which is refreshing. Challenging and addictive. Highly recommended.

I've been playing this game continuously since October 2020, and it's by far my favorite time waster game. It's very easy to play for long periods of time in the free mode {2702 high score}. Even though the journeys have gotten a bit too dry and repetitive for me, the base game will never get old. There are surprisingly many strategies possible as well, which can spice up the gameplay. Overall a 5 star game!

The game is ok. Classic is a bit boring but I like the daily and challenges. But could you PLEASE fix the ads! You have ads that there is no way out of them other than closing the game. And with the amount of ads we have to contend with, it's pretty flipping annoying!

Never ending ads! Ads between levels used to be 5 seconds. They got longer, and longer. Now, they literally don't end! You have to shut down the game and restart to get to the next level. I'm uninstalling.

Absolutely terrible. Sometimes the blocks won't break when they should,wayy to many adds, I don't even think it's possible to get to 1000, it gives you horrible blocks to work with,it is not relaxing, it takes up quite a bit of space , and is overall a scam

Very enjoyable game! Challenging for sure. There is one thing I'm running into that seems like a flaw though. Occasionally I get an ad that doesn't have an option to close out to get back to the game and I have to close the app completely and get back into it in order for it to go away.

Nice game, but...many times after you compete a level you get the expected ad....but I doesn't stop. No X in a corner to close it out. Have to close and relaunch the app. Gets annoying when I have to do this so often. And the creators have pretty much left social media, so you can't ask them about it, or even compliment them on something new they added (love the bubbles, hate the ads).

The adverts outweigh the game. Totally take over MY phone. Unacceptable. Not to mention making the challenges close to impossible. If you want people to lose at this game just start throwing in larger shapes. Simple. Sick fed up you need 1 blue and the game never gives the one you need, sorry to say but this is being deleted. Utter nonsense. Edit. I actually uninstall this. Over 2gig in mobile data, used my data to smash my phone with adverts!

I do like playing it, and it's great if you are bored. However, I recently found out that it is being falsley advertised, just like any block puzzle game. A lot of people complain about the amount of ads, but really, there aren't that many. It's a fun game though, but three stars for the stupid "marketing trick"

I like the game but like most games, I will probably quickly stop playing it as there is no way to remove the ads. If they'd sell it for a dollar or so I'd prob keep playing it a bit longer though. But, already not a gamer to begin with. It'll just quickly become a souvenir of the past haha

Great time waster. Terrible if you actually like to progress. If you like tetris and time killers this is your game. If you're like me and like to make progress in the games you play then not so much. In journey mode things get so difficult that even playing for hours at a time it takes more than one day to complete one level. That's ridiculous and frustrating. I get it's all luck of the draw with the block shapes given and placement but I don't enjoy not making progress for days on end.

Gameplay is fun and gets the brain working. But somehow the ads have gotten worse. I have to watch the whole ad but there's no X to actually shut down the finished ad. 3 times this has happened. Even after force shut down of the app, the same thing kept happening. Will be uninstalling and forgetting üòë

Quite good. Often adverts don't have any way to return to the game so I have to quit the app to get out of the advert. This is not a good tactic as I often don't relaunch the game when this happens. Make adverts exitable. Time limits are fine.

Was looking for a puzzle game to play that didn‚Äôt require internet. So this was good, for about six hours and suddenly it says I need internet to continue. Looks like I will have to look for a new app now, rated two stars instead of one, because it was at least a good time waster. High score on classic: 1084

Decent game, but the ad screen are over half the time too big for my phone. The close box doesn't even show up so I have no way of exiting the ad. I end up having to just close the app completely and then opening it back up. Since this happens after every level attempt it is very annoying.

The ads run longer than it take to play a level. One ad had such a small close button that you could not close it. It kept opening to Google play. I had to close the game completely. I'm uninstalling after 8 minutes of play.

Gameplay itself is fine, but the ads are unapologetically in your face and intrusive, time consuming and you often spend more times watching them than playing. Never set anything up either, because it will never give you the piece you need. It's pure luck.

I like it. Yes, there are annoying ads but the game itself is still very enjoyable. I gave this a 3 but was working on the Journey and now my progress is gone. So giving it a 2 instead. Please fix your bugs.

This game used to be fun before the update. Now, to get anywhere close to winning, you'd need to play multiple hours every day. It took the fun out if the game. It's impossible to complete 84 levels in 6 days without constantly playing the game. No fun. I'll be uninstalling.

This came as bloatware on my new phone. The game is okay, but the ads are ridiculous. Instead of ads that you can close or that end and close, this game has ads that make you have to close the app to get rid of them. Will probably uninstall it because that is super annoying.

Good idea for a game, but you can't even try to fill lines or squares; it seems to deliberately give you pieces that won't fit anywhere. It could be a good strategy game if it was improved, but as it is, its just frustrating.

False advertising. Litterally nothing like the ad I saw that made me want to download it. It looked like a shape filling game but instead it's something completely different. Don't waste your time downloading this. Taking it for what it is even, it's not very fun.

Why on earth can you NOT close the ads?? I don't mind watching them for 15-30 seconds or skipping over but lately at least every 3rd one you cannot close!! You have to exit the app completely then go back in and wait for the whole game to reload. Fix it!!!
Have a lot of fun, but ads after every match win or lose gets is kind of annoying. The worse part is some ads have no way to skip or move past them. You end up having to close the app and reload it.

It's fun and I enjoy playing it. The spatial puzzle part of it is a good exercise for my brain. What I DON'T like is that there is an ad after every. Single. Level. And more often than not, they are unskippable. I'll be playing a little more, to give it a fair chance, but if the ads stay the same, I'm not sticking around.

The game is great, the ad after every level is horrible. I came looking to pay for an ad-free upgrade. There is no option for that, hence the 1 star. It's a bummer because my child really likes the game, but it's WAY too many ads for her.

Not what was in the ads for the game(false advertising) This game is basically a dumber version of tetris you get 3 shapes at a time with certain objectives to clear the board in certain spots. Theres no way to plan ahead because you only get 3 shapes at a time. also there's ads.

Should be called "ADoku." Lose a match; forced to watch an ad. Win a match; forced to watch another ad. Plus ads autoplaying DURING matches. Watching ads more than playing the game.... Devs, figure out a way to get people to seek out the ads to get some kind of bonus or boost for matches. No one wants ads forced down their throat! Uninstalling after less than an hour of play :/
Some of the ads are so magnified that you can't "x" or skip out of them after the timer runs out so I literally have to close the entire app and open it back up to get past an ad! Really annoying.

This is a very fun game and I enjoy playing very much. That said, the ads have some type of glitch that causes them to freeze up. You have to exit the game and reopen it. This happens frequently and is very frustrating. Please fix the problem I want my fun game back.

I enjoy the game, and general I don't mind the ads as you get what you pay for. But I do mind that there is a glitch that doesn't allow the ad to end. It freezes them at the end of the ad and doesn't provide a way to exit to go back to the game. Have to close the game and open back up to play. I wish that could get fixed!

I would have given this app a higher rating, as it has quickly became a game I really enjoyed. However, today there was an update and instead of just the usual ad between games I now have an ad banner at the top of every game too. Now the game constantly lags and runs choppy. Absolutely terrible!

When I am finally have some challenge in the weekly levels to break my brain with, the time limit is over and sends me back to level 1 with a new event... it discouraged me a lot. wish there was a way to keep playing more difficult puzzles.

I love playing this game, however, there is no way to return to the game after ads, aside from shutting the entire game down every time. I'll look for another game other than this one. Uninstalled, because it's so frustrating with the ads

The game is actually fun, but too many ads, almost in every stage either we succed or fail a stage always comes with an ads.... something to reconsider downloading, unless perhaps if you are willing to pay the premium well have it your way... for me, i had uninstalled already...

The game itself is fine, but the ads are a huge pain. Some don't give you the option to close the ad so you have to close the game. Others are really LOUD. I understand that the ads keep the game free, but they completely interfere with the game.

NOT RECOMMENDED. Very poor ad behaviour. I watched the ad from the game "Cats and Soup". Volume blasted on full DESPITE the fact that my phone is on DND (do not disturb) mode AND ALL VOLUMES WERE SWITCHED TO 0. Ad is inaccurate as you don't have all the pieces laid out before you in the actual game.

I Love puzzle games and this game is very fun. I like the old wood theme. Kind of like the old fashioned "Woodie" cars from the 1950's. I highly recommend this game. I am playing it through the Mistplay app and progressing toward a gift card while having fun!

There are ads, and ads, and ads, and more ads. Then, when you're on an ad break, after all those exhausting ads, you can rest content that there are still plenty of ads to go around. Pathetic, garbage app; save your time and skip this. Also, there are ads and ads that you cannot skip that will take you out of the game before you can close the window. Developer ought to be ashamed of themselves for pretending that this is a game.

Nice game. Fun, but your ads freeze, slow and crash the game every attempt to play. Frustrating and on the verge of deleting it for good. Please eliminate flashy animated ads.. they're ruining the experience.

Very frustrating, I played this game as part of a Swagbucks offer: Goal was to reach level 60 on Journey mode, gave up upon reaching the very last level because it's way too hard due to the game screwing you over by giving you block pieces that force you to lose, don't bother.

Like the game but to many ads and some you can't even close. There needs to be like a $2 or $3 dollar option to play without ads. If a game is good I have no problem paying a small amount to not have to deal with ads.
I love this game. HOWEVER, recently I can't close out of ads. It freezes the game and I have to exit the app. Very frustrating!! I will look for another similar game that lets me exit the ads. UGH!

I want to give this 5 stars, because I really like the game, but the ad issue is making me not want to play it. Too many don't have the exit option, so I have to completely close out of the game and go back in, if I want to keep playing. After 30 minutes of that, I don't want to keep playing and will pick a different game.

Changing review to a single star. Cannot go any lower. Call it what it is...they are promoting fraud with the ads. When an ad will not close, it is a fraudulent advertisement. When you allow more of these than regular ads that allow the user to close the ad without closing the program, then you are the perpetrator of these fraud. Really Kraptastick guys!!! And stay out of Taiwan...

It takes a a few seconds to load, dont give up if its more time than you like, its worth it. Its a fun game, keeps me thinking and the ads are real fast, not stupid and give the option to skip after just a second.

The game is not at all like the advert, where you fit the blocks onto shapes. It's a lot like Tetris where you fit prescribed shapes into blocks that disappear when you have them grouped. Otherwise there are daily challenges where you must collect a certain number of gems, and occasional journeys, but no puzzles like in the ads.

I enjoy playing this game but the ads are too long. I have searched for a version of this game so that I can purchase so that I can play without the ads. The fact that the ads have started causing my screen to go black and not able to continue the game is the last straw. I guess I'll have to quit the game since buying a version without ads seems unavailable. I'd give this game 5 stars if I could buy the game without ads.

This game is nothing but a ad machine. It is rigged to where you will always get a piece you cant use once you reach higher scores so that you will watch yet another ad. Only played it for a offer wall, after a few days of trying to get a 2k score i see now why the offer is so generous.

It was challenging...but now the daily word play when won doesn't go to the next level the next day...It's stuck on 14...Also the journey starts back to the first level daily....Very annoying!...It was one of my favorites! Please fix it!

Since you are allowing ads that cannot be exited and do not have a timeout (you have to restart the game app on Android to proceed), you are teaching us that we don't have watch the ads to play your game. Ads occur when you complete a game or when you fail a game. Just restart the game when the ad starts and you can quickly get back to where you were.

Woodoku is one of my favorite games! Who knew high school geometry would help in playing a game!? I have a few requests or suggestions. 1. Have an undo button. Sometimes my granddaughter grabs my hand and messes me up. Also if my hand slips I may put the set of blocks in the wrong place. 2. When the player places a group of blocks on the grid, it would be cool if a new set of blocks would show up. This would enable the player (me!) more time to plan ahead. 3. More jewels etc please!
Too many ads! Sometimes i play a level for like 30 seconds and have to watch another ad after just watching one if I get stuck and have to start over, especially when playing the journey.

Very poorly made. Very little puzzle to the game. It's play the same board over and over and over till the system gives you pieces that work. Could be a good game. Time consuming is about all its good for.
The ad shows cute puzzle shapes, Nope it's always a grid, and there's an ad after each game. I gave it a chance. It's just boring and too many ads. No thanks, not for me .

Been playing this for months okay. Then all of a sudden the adverts are too big for the screen. You can no longer see the X button to close. The only way out is to exit the game every time and go back in. I have put up with it for a week now but it is driving me nuts! Whatever 'bug fix' you did in August has created another one. I love the game and do not mind the ads when they are normal size. Please please please fix this! Thank you.

Fun enough game but too many ads. Some ads would not cancel even after the required wait time. I don't mind ads in a free game but these are too intrusive and too time-consuming. The game isn't worth the time.

Just deleted the app. It's actually great fun but the pop ups for suggested games are disgusting, extremely denigrating towards women. Also, in one pop-up, message appeared in both English and Russian. If there's any even slight connection to Russia with this game, I want nothing to do with it.

Had a 5 star but had to change because I'm playing through a site that pays to reach a certain level in so many days but the damn app doesn't show you levels anywhere I can see and have reached out for support multiple times over at least a week and no response at all. I do.t mind ads for a free app but damn man yall r costing me money

I thoroughly enjoy this game, and I don't mind the ads (the are short), but I cannot cancel most ads, even if I wait for them to play all the way through. After each level, I must exit the game and restart. Very frustrating.

Has potential but way too many ads; some are very long. I understand the need/desire for the ads but the playtime to ad time ratio is unacceptable. When you have two dialog options and 1 choice requires you to watch an ad, if you select the non ad choice, you still get an ad. Short cut scenes often have multiple ads. I can't determine if the developer is greedy or doest have enough story to justify the app so they fill the time with ads. After 1 cut scene, I had 5 ads in a row. Uninstalled.

I realize that the game developers get paid via advertisements but, come on. The number of ads that play during the game are off the charts. A new ad automatically interrupts the game every 15 - 30 seconds. You literally spend more time watching ads than you do playing the game. Then there is tge game. No matter what options you choose, you are forced to play as if there was one option. Not really much of a game, just a big, long string of adverts.

So first let me start by saying I did not read the reviews before downloading and I thought it was just my phone messing up when the ads came on. This is a really fun game but I'm tired of the ads every 10 seconds I don't mind watching ads to get the dresses and choices but I've had 3 ads back to back and the 3rd one froze up my phone (happened multiple times). Y'all have some MAJOR bug problems to fix and I really hope you don't let us down and that you ACTUALLY fix them!!!

I'd give it zero if I could. The ads are every 2 lines of dialog. At one point I had 2 ads start at the same time. The game play is boring and requires you to watch even more ads to get the good option. It's basically a tap and hold game. One level didn't even work at all. The game itself is horribly fatphobic and treats female characters like their only worth is being pretty. They have a "sexy schoolgirl" outfit for the character. The game is wildly offputting and poorly done.

So after your character gets to the airport you have to find a bomb, which is the man in black by the way your game will freeze then crash. If it doesn't crash it will just freeze then the only thing playing are the large amounts of annoying adds. If you exist out of the game it starts you over again but will still crash, and again your only stuck with adds playing. To the person that maid this games you are an evil individual because some people will just pay the 2.99 for the add free option.

This "game" is ridiculous. It's full of AD's, because of said ads the "story" gets interrupted and often times you miss what was being said because it kind of skips after the ad. The grammar is terrible, you can tell that whoever is writing or translating this doesn't know proper English. The "story" which doesn't seem well composed at all is all over the place and the choices are usually not much of a choice as you end up having to change your choice, not that either one will give you much.

Ads are totally ridiculous! Like every 30 seconds another ad is popping up, you can fast skip them but then it takes forever to be able to close it to get back to the game and then you have 30 seconds to hurry and get through before another ad is popping up! I can't even tell you of I like the game or not because I'm uninstalling it. When I play a game I want to play the game not make them money by watching the ads they are shoving down my throat!

Entirely way to many ads. When you watch an ad to get rewarded for your choices , it don't give you credit for watching it. Plus it also takes you back an entire scene to start over from there , again.... It sucks and is extremely slow advancing.!!!! If I could give it less than a star for a rating . I would most certainly do so.!!!!!

I was enjoying the game up until it started to freeze on me at the airport part where you interrogate people. I even spent three dollars for no ads and the game still freezes and lags on the part I am on. I'm afraid to uninstall then restalling the game because I don't want to lose the $3 I spent for no ads. Is there a way you can fix this bug?

Would be a decent game to play to pass the time but there are too many ads. If you want ads in your game thats fine but every 15 seconds is way to excessive. Tried to play without internet on but won't allow that either, requires wifi or data. Unless you really enjoy ads, I wouldn't even waste taking up space on your phone with this.

Would be a nice game if.... you didn't have to watch ads every 45 seconds and the game didn't crash during ad play. I really tried to give the game a chance, but it disappointed me twice by freezing and not be able to move forward. After the ad/app froze, I closed it and reopened it only to find that I had to start the segment over and watch 2 more ads, only to freeze on the 2nd ad again. So I think it's time to uninstall and maybe try again some time down the road. Good luck!

I like the game I'm just annoyed that there are no more stories left, I did two stories and that was it. I can't do the story again either, now its just a waste of space. Other than that the game is fun, the ads, choices, no bugs, for me is a big deal. So all together I would continue of more stories are added. HOWEVER there is fat shaming and that I do not understand you could replace this with better content

It would be a better game if there weren't an ad every 40 seconds. Its very annoying to watch an ad and then 5 seconds later there is another, makes it difficult to play and enjoy it. Im close to uninstalling it because of this. Not everyone can pay for the no ads. I watched a ad and not even 50 seconds later there was an ad, and when I finished that ad there was another like 10 seconds after. Its annoying and I'm uninstalling this app.

The game has potential and could be fun, but there are more ads than game, for one. On top of that, the animation is terrifying! The whole plot is nonsensical, and the ads for the game itself are fatphobic and sexist. These are easy changes, and until they're made, I'm a little disgusted playing this.

A cute game , but those back to back ads every second causes the game to forget where you're at and end up having to repeat what you've done right along with the every second ad. Very frustrating. I did make it to prom queen but the next chapter I only made it to changing into interview outfit and driving to the office after several attempts because ads pop up and cause accidents. Now ad popped up game shuts down. So no choice but to delete. Cute game but if you don't pay you won't play long.

I would give this 0 stars if I could. The storyline was fine. It was the ads, and the glitches, and the crashing that ruined this for me. I understand you have to use ads, but it was literally every 5 seconds. And the game crashed while an ad was going. If it did work it made the game glitch horribly. I would not recommend this game at all. Waste of my time

This is a cute game of choices, but the ads are app. every 10 seconds. And if u don't play the game within those 10 seconds, you guessed it....an ad right in the middle of playing. I understand that ads keep the game free, but this is ridiculous with the ads. It was soooooo annoying, plus there were times when the page would freeze and regardless if your 10 seconds were up......yep there was an ad. I Don't recommend this game to anyone....unless you like being annoyed.

Verrrry bad game ngl, for about 2 minutes you dont get ads as much, but then as soon as you get past helping the nerd, its ad galore. Every 5 seconds almost. The animation for the characters is goofy, and the story seemed like something to kill time with, but I can't handle all the ads. The game freezes a lot, lags, obviously ads, you cant play offline because it forces you to stay connected to the internet, its just a money scheme.

I played the game and it's pretty fun, for ppl fussing abt the ads you can just turn on airplane mode n you good. If you want special routes you can just turn it on, press the route n play it out, then turn it off again. The game has alright storyline and the ads for it are pretty accurate to some extent. Love this game! :D

It's a good game, but I wish you could use coins to do special choices instead of ads. I rly want to try them, but the ads won't work. Great game. Thank you, and add more levels, I want to see what happens next!

I agree with the other reviews. I'm fine with ads in games (the sacrifice you make when playing a free game) but the amount in this is insane. You can't go more than ten seconds without one popping up, it takes WAY longer than it should to complete a level because of all the ads. It's just a ridiculous way to get you to pay for an ad free experience, and honestly the game isn't worth paying anything for.

Awful!!! There are SO MANY ADS that it's completely unplayable! The concept is pretty good, and for the first 3 minutes or so I got ads at the end of every chapter, which is reasonable, but then I suddenly started getting them every 10 seconds. Literally. This game is so annoying! You barely get to play the game! It's so stupid! Fix the ads or i'm deleting the app cuz it really gets on my nerves when i want to play a game but cant because of a fricken ad-pocalyspe!

Because I like the game, but theres just too many ads. That's also the reason why I agree with the other reviews.

More adverts than game play. I have been playing for maybe 10 minutes and as time has gone on very quickly it became that an advert would happen after maybe 20 seconds if that. First when I downloaded the game,( I meapm SERIOUSLY) The game was hanged. It 's ok üëå, sometimes we can might come up with few problems. But there were many problems that I was facing !!!! This game is extremely ad heavy to the point the ads play longer than the actual game. If you forgo the ad at the end to earn extra coins you will still watch an ad. I don't mind the ads if they benefit me with extra coins or items, but the excessive ads in this game mean you will spend more time watching the ads than the game. Deleting

Personally I don't think it's a good game. There's way to many ads and they last way to long most of the ads pop up after every level and play 2 ads each level. The game its self is okay but it's very stereotypical and defines a lot of people I don't think this game should have any good reviews whatsoever. I hadn't read the reviews before downloading and wish I had. Please update the game and remove ads. üòû very disappointed.
It's a good game but every click you make an ads will pop up. I like it but because there is alot of ads i've decided to just uninstall it every ads is more or less 30secs it's such a waste of time.

HEAR ME BEFORE DOWNLOADING!!! The Software and the content are excellent and entertaining. The storyline is also entertaining.
