The game keeps crashing I played for a few minutes then my screen turns black and goes back to my home page so I restarted my tablet and then my tablet restarts itself and still the game wasn't working so I uninstalled and installed again still didn't work so I uninstalled it. Whoever made this game sucks cause it doesn't work at all and ads keep popping every few seconds just like almost every damn game I have. The game's pretty fun to play, but I have run into a few problems since downloading it back in August such as no sound playing even with the BGM and SFX options are on and ESPECIALLY the game crashing whenever an ad plays or when I'm connecting to Facebook to retrieve my save data. I really hope the developers can fix these problems, especially the latter. Otherwise, a good time and a decent distraction when you got nothing better to do.

The game is good, the graphics and controls are fine. I've been playing it off and on for probably 7 or 8 years, reinstalled today just for the fun of it, immediately disappointed after crashing watching an ad after getting a pretty high score on the burger king event only to find out, it didn't count. So I wasted time and effort. I mean come on seriously?

This is a fun game that I really really enjoy. But multiple times, mainly when I've beaten a high score or event but am still running, the game will lag, freeze and close. And any progress I've made is gone. I've essentially lost so many keys, power ups and head starts because when I reopen the game I won't have the points I've earned but anything that I've used during the previous run will still be gone. It gets very frustrating.

Great app! I would rate it five stars but I only have one small problem with it. Whenever it get fast, it starts lagging really badly and I can't see what I'm doing or focus. But other than that, I love this game so much! üòÜ The amount of ads isn't bad and the game play is great! I love the animation and art style the creators used for this app!

I have loved this game for years. Repeatedly uninstall and reinstall just for fun over the years. And it's honestly got no problems. Haven't experienced the lag like others have mentioned so they probably fixed it. And I love the fact the game doesn't change controls when updating like alot of apps which means you always get that great nostalgic feeling. If your a former player please reinstall its so worth the nostalgic feeling.

It's a good game and it's challenging at times like a good game should be but the coins and keys are over priced if you want to buy some and sometimes the controls won't work properly and if you get a new phone and click "restore purchas" it will only give you the characters that you bought with real money and not the ones you had to work for and it will reset your high score but other then that it's a good game with new challenges pretty much every month would recommend

I've had a bit of an up & down history, with Subway Surfers. However, the game itself is addictive, fun, & super easy to get into. It can definitely take a while to get all the characters, boards, & achievements, but it's worth the time investment, imo. The gameplay is fast-paced and never boring. Some of the characters & skins are actually really great. My only complaint is the sheer number of cheaters that pollute this game. Aside from that, I'd 100% recommend. Great time waster for sure

I love this game and ive played it since i was a child, but the ads kind of get out of hand. There isnt a purchase option to get rid of ads either. And when i watch an ad to get a reward, sometimes itll just kick me out of the game, not getting the reward at all and if im in the middle of a run and do that then i lose any type of progress i made in the run. So i lose all coins, points, and any type of challenges i may have completed. I just want to buy a no ads or fix the problem with ads.

Free To Play. Subway Surfers is the model all other f2p games should strive to emulate. No purchase is ever necessary to play this game and actually be competitive. You can use keys to continue a run, but that gets very expensive very quickly. Skill is a lot more efficient here and you never have to watch an ad if you don't want to. All ads are optional for a completely free experience or you can $kip them.

This game is incredibly fun and addictive. I recommend at its fullest. I run into no problems whatsoever, and this game should be more popular. I have seen so many rip-offs lately, and I get mad over how many people say that the game they play is better than Subway Surfers. I also love how it doesn't have a billion ads everytime you click (tap) on something. I also think it would be a great idea to be able to friend people. Like, if you friend someone, you can play the game with them.

Amazing game! Great way to pass time and not many ads. I'm 14 and the hardest thing for me is to find not baby games and a little challenge and this game is awesome for me the longer you run the faster everything gets which is the challenge. The only downside is that it's a little hard to get blue keys but still a really fun game. If you are looking to pass time with an offline game that is a little challenge this game is for you.

The game itself is pretty fun and mostly a good time waster, but the ads are horrendous. Not the amount but the kind of ads being displayed. I finished one set of the super runner event and tried to see how far I could get. Of course I hit something and wanted to watch an ad to see if I could get farther. It took about a minute for the little "X" button to appear before I could go back, but it kicked me out of the whole game. I lost all the progress on the super runner and my new highscore.

I've been playing this game for a while. I love it üòÄ . But, I got a new device last year, and all of my apps and their progress were transferred, but, subway surfers deleted everything, I lost some characters that I can't get back. And all of the boards and characters that I worked so hard for, I have to earn back again. But I wish that subway surfers added a "restore" option, so you can get your hard earned progress back. Amazing game though, I love all of the new updates! ‚ù§Ô∏è üôå

This game is overall great but it's just missing some sort a save button when in the middle of a run. For example you get to a high score and pause the game but you want to stop using the app and close it, you should be able to save the run and be able to play later. There could be a menu to resume the run. Maybe even add a limit of runs to be saved and named like 5. It would prevent my phone to be slower with an extra app open.

Okay...I've played this game for a while when I was younger and it has changed A LOT. There are less ads which I appreciate but there is something that I find a little annoying...I know that the pop ups that u can buy is a way to promote the game(Ex: Offering a Character)but everytime I get one, like 3 more pop up! After that I get an amount of ads and I haven't even played yet!? Overall, it's good but that was my only complaint.

Excellent game! The characters are cool and so are the events! I don't mind auto-play ads because this game gives us the choice to watch ads for rewards. Ads are always regulated and i like it! Cool game! But I just have one complaint, it's with the zap sideways power up. All it does is move sideways fancy. It's just pointless. Please fix zap sideways, because it's really useless....üòï

The only reason I give this 4 ‚≠ê out of 5. Is because, so bymetimes the game glitches and you have nowhere to move. You just get impaled by a train. And second, if you don't have internet access you can't double your prizes, or do different missions in different places. Also, it's so hard to get a new character or board. O Dfither than that. This game is absolutely amazing. So many memories from my childhood. I love this game. And all the things you can find.

Best mobile I've ever had the pleasure of playing. There are no pay gates. There are consistent updates to the game, with new creative staging every month. Lots of collectibles ranging in difficulty. Seamless motion controls. Non-intrusive ads. Truly the best mobile game out there (in my opinion) and has been since 2015 when I got my first smartphone. 15/10 quality.

Still great, even after 10 years it doesn't get old. I like how they keep up dating with new challenges and and missions. The game doesn't lag for me online or offline. Usually saves my progress on challenges but sonetimes it wont if I lose wifi connection. Generally no bugs but occasionally has issues or crashes if you lose connection while skipping an ad.

I LOVE this game. There are a few minor issues I would like changed, but not enough to give this app a bad rating. There are not to many ads like most games. The ads are optional, which I LOVE. This game is easy for beginners, and can keep you entertained for hours! Totally recommend. Some people are rating it lower because of the Super Runner 10 year anniversary, but I really don't care about it so if you download this game don't do the character thing.

Super fun to play when bored. An amazing game to take up your time. One thing is when I had first downloaded the game it glitched every few minutes when I swiped to move tracks, and it switched to the opposite direction. It doesn't happen anymore but it was weird. But overall it's one of my favorites.

5 stars because it is a great game you play and collect coins to unlock new hoverboards and to unlock characters this game is very fun to play with friends because one person can get a score and then the other people or person has to beat that record if they do the first person to make the record has to beat the other persons records but the only problem is that it's kinda glitchy but I dont know if that is just on my side but just a little. This game is fun and you can play it offline too!

I've been playing this game for six years and it's gotten so much better. I love all the new updates, especially event challenges. I used to get bored of subway surfers pretty quickly, since all you really did was collect coins and run. Now there's so much to do and it's kinda dangerous because I'll spend too much time playing lol. It is sometimes embarrassing when people find out a sixteen year old is playing this game so obsessively but what can I say. It's really fun.

Such a great game!!! There a are some times where they give you ads for keys and other things. They also have characters to choose from, you just gotta work to earn for it! It's an offline game, but you can't really get ads if you have no connection. There are some online parts, like competing with other's high scores and stuff. I've always liked subway surfers, my friends play it a lot, and it's a joy to talk about! :)

I really enjoy a lot of aspects about this game and one of them is the sound, but the sound always cuts off after an ad and there's no way to get it back unless I close the app and reopen it. Then I get another one and have to keep restarting the App over and over. If this bug gets fixed, I'd love this game again.

Okay I like this game, it's a good game... actually it great. But I wanted to tell the developers about something that happened a few weeks ago during the super runner fresh event my game somehow got rid of the event for a short while and I wondered what happened and I waited a few minutes later and it came back. But all my progress got reset so I missed the event and I want to know why this happened and if I can possibly get progress back or the character for free. Thank you for your time.

I love this game, however, I have one problem. Whenever I'm done with a run and I go to the screen that shows your score and how many coins you collected. It then glitches me into a screen with infinite mystery boxes. It may sound fun at first but then you wonder when it's actually over. The way I learned how to solve it was but closing the app then reopening it. I dont know what's going on. I dont use cheats but something isn't right about it. It used to be fine a few days ago but now it's not.

This is my childhood game which I still play. Yet there is a problem with ads, ads will show up out of no were which is causing problems while I am playing. In the game it's has been laggy for me even tho I had play this game in serval devices. Because of this bug in this game it has made me crash and die in this game, I hope this gets fix for me yet I'm not sure if this is happening to others. In addition, this game is still fun to play it has a bit problems hopefully it's getting fixed. :)

There are admittedly many ads and in-game pop up ads after a run, but they normally don't disrupt your playing. I feel like most bad ad experiences are different for everyone bc I personally don't have many complaints about them besides--well, ads are ads, lol. I'm always on this game playing to burn time. It's really easy to get coins and buy new boards and characters so you don't feel like you're playing for nothing.

Very addictive and I like how you always have a goal, there isn't ever a time where you "have" to stop playing because you're out of spins or you have to pass a level...it's never ending, which is very smart for a game to me. If I had to mention a negative, it's that certain characters you can only get by purchasing them. Overall, great game.

I love this game very much, and it's been an integral part of my childhood, but I've been experiencing some issues with the new super runner challenge; especially the one for Super Runner Fresh. I got to the 4th part of stage 2 on that challenge, and then it switches to Super Runner Jake for some reason (even though that challenge is over) and by the time it switches back, all of my progress, play-time, wait-time, and boosts were completely wasted. I'm now back at the beginning. Please fix this.

I really like this game especially on long car rides, but I have one issue for the game. I am on stage 2 for super runner Fresh, but for some reason it switches you to super runner Jake and then after a while it switches you back, but you lose all of your progress! But otherwise the game is really fun to play, but I would like you to consider changing that problem. Thank you

I play this game very often. I really enjoy the game it's fun and I love the different theme's each month. However with the new 10-year anniversary super runner challenge I have been experiencing issues. Every time I get to a different stage and then leave the game and come back it starts me back to stage one which is completely unfair. The problem needs to be fixed.

I love this game don't get me wrong this is actually one of my favorite games but I had to vote it a 3 stars sadly because of 1. The ads and 2. The paying perspective. For the ad problem there is just way too many ads but I ain't got no money so I'm not getting rid of them. And for the paying problem all of the characters that are interesting cost real money, now don't get me wrong I love saving up keys and buying characters that way but real money is too far too me! I love your app bye!!

Most of the time it becomes barely playable after a few ads, because once the ad is closed it brings you back to the home screen. Sometimes the game even soft locks itself with ads, because once you choose to go to the main menu, it will play an ad that when you try to close it, will just keep you on a blank screen, so you have to restart the app. It was fun for the first few days but after all that, paired with the repetitious gameplay caused it to become boring quick. Uninstalled after ~7 days

I love this game. I suggest it to anyone you want to waste time on a game. I do wish there were more options to get event coins but oh well. Also I have this weird bug where I leave the game to watch a add then when I go back into the game the audio is gone. You need to leave the game completely to get audio back. If there is any way to fix this please help

This is a great game that's turned buggy. I play pretty consistently and haven't had many issues until the last update. During the Super Runner Fresh event that is currently going on, I will open the app to find a Super Runner Tag Team event. When the event later returns, I find my progress in the Super Runner event completely reset to the beginning. This has now happened four times. I have tried to contact support through the app, but have yet to receive any communication from the developers.

The game is really fun! I like the events and the character's you can get from each place. There's like not a lot you can complain about execpt one thing. The Ads. There are are a lot of ads. I go to the home screen. ad. I go to the me screen. ad. I guess that's all there is to complain the ads are why i'm giving this 4 stars. ( I also really like the super runner characters)

Great game, pretty timeless and loads of fun. But there are a few problems I have with it. Firstly, I wish you could pause your runs and continue them later. Because a lot of my runs go into the multi-million score levels, and especially when I'm out and about, I have to cut them short by pausing, which is a problem because secondly, when the game is loaded out of memory for long enough the run just ends without any chance to continue. This can even happen after watching an ad which I hate.
app_developer_reply: Thanks for your time and review. How could we make our game a 5-star experience? More feedback is always welcome. Contact us at https://sybo.zendesk.com/. You can also find help with any issue with the game you might have. Let's help you get a better experience!

review_text: Amazing game. All the controls are perfect and simple. Only problem I have is that there's so little to do, for example just one pass which gives a couple of rewards but nothing that would make u involved entirely in the game. And a couple of missions that either aren't hard or aren't easy; there has to be rewards that are in between easy and difficult. I would recommend adding more things to complete in the game or more rewards to earn.

This game is actually pretty fun. I'm having no lag or glitches happening to me. Sure, the ads may be annoying, but maybe it could just keep the game free. The ads can also help you to revive after beating your high score, maybe even gaining some more keys/coins if you want. The ads that they force you to watch is usually skipable, 30 seconds, or playable. Overall, I highly recommend this game to anyone and everyone that is reading this review. Also really fun and simple game.

The touch response has definitely improved for this game and the new challenges/events are a great addition! I have a small problem when I choose to watch an add around half of the time I get sent to a black screen that I can't back out of and doesn't dissapear. This can kill a run or stop me from opening the rest of my mystery boxes. Overall, still the same awesome game from 2012!
app_developer_reply: Thanks for your time and review. How could we make our game a 5-star experience? For any issues with the game or for additional feedback, check out our FAQ or contact us at: https://sybo.zendesk.com/. Let's help you get a better experience!

review_text: No problem with the game itself. There's only a problem on the way in which my keys are counted when I use them. For some reason, it doesn't go in numerical oder. PLEASE fix this, ty. I STILL stand with this review, however now, the alot of the ads don't play. You can't even back out of the ads that won't play. The only way out of these ads are to completely leave the game, which as a result makes you lose your progress for what you just played. CREATORS, PLEASE HELP, TY!

I have always enjoyed this game, and I'm happy that my characters were all saved after getting a new phone and having to reinstall. My only complaint is that the volume for the game is SUPER LOW, but then the ads are BLASTING! So I really hope this gets fixed. It's annoying that I have to keep adjusting my volume, and I have to have my volume all the way up to actually hear the music. But it's not my speaker that's the problem cause then the ads that play are so loud, you can hear a mile away.
app_developer_reply: Thanks for letting us know! We were sad to see you rated our game at 1-star, as we aim to deliver you a 5-star experience. If you have issues with the game or more feedback, please go to our support site: https://sybo.zendesk.com/. Hope we can be of help.

review_text: The game is great and runs smoothly as long as you don't have a bunch of other stuff opened up, but anyway to the point. Me and multiple of my friends have noticed that whenever we get in the game it says connection error and says look in settings. We look in settings and nothings there, sometimes it doesn't let me get my rewards cause of this. Please fix it.

It's pretty good. I've been playing since I was 6 and still haven't gotten enough of it. There are some things I would like to have back in the game. There was a glitch in the special power zap sideways, and whenever you zap, your hoverboard animation speeds up and I liked it. Also there was old animations for the character idles, the character running animations and hoverboard animations too, and I kinda miss that.

I love the the game. You can collect an unlimited amount of coins collenct lots and lots of characters. Challange yourself to amazing jumps and roll under barriers. And see how far you get. My high score is 1,811,0486. See if you can beat it. This is one hell of an app for sure. One of the best games I have ever played in years. You should really try this app. And I forgot you can also collect blue keys. That can get you better rewards like exclusive characters and different hoverboards. GET IT!

This is my first time writing a positive app review, little nervous. Subway surfers is a GREAT mobile game. I just love pretty much every part of it. The character designs are adorable, the app is easy to use, maps are pretty, and so much more. But my favorite part has to be that I will never ever get bored playing it. Unlike most mobile platforming games where the only thing you can do is beat your old score, this game always has new challenges! New events, new maps, rotating characters, etc:)

Absolutely great game! It's free, but it's in no way a "pay-to-win". There's always something new to do, so even with game play that is simple you never get bored. No powerups or anything relevant to game play is unaccessable by a pay wall, and it's quite reasonable to obtain them. The game does a good job of rewarding you according to your skill level, so no matter if you're better or worse at the game, you'll always feel successful and want to improve. Great graphics, runs well, recommended=]

This game has been around for a while. I've collected many characters and power-ups. All while connected to Facebook and Google games. Yet I can never get back previously collected characters, coins, etc. Now there are mandatory ads? There's no purchase options to remove the ads. What's the point of playing if you have to start over and forgo any progress you previously made. This is my final uninstall.

The game is fun but the issue is that every update, the app kicks me out. When I was doing the super runner fresh event, it suddenly went to super runner tricky event when the game stoped working. I had to reopen the app a few times to get back. It just made me restart all my progress. Please fix this soon enough. It been annoying me many times. I was just on stage 5 and about to finish

Don't get me wrong, it's a good game. Though, on multiple occasions it has wiped my data and I couldn't get it back or kicks me out while I'm playing, causing my score to be wiped. But don't worry, it counted the power-ups and keys I used. Less then joyful during these periods and makes me not want to play anymore. Update: happened on a 7mill play, no longer playing this game.

review_text: Classic, this game has started over 10 years ago now, and yet still is on top, they haven't fell in the path of a money hungry company. This remanes one of the best moble games of all time, even after 10 hole years now! They don't have many adds but when they do it's mostly skip able and if not there always 30 seconds. I would recommend this to any one and everyone.

Played this since I was 7, love it, but just like the others in the comments, you got a bug for the new 10th year anniversary event with getting the runners, I completed the first one no problem then moved on to the second and completed her, and took a break just to find out when I got back on she was gone and I had to do it again, hard part was it added on more and more to how much I had to put in to get her, and eventually gave up, I think you should probably fix the bug and restart the event

Subway Surfer's is one of the best mobile game I know the graphics, the updates and everything is good. But I have two problems one of them is when I go to change my boom-box sound thing it never loads in and I have to restart. The second one is when I'm on someone elses internet it's so laggy please fix this. But other wise keep up the work.(etc)

The game itself is fine--I've been playing Subway Surfers since I was 5--but my problem lies with the 3D models of the characters. Jake, Tricky, and the others are the exact same 10 YEARS later and look outdated when compared to the new art in the images on the Playstore. Plus, the running and jumping animations are awkward and should definitely be fixed.

I love it! It's a great mobile game. But the characters cost so much! But there's so many new features it feels like every month. Anytime I'm bored, I'll just play this. It entertains me for a while. Or it does not save my progress. But this game is a little hard. I think they should fix these glitches, cause there OP. But I normally play normal, or a few glitches. But besides. This game is perfect to entertain you!

Hey!! So this game is really amazing, all the characters are cool and colorful the boards are cool and have amazing designs not to mention the graphics but there's one problem I have. Losing progress.. yeah I had just gotten to a new high score while playing like idk 10M? But then it close out of it for a lil bit then when I go back all my progress is lost and my new high score wasn't 10mill it was 2mil (which was my high score before playing that game) so yeah if you could fix this :DD

I've had a problem with the Super Runner Fresh Challenge, whatever you want to call it. When I play this game, I try to complete it but sometimes it doesn't show right there, or it makes me start the challenge over. I also Check out the Character Super Runner Fresh, and says I have to buy I for 20$.Other than that, your game is good. Please fix this issue please!

I think it is amazing, but I saw some people say things about the audio and I want to agree the subway surfers audio is so quiet and then the ads are booming. And it's not my phone either because I tested It out on tablets, and different kinds of phones. I feel like it's an easy fix. Thank you if you fix it.

This is a really fun game... But there is something I'd like you developers to pay attention to. When you pause the game and you have a good high score and still have it open but open another app, you just lost all that good progress like I just did. I had a score of 1,500,000 and just lost it all when I went back to the app. Please fix this like add progress save so you can resume the run when you come back.
app_developer_reply: Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us. However, we're sad to see a 1-star rating for our game and would love to get 5 stars. If you have issues with the game or more feedback, please go to our support site: https://sybo.zendesk.com/. Let's help you get a better experience!

review_text: Really fun, very easy, and amazingly animated. I do feel like you're required to pay for too much stuff, but I understand, considering yall gotta make money some typa way. plus theres always the chance that those bundle characters just cost coins in the next update, so theres never any real problem w/ that. overall great and fun game, 5/5, would recommend

Cool. I have one complaint. There's a bug that shows the Super Runner event as Super Runner Jake, and when you're waiting for the cooldown, it's shows that but it keeps resetting. It's supposed to show Fresh. Is there anything I can do to stop that? It's getting annoying and it's taking time away from me to get the newest character.

It's fun- the gameplay is how I remember all those years ago but, honestly, it kinda went downhill. Picture this: you're playing this and want to earn a high score (this game has a ranked system) So you play, and then realize you can watch ads to revive yourself for another chance in your run. That's not a problem- until you realize you get *unlimited* ads and can revive as many times as you want, turning the game into a "who can revive the most" instead of actual skill.

Great game but I have few problems, the stay low; It is the most useless board upgrade but yet expensive just like Prince K who is just an ordinary character but yet cost 980,000. Most things are too overpriced. Also, when I turn on my internet connection in the game, the game play starts acting crazy all of a sudden: it pauses and crash. There are glitches where by I crash into a moving train and yet I'm still running or when the inspector harasses me in mid air. Pls. Fix these problems.

This game is pretty amazing and I have no words to say how time consuming it is. I have no complaints about the game but there was an issue a while back when the game took place in Greek. It completely glitched out and would not let me in the entirety of the event. I had to uninstall and reinstall it and when I signed back into my account, I lost all of the characters I had worked so hard to collect. This really irritated me considering I had wanted to also collect Moira for the Greek event.

I love it ü•∞, I've been playing it my whole life! Great game with awesome graphics, music, missions and so on. I especially liked the update with Shenzhen. Really cool üòé remake of the original soundtrack üéßüéπ and cool graphics during the run. Also, I think in the update with Shenzhen, it would be appropriate to do a voluminous noodle in a carton while the run. üòÖüòäü•°

Subway Surfers is a really good game. It's really satisfying when you collect the coins and the seasons and characters are really cool. The animations are great and realistic in animated form. But there's just a little problem. I don't know if it's just me or if this is something that always happens. Whenever I've earnt a reward or something and I click home to receive it, I click it and before the reward is given to me, I have to watch an ad...which can NOT be skipped. Can you please fix this?

The game itself is great 10/10, very fun to play. I take 2 stars out of it because of it's progress saving system. I've been playing this game since 2016 and every time I buy a new phone, or lose my save files for some reason, it's almost impossible to recover your progress, your high scores, unlocked characters and boards, etc. Even if you connect to your Google or Facebook accounts, the probability that you will lose everything if you play long enough is almost 100%. Hope you guys fix that.

The game is good, the graphics and controls are fine. I've been playing it off and on for probably 7 or 8 years, reinstalled today just for the fun of it, immediately disappointed after crashing watching an ad after getting a pretty high score on the burger king event only to find out, it didn't count. So I wasted time and effort. I mean come on seriously?

Oh, well,at first the game start really slow, i think that is perfect!Since its too slow the player have time do concentrate at the doll instead of actually thinking on "run all out". But i think that its too hard to find a key/box, even though after you found it, you cant even get it! But the design and the details of the game are so cool! Even though there are some chacters that you can only get buying like the radio head. Sometimes it just crash,and i lose no why. The mission are cool though.

Pretty fun game! used to play it all the time when I was little and decided to come back to it, the concept is as simple as ever, run from a cop infinitely and collect coins, power ups to help you get a high score and so on. Only problem I see with the game is that sometimes it doesn't save your progress, other than that honestly it has a lot of content including skins, hoverboards with some having power ups and a great level system, it's also great that you don't need Wi-Fi. Overall great 10/10

This is an incredible game. It has ads, as you would expect with any free app, but not any that interrupt runs and the only ones you can't skip are the ones you choose to watch for things or to revive yourself in a run. I have never experienced any bugs in the game and it is completely possible to do well in things without spending money. All in all, great game that is most definitely a game everyone should have on their device.

It is fun easy to play and time passing. Even small kids can play this game. You can always do new things like to try to take no coins, or to learn some tricks. The only thing is that there is an hack to have infinite coins, keys, skateboard and skins juste fix it and the game would be much more fun. For the ads it is easy all you need to do is turn on flight mode.

I'd find it more amusing if you were able to save your progress in the game. You have to connect it to your Facebook so why not create a save file there? It'd be more of a joy playing it and re downloading it when your phone changed. That'd be the most enjoying thing when they'd edit this game, because starting over and over again everytime, is just tiring and annoying by now. I hope it gets added, it means a lot to keep the progress you made.

It's a really good game but every time I leave the game and rejoin it without actually closing the app, or I see an ad, the audio cuts out, music, sound effects, everything. My audio is at full volume, sound is on in my settings, and the app has been uninstalled and reinstalled, and fully updated to the last second. I cant find the problem and I would like to fix it. The audio bug will not stop me from playing, I was playing this game as long as I can remember, But please fix the bug. Thank you.

I was hitting my record of 4kk points when bumped into something but decided to continue the run by watching an ad. I've accidentally clicked on it while watching but returned to continue watching immediately. I was expecting to finish it with the ad and proceed running, but the ad didn't continue. Instead, I was facing the welcoming screen as if I had just started the game. The record? Gone, wasn't listed. All the boards and boosts I have used during the run? Also gone, no refunds. What was it?

Its good! Really challenging! I have had this game for years and am still not bored of it! I think the idea is very good, just avoiding the police, and collecting coins, jumping on trains, and i love the power ups and events! For me, i would recommend it. I love the outfits and the superpowers you can get on the hoverboards. The designs are amazing and i love it. One more amazing thing, it gets more and more challenging as you play! Its a time killer. An amazing and outstanding one.

Good game and challenging in a good way. There is a bug in the game whereby you are hit when trying to skip from one train to another when there is absolutely no obstacle. This needs to be fixed as it is a game spoiler when trying to chase missions and scores. Please fix and 5 stars will be awarded.

I enjoy the game, and have for years. However, I don't appreciate how pointless accumulating coins has gotten. You can almost never purchase new characters and boards with them, but instead need keys, event coins, actual payments or earning them in the season hunt. Maybe if you had the option to convert coins into keys. Other than that, I enjoy the game and consistently play it st least 4 times a week.

It's fun and addicting, but also VERY glitchy. 1st; if you run on a train and switch lanes, you can sometimes bump into nothing. 2nd, if you run fast enough and switch lanes at the right moment when you're about to crash into a train, you'd stay on your lane and phase through the train while the model is between the 2 lanes. Oh, and ads are every X clicks on popups. Problem how many popups there are. It's also inconsistent where it places you when you bump into something when switching lanes.

That's so great update on this new destination "Shenzhen". It looks wonderful street food city. Especially what I had been looking forward to so a long time, it came back again "Bass Blaster" board, and can also buy it with keys. I like this update very much because it has a lot of missions from other cities (Subway City, Paris, Houston, and Super Runner City) in past ago to beat the score on them to get many rewards. Subway Surfers is the best captivating runner game!!!

Subway surfers is the best game so far I love it so much but the hunt is actually too short it is very very short please üôèüôè improve on that aspect but that doesn't stop my love for the game instead it gave me more courage to beat your own timing for the hunt. Then saving my progress is not that easy can't believe I have lost over 2000 keys and millions of money, but for the old customers we should be able to convert tye money at the end of the month to help us if we are broke lol üòÇ. Thank you

Great game, love the new graphics, but a few issues. The leaderboard's filled with hackers that get over 2.1 billion. You can't get the champion medal 'cause of the scorecap. New music's ok, but there should be an option to play the original. Another bug: I had the "uprock" board before, It disappeared and now the game says I have to complete this hunt to regain it. The 2048 key revive cap is annoying, increase/remove it. And when going left from a train to another train, it counts as a stumble?

Except the running, surfing and jumping. The UI is very difficult to use, many many menus under each menu icon. The categories classifications are very confusing. I cannot understand where am I at the game menu and what should I do and what should I choose for the game?

Great game and has always been one of the best there could be! This game is an absolute must have! I gave it 4 stars because I realized that the speed of the game stops increasing as you play, therefore if you can handle the speed, it'll be too easy eventually. To make the game more fun and challenging I think the speed should gradually increase no matter how long you have been on a run. That would make this game absolutely perfect! Please include this subway surfers team!

Love the game but I don't enjoy how even if you leave the app for 2 minutes whilst the game you were playing is on pause it automatically resets , it's really annoying. You could've collected mystery boxes for example but you leave the game on pause leave the app for like 2 minutes and open it and everything is gone also the music stops after watching an ad, please fix it SYBO!

There are so many continuous events and new characters makes me want to play forever. There is a great ethnic diversity too and many reasons to play. The only negative is that it can be quite repetitive at times even with the changing bonuses, it wouled be ideal to change the mechanism for special characters or new opsiticals or routes. But overall SATISFIED my short term needs.

I really like subway surfers. It's one of those games where everyone's got it and I love showing off my high scores to my friends! But I feel it could be improved like recently the game's been glitching out. Whenever I watched a video it would make me Wath it again. I know it's not that important but whatever.

Overall the game is quite addicting. But I want to complete my achievements section if collecting coins from friends but even though I have connected both facebook and play games but My friends are not being shown in the friends section. And also the videos on the friends are gold on youtube have not been helpful at all. Please find a way to help me recieve coins from my friends.

This classic masterpiece still holds most of its fun and glory in 2022 but I don't like all the special events they seem to think we care about. I really want to go back to the OG subway surfers before the world tour. I miss the original aesthetic and music. I can't find a way to switch back though. Still great I guess.

Great really fun game but with the newest update nearly every time I watch an ad for more keys at the end of the ad it glitches me out of the app, and when I come back it restats at the home screen with all the items I used that round gone.... But putting that aside it's an obviously amazing game, and I'd highly recommend

This game is amazing! Is super fun and it actually gives a challenge. I love how there are missions to keep the game a little interesting (it does get a bit boaring after awhile üòï) and there is stuff like highscore of the week! (Witch is my favorite) I also like that they put time into this game by adding a new map every month and doing new characters to earn every month too. Something I wish they would add is that you could play against people online. That would help keep the game less boring

i absolutely love this game, i've playing it on and off for years and i've never had anything bad to say about it. but i dont know if it has happened to anyone else after this last update but after an ad plays, the game goes mute? the ad has sound but the game goes vompletely silent after it and it has crashed a few times as well. i hope the developers fix this soon!

I installed it after a long time just to have a time killer when I'm waiting for something or away from my gaming devices. But ofcourse it should have become another one of those games filled with microtransactions. So I gave it 2 stars. Gameplay is cool and addictive but the menu is just clustered with random stuff.

I love the game and all of the things they've added, but goodness....the amount of ads. I literally got 2 ads before I could even play the game, not to mention the absolute atrocious amount of paid content they push in your face upon opening the main screen. You almost need to buy the pack for no ads to enjoy the game. It's ridiculous

I did enjoy the game. But sometimes the barriers are too close to eachother, the trains trap you, the boosters like the green high jump thing take you to a wall or infront of a train, I think if you do everything right there should be no impossible situations. Also the top player for some reason always have this impossible score noone else can reach. If the commercials are deactivated and you accidentally push the commercial button for more boards your score is lost and your money.

This game is a classic. But it just seems like the devs are just making it different every month via places and characters, boards etc. But they need to work on the gameplay. First the lags. I noticed it 2 months ago during the Subway City update. It lagged when the game speed gets faster. Please fix!!!

I don't understand how a game based on reactions and timing can have such ridiculous lag spikes so frequently. I tried to figure out if it's the game struggling to render the track, but my phone doesn't get hot at all nor does my battery get depleted faster than usual, but it's like the whole game will just freeze for like a second and usually absolutely destroy your run because it's not the image that freezes, it's everything, so you swipe as it freezes and nothing registers and you get killed.

One of the classics. I played this game when it first came out and I then had a blast with it. Unfortunately I don't have my progress. Regardless I decided to pick it up again because I know out of all the mobile games out there. This is definitely one of the better ones due to it look very good and easy to pick up and having objectives while playing does give it replayability. I'm definitely going to get that burger king runner because that's just too funny to pass off.

Really good game, enjoyed it, played it years ago but came back, at first I thought the OG music was gone but you just had to select it in the boombox setting. Easy controls, you understand the game really quickly, good time waster, not pay-to-win, my friends enjoy it, and ads aren't at every corner, you get them mostly when you leave the menus and get back to the run screen, but they aren't long and they aren't stupid. Thanks for years of entertainment and fun, I hope the game remains in hearts

So fun and easy to get lost into. I can spend hours on this game without getting bored. I also really enjoy the hunts with special skins. Although some challenges for the hunts are a little over-rated, and could be easier maybe..? But other than that, I love this game, so does all my family! Totally should download, barley takes any storage too!

This game is awesome but after this new update there are many glitches ... like when I play some video for extra rewards there is no problem but when I cut the video to get my reward the game will also closed and my full game play score has gone üò°üò°. I request to the managing team to fix this issu as soon as possible that I can enjoy my favorite game..

[My gameplay progress is lost again] This is the second time my gameplay progress is lost. app_developer_reply: We appreciate you leaving our game a review, but we were hoping for a better rating than 1 star. More feedback is always welcome. Contact us at https://sybo.zendesk.com/. You can also find help with any issue with the game you might have. We would love to help and learn more!

review_text: I' ve been playing Subway Surfers for five years now (since I was three) and though my mum broke my old tablet, I have still been playing it. The general experience is great, but it glitches quite a bit (though probably just because of high sensitivity screens). There aren't many advertisements and it's generally very good. I am quite sad writing this right in the middle of Her Majesty The Queen's State Funarel. I've got to go now to play the national anthem (God Save The King).

I really love this game but what's the use of playing and loosing your progress and then killing all the fun, one minute my game is good and the next I'm back to square one and even login in with Facebook does not restore progress this is the second time this is happening and I still haven't gotten a response to my complaints

Most apps have 4.5 star ratings, but I think this should be 5 star. First, the game makes events to make the game more fun instead of infinite loops of running. As the game goes on, the runner starts running faster and faster to make it impossible to do for others, making them want to win. Secondly, there's a chart of the most scores in the game with someone leading in first place with 3,000,000 points. If you're reading this and don't know if you want to download this, you should download it.

SO MANY ADS. Admittedly the adverts are well integrated into the game for the most part but also everytime you switch between scenes, go to the shop, crash, reload... etc A great game with good monthly updates and characters (ignoring the cultural appropriation). Simple to play, fun to master. Plenty of challenges and monthly targets to keep you interested. Developer contact was responded to really quickly when I flaggef a sound issue in an update. But seriously. Ads.

I've played this game for almost 2 years. but now I want to make a high score, but after some time of pausing the game, the game restarts again. Today also, actually I ran collecting 80,000 coins in 1 run. After some pause to game, game restarted. All progress in vain. This has been the story for many times. I use vivo V9 phone of 4Gb ram & 64Gb rom. What might be the problem? Whether problem is in phone or the app? I need quick reply. plz fast.
app_developer_reply: Sorry for the problem. We need to further evaluate your situation. Please contact us at support@kiloo.com and we will help you as soon as possible.

review_text: It is a good game, great for wasting time while waiting for appointments. A few problems, sometimes when there's an event, you're saving up for something, you're so close but the next day it's gone. Would be better if you could decide when the old event ends. Max: a few extra days

Amazing game!! You can avoid obstacles, get keys to retry, get mystery boxes, and so much more. This game is great you should download it! üòÄüíÖ

-1 star because of one problem. On Mystery Mondays some things don't look right. The TIMING between mystery powerups and the main powerups is ALWAYS IMPERFECT. Pls fix.

Been playing for years and its still a good game to come back too for a little easy challenge but sometimes I still come across lil bugs or malfunctions in the controls while going tgrough the ultra spped phase and sometimes they dont go right or left which causes my end runs usually. Best game ever very casual, good way to waste time and there are so many boards and skins to choose from.(my favourite is fresh).I think the only way they could make it better is by fixing the ads whenever I try to watch a ad for my reward they aren't even ads so when I try to go back it freezes. review_text: This really is such an awesome game, truly great graphics, very good concept, quite addictive too, plenty of cool characters and boards to collect, exciting updates regularly introducing new sceneries and themes, amazing bundles of previously missed characters and boards to acquire as well which for me is the biggest rush of every new update! keep them coming and I will keep on playing and collecting! please bring back the many boards I missed from last year!

review_text: This is a fun game to play. I played this game through out the whole summer between 8th grade and freshman year. It was a calming escape from reality. Over that summer I was able to unlock every single skin that didn't cost money, I completed every single event over that summer, and it got my mind off of starting high school. This game made my transition from middle school to high school really easy. Way easier than most people in my grade. I really recommend downloading this game. Best decision

My nephew accidentally paid 100 poinds into this game after 5 minutes of downloading it - I understand that I should have had payment protection however he hasnt used any of the items and google is refusing the refund. I am furious - I also cannot find a way to contact the devolpers. This game feels designed to cause this kind of accident and it feels like an online scam!

I love this through and through. Events are pretty frequent, there are lots of characters, maps, hoverboards .etc, but it's the ads. The ads don't even work most of the time and there all not even videos so I can't get my reward. Not only that, my super runner progress literally all just restarted and now I'm pissed off as hell. I just left the game and then got back on and now I'm on zero progress??? This game needs to fix itself.

Cool game and I like how developed the game is. I still remember when the character skins were very expensive like 90,000 coins for one but I'm glad that it's now reduced. It's now cheap and easy to unlock. And I'm happy that there's option where you can change the music to one you like. Very cool word puzzles and rewards and you can even play for your country. But one thing, this game has some ads, please just reduce them. Continue making updates, I recommend playing it!

It is a very fun game. It also gives you daily rewards and they're like enough to buy stuff. The coins collected during the round are accurately calculated. However, during the rounds the pavement and the train tracks are curved to the left. Also, even if you didn't hit an obstacle and you dodged it while it was really close, it still reacts as you hit the obstacle.

I used to play this game a long time ago. I just came back and the UI changes and new game modes are actually really good. However, I am not a big fan of the new loading screens, and I would love it if you brought back the old one in a modernized form. It would also be nice if you guys add hints of the old UI into the new one (the calendar background was iconic, and the distorted theme music that used to play on the loading screen).

Love the fact that it is offline. Not too many ads, brilliant considering the game is free. Totally get that you have to make money somehow so you have deals and stuff, but the updates get really annoying quickly and having to update every season is frustrating. One tip though for those also finding problems is to delete and then reinstall the app.
